comments: This game is a lot of fun get to customize some great cars . A lot of my favorites and i was surprised to see some cool muscle cars . Very unique collection of cars. This is actually better than their console games. Well recent carbon and most wanted are amazing. The newest are hot garbage. This one is fun.reallywish there was free roam or a sand box room where you can admire and test drive  what you have grinded out so many hours to get. Only bad thing. Also the boxes are too expensive leaving having to grind way too much just for absolutely anything. By the time you get anything good this game servers will be empty.

Thank you for making this awesome game, I love it! I've not had this much fun playing a Need For Speed game in years.. Update 2.9.1 is fantastic. Although after updating, I'm having trouble connecting to the game servers... :/ Hope it gets sorted soon! nevertheless, I look forward to future updates. ;)

It's a great game, graphics are ok, smooth playing. But. There are some ideeas that may do something different. Think about a chat room, or a place where players can do some trades. Think about adding the possibility for players to get vip points for watching videos, or maybe one day..open world gameplay. And there could be a lot more features. Thumbs up if you agree.

All round best racing game I have played so far! That said, the game becomes very difficult as one goes above REP 60. It becomes very time consuming to proceed in the game without spending actual money. Useful stuff becomes harder to obtain via docks and via older races, which is frustrating.

The gameplay/races r so short. It takes less than a minute to finish it. And the police cars than u see in the gameplay don't even do anything they just keep going on on there own, sometimes getting to finish line before u. So basically this would be a perfect game for a three year old but incredibly boring for anyone over the age of 7

The game is pretty good, being a free mobile game, it is not trying to hide it's PTW features, but you can do mostly everything without having to spend a penny. One suggestion I think needs to be put in place is a confirmation window when you go to skip a level, because I was doing the speedhunter event for the Mazda MX-5, and accidentally hit the skip race button and lost a lot of gold, maybe not letting me even get the upgraded car now.
description: Race for dominance in the first white-knuckle edition of Need for Speed made just for mobile ‚Äì from the developer that brought you Real Racing 3. Build your dream ride with an unbelievable range of cars and customizations. Launch yourself between chaos and control as you hit the loud pedal and roll into underground car culture. Win races, up your rep, then kick into more races, more customizations, and more cars. Make your choices and never look back. Tonight we ride!This app offers in app purchases. You may disable in app purchases using your device settings.CUSTOMIZE EXTREME RIDESPick up the real-world cars you‚Äôve always wanted, from the Subaru BRZ to the BMW M4, McLaren 650s, Porsche 911, and more. Then trick them out with the hottest customization system on mobile, from spots like the Mod Shop and the Black Market, giving you over 2.5 million custom combos to play with. Your rides are waiting ‚Äì take them to the stages or streets to go head-to-head versus the competition and prove yourself.  DRIVE FAST ‚Äì AND FEARLESS Steer onto the streets of Blackridge, driving reckless and juiced as sparks fly. Accelerate over jumps and around debris, into traffic, against walls, and through high-speed Nitro Zones. Flip on the nitrous and thrust yourself into another level of adrenaline-fueled driving and drifting. Around every corner is a fresh race as you clash with local crews and local cops. It‚Äôs a world full of wannabe drivers ‚Äì can you stay in front and earn respect? RACE TO WINNever back down as you race anyone crazy enough to take you on, leave them gapped, and increase your rep. Dig, drift, drag, and roll your ride to wins with police on your tail, hitting each inch of the map hard by the time you reach the big end. Burn rubber in over 1,000 challenging races ‚Äì and that‚Äôs just the starting line. Be notorious, own the streets, and score the world‚Äôs best cars. Because one ride is never enough!---------------------User Agreement: terms.ea.comVisit https://help.ea.com/ for assistance or inquiries. descriptionHTML:
Race for dominance in the first white-knuckle edition of Need for Speed made just for mobile – from the developer that brought you Real Racing 3. Build your dream ride with an unbelievable range of cars and customizations. Launch yourself between chaos and control as you hit the loud pedal and roll into underground car culture. Win races, up your rep, then kick into more races, more customizations, and more cars. Make your choices and never look back. Tonight we ride!

This app offers in app purchases. You may disable in app purchases using your device settings.

CUSTOMIZE EXTREME RIDES
Pick up the real-world cars you’ve always wanted, from the Subaru BRZ to the BMW M4, McLaren 650s, Porsche 911, and more. Then trick them out with the hottest customization system on mobile, from spots like the Mod Shop and the Black Market, giving you over 2.5 million custom combos to play with. Your rides are waiting – take them to the stages or streets to go head-to-head versus the competition and prove yourself.

DRIVE FAST – AND FEARLESS
Steer onto the streets of Blackridge, driving reckless and juiced as sparks fly. Accelerate over jumps and around debris, into traffic, against walls, and through high-speed Nitro Zones. Flip on the nitrous and thrust yourself into another level of adrenaline-fueled driving and drifting. Around every corner is a fresh race as you clash with local crews and local cops. It’s a world full of wannabe drivers – can you stay in front and earn respect?

RACE TO WIN
Never back down as you race anyone crazy enough to take you on, leave them gapped, and increase your rep. Dig, drift, drag, and roll your ride to wins with police on your tail, hitting each inch of the map hard by the time you reach the big end. Burn rubber in over 1,000 challenging races – and that’s just the starting line. Be notorious, own the streets, and score the world’s best cars. Because one ride is never enough!

---------------------
User Agreement: terms.ea.com
Visit https://help.ea.com/ for assistance or inquiries.

EA may retire online features and services after 30 days’ notice posted on www.ea.com/1/service-updates

Important Consumer Information:
This app: requires a persistent Internet connection (network fees may apply); Requires acceptance of EA’s Privacy & Cookie Policy and User Agreement; collects data through third party analytics technology (see Privacy & Cookie Policy for details); contains direct links to the Internet and social networking sites intended for an audience over 13.

comments: This game relies on internet connection far too much to actually be able to play while traveling. I have been disconnected several times in the middle of getting the golden statues, so it not only takes my tickets (which are hard to come by), it also doesn't give me the golden statue when I won it and the internet went down.
I love the game but three times now it has not given me my diploma for jobs I passed in Hawaii with is keeping me from moving on to the next level.  It's very frustrating.
Nice idea but crashes too often. I like the way you can travel to different countries and learn about different places. Unfortunately it crashes too often

I spent a good amount of time today trying to figure out why I was not getting job diplomas. I pass the quizzes with enough points but it doesn't give me the diploma. I even updated the game just in case. Advice?

Super fun game, play as much as you like, don't have to spend money, travel around the world and learn about different cultures. Usually only very minor loading issues but probably because of my own connection. Add more diplomas!
How do I use vip travel card? It was said that it cover all the trips, but when I want to travel, I have to buy a ticket. I dont understand the purpose of tbe card.

comments: I love this game. Its very addicting and fun, but I find that there are barely any female dragons. This upsets me very much and I would like for this to change. The only females I see are the dragons with names like  motherly dragon, belle dragon, viktoria dragons, and sleeping beauty dragons. There are also descriptions like "add some girly pink to your collections with the gummy dragon"(which is also coincidently a girl). Then I see cool legendary dragons, but OH plot twist they're all boys. This is a very fun game no doubt on that, but please, stop with the sexism and make cool female dragons. Thank you.

Still Having Lot's of Fun! Cool to mix different dragons just to see what u get!  I just opened my 6th island, When I first started playing this game I think there were only 3 or 4 islands & maybe about 300 to 400 dragons. I'm having trouble keeping them long enough to get the next island!üòâüòÑüòÅ!!

Game would be great except for the fact that you can't do certain things without bugging people on Facebook for help. I just want to play the game. I can't level my dragons past 10 without building a special building which you build without gems or bugging people. No way to get gems other than extremely slowly by completing achievements which take days to complete and give 1-3 gems. Supposedly you can watch videos for gems but there is absolutely no place on the game that allows this. If your friends on Facebook don't play this game they can't help you and you are screwed if you truly want to enjoy the game. You can't win battles with level 10 dragons. You can't breed more than one dragon at a time without gems. You can't expand past 2 islands without gems. If you get the required gems to level your dragons past 10, then there is another super expensive building to level them past 15, and get, guess what, you need gems for that too. Other games allow in game friends which this one doesn't and that is frankly ridiculous as it's a "social" game. Other games allow other ways to obtain gems like watching videos or trying other games which this one doesn't. There isn't enough time to complete special events for special limited dragons unless you can get gems. Overall, the game would be fantastic if gems were easier to come by and you could make in game friends instead of having to rely on Facebook friends!

Just a few gripes. 1st of all I LOVE DRAGON CITY. Been playing for years. About your survey, I would never. You ask for too many permissions. Tree of life....when I get a Dragon here comes the same Dragon adding up for hatching. Like why? 815+ dragons are more than enough. Why do u keep adding, adding, adding. We could NEVER get all of them as it is. Why more? Love me some Dragon City like a said in the beginning.

The game is amazing, addicting and a lot of fun just to collect and level up dragons. The events that are constantly coming on always make you feel like you have something to do. However when of the events are very unbalanced and, if you are against one of these people, not very fun. The heroic races are a great way to compete with other players to add a powerful dragon to your collection but some people take the fun out of it by spending 100's of gems to ensure that they come first. The ability to use gems during these races should be removed as it is highly unbalanced, or at least add another way of collecting the heroic dragons without having to compete with people who pay to win.

THIS IS THE BEST GAME EVER!!! I totally recommend it to EVERYONE who loves addictive games and dragons. I find myself constantly playing this game all the time! I honestly feel like I can't say how much I LOVE this game with words. Again, this is the best game a player can have. Just one thing, I wish there were more ways to get gems instead of just buying 'cause I can't buy anything. So please make gems more easier to get. Also please make the islands worth less gems.üòä

descriptionHTML:
Ready to take on the hottest role playing game out there and bend fire-breathing dragons to your will? Are you the one to claim the title of top Dragon Master in the world? Accept the challenge and prove your might!

Build a Dragon City on floating Islands and fill it with farms, habitats, buildings… and dragons! Collect and train your cute babies and evolve them into impressive beasts that will defend you in the PvP Arenas!

Join forces with other Dragon Masters in Alliances, interact in the chat and obtain rewards from the Alliance Chest.

Combine dragons of Fire, Nature, War, Legend and lots of other elements to hatch rare hybrids and expand your collection. You can also obtain dragons from exclusive events!

FEATURES

- Complete the Dragon Book! There are over 500 dragons to breed and collect.
- New dragons join the game every week through breeding events and special islands.
- Challenge yourself at the Dragon Quests and fight against other Masters in the PvP Arenas to collect exclusive dragons, claim Warrior’s Chests, and climb up the leaderboards!
- Summon dragons of the at the Tree Of Life and try their skills.
- Unlock advanced features like the Ancient World and the Guardian Dragons.
- Be social: Join Alliances to play with other masters, chat with them, and open Alliance Chests.
- Log in with Facebook to save your game and play on all your devices - That way you can take your baby dragons everywhere.

There are over 80 million Dragon Masters. What are you waiting for? Join the fun!

If you already love our dragons… Drop us a nice review :)

Dragon City is FREE to download and FREE to play. However, you can purchase in-app items with real money. If you wish to disable this feature, please turn off the in-app purchases in your phone or tablet’s Settings.

Follow us on Twitter: @DragonCityGame
Like us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/DragonCity
Subscribe to our Youtube channel: https://www.youtube.com/user/DragonCityChannel

Check out other cool games by the creators of Dragon City: Monster Legends and World Chef!

comments: First off to all those saying too many ads, there aren't any ads. What you're seeing is game packs that can be purchased to help you advance within the game. I love the game. Everythingis great. I just wish they would give everyone time to adjust to previous items before creating something new. And also the pricingis too high. $20-$50 is fine but $99 is way too much.

This game has become a cash cow for the developers at MZ. New features are added making the game more complex and diverse weekly. Costing players money. While old features players are familiar with and depend on break down  After contacting MZ you get a nice form letter stating thank you for bringing it to there attention but they hope you understand these things take time to fix.

This game should be awesome, but the updates just come too fast now. I bought 2 packs this week and still got zeroed as soon as i dropped shield. By the time you spend 2 days clicking upgrades, someone is stronger than you and just waiting for you to try to use your new stuff.

This game was fun about two years ago before MZ started trying to milk players each month for money.  If you buy a package from them,  which ranges from $14.99 to $399.99, make sure you get what you pay for. ..many times you don't get everything they promise; especially with the BOGO packages.   MZ will do little if anything to correct the matter.  Also, even after you spend tons of money, if you wait long enough they will give you the same stuff for free to all players.   My advice...find another game to play. ..something more fun and worthwhile. ..and not sponsored by MZ.

If you want to be at top of this game then be prepared to spend more than the price of a top end BMW in one year. I am not kidding. MZ releases major game changing upgrades every day for several $99.99 packs. Then you get tge worst customer support in the industry. Terrible software quality control and business practices that mirror drug cartels.

Mz took a once decent game and ruined it.  The weekly changes are senseless change is to be gradual.  Im finally walking away.  Im done with ur bots, done with admin accts and done with daily chances.  More and more people have quit and droves more will follow.  Choke on the money u got from all  of the foolish people who actually paid.  You deserve none of it

comments: This game is perfect for those who played any moba style game. 2 buddies of mine play this the same we used to back in the first 2 years of league of legends. Short games, almost no existence of any real "pay to win". No heavy dedication required to get started. Great for the casual and hardcore gamer. Not for those who haven't even seen a moba style game before. Just needs more items to buy in game, but can't expect perfection from the start. Overall 4.7 from me

Cool game very fun few negative though. Snowballing is way to easy one death and you basically lose lane. The controls need to be better they need a target lock mode. Its hard to keep on your target even with hero icons on. Being able to only use the jungle talent if you have a jungling item on sucks. its so hard to comeback if any bit behind as i said snowballing is to large.

If you love League of Legends are definitely going to like and enjoy playing this game. One of the best games out there. You don't need to spend any money to be one of the best players it's all about skill and having a good team structure it's nothing about spending hundreds of dollars of real cash to get the best items because there are no best items! You do not have to pay to play this game and be the best!

The connection and reconnecting sucks, I always end up idle or AFK because apparently my connection sucks but it's perfectly fine. Reconnecting takes forever and by the time it's done the game is already over and I'm reported for AFK when it's not even my fault the game's connection sucks.   Other than that the game is fun to play and a good time consumer but they need to work on better connection. I kept on getting warnings for my AFK when the game kept on glitching and it affected my phone so I had to restart the whole thing.

Way better than Mobile Legends. I use to be  Mobile Legends Die-Hard All the way but this is the best MOBA out there. I have no idea why this does not have 50+million downloads. ? Do Not Judge By Front cover. PLAY THIS AND SEE WHEN YOU REACH RANKED MATCHES MY FELLOW MOBA PLAYERS.

Played both the international version (arena of valor) and the Chinese version (honor of kings). It is the better mobile moba in the market with great control and smooth gameplay. Having DC heros in the roster is a big plus.   Downside is the lack of content compared to the Chinese version. Sure it's a fairly new game, but if this game wants to be as successful as honor of kings it need a lot more content to keep players engaged. More meaningful events (not the crappy one that give you 5 gold for winning matches), way better skins (seriously check out the skins in honor of kings, so much better) thats actually appealing to people. And please let people unlock arcana pages with gems instead of paying real money.

Crush your enemies in classic 5v5 combat in real time! Carve your way through jungles, lanes, and towers, draw first blood and destroy the enemy Core. descriptionHTML:
Experience Arena of Valor, an epic new 5v5 multiplayer online battle arena (MOBA) designed by Tencent Games!

Call on your teammates to join you in the jungle! Crush your enemies in classic 5v5 combat in real time! Draw first blood, carry your team, and become legendary in the arena!

Features:

- Classic 5v5 MOBA, Perfected for Mobile -
Traverse a classic three-lane arena filled with nooks and crannies between towers. Watch out for enemies lurking in the brush and uncover secrets that wait in the jungle. Intuitive controls specifically designed for mobile will have you racking up kills with ease and make you an MVP in no time!

- Growing Number of Legendary Heroes -
Explore and command a roster of over 40 fearless heroes and counting, including a variety of Tanks, Assassins, Mages, Support, Warriors, and Marksmen. Build the perfect team to crush your opponents in battle!

- The Ultimate MOBA Experience -
First Blood, Double Kill, Triple Kill… all the features that you know and love right at your fingertips. Discover and dominate all the gameplay modes, including 5v5, 3v3, 1v1, and a unique “Hook Wars” mode that will challenge your skills and make you a true champion!

- Fast Matchmaking & 10-Minute Matches -
Team up with players all around the world in an instant. Carve your way through jungles, lanes, and towers, draw first blood and destroy the enemy Core. Carry your team to victory in less than 10 minutes!

- Join Your Friends in Fierce Team Battles -
Enjoy fast-paced combat and forge alliances with players around the world. Interact with friends and guild buddies every day using real-time voice chat. Share the load, work together, and fight strategically. Team up with your friends in Tourney Mode and soon you’ll be able to create your own league. Arena of Valor is the new eSport for your mobile devices.

- Got What It Takes? Free to Play Forever -
In Arena of Valor, it’s all about skill. We strive to create the most riveting and balanced gameplay, so you can turn the tide of battle and vie for glory no matter the odds. Win or lose, every action counts!

Contact Us:
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/ArenaofValor
Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCgYkGvtBuY4onYm2Eh61zwQ
Twitter: https://twitter.com/arenaofvalor
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/arenaofvalor/

comments: i uninstalled this game because it lagged and it wont let me out of my Bel Air Mansion. i was in level 16 and almost 17. i thought i can get my old progress again (i linked to my facebook and googleplay AND i checked) BUT IT RESTARTED AGAIN FROM THE DAMN BEGINNING! pls. give me back my old progress. PLEASE.

If you own a yacht, be able to travel around the globe on it like your plane. When purchasing houses and furniture allow options on colors and styles. Be able to choose from different outfits for runway and photoshoots, not from your own personal closet.  If they can model under water then make them dance, sit,  hug, kiss and sleep. They should be more life like. Add more games to play at the Miraggio casino.  Add more cash outfits not as many kstar outfits.

LOVE this game and have done for such a long time as I'm a huge KK fan. My only issue is, that it's pay to play for sure.  It's hard to make money and gain k stars. Everything is OVER PRICED. Even to just furnish your home. I hope kim and Glu reconsider this as not everyone has money to splash on what you need to progress more quickly.

I've spent probably thousands on this game because I liked it, but I'm having serious problems. Back on March 13Th I bought yet another hundred dollar kstar pack that did not go through. I was able to confirm the order and they "added it to my account". The problem is I still haven't gotten it. And I've sent screenshots showing I have not gotten it. I've purchased several other packs of various prices and I've received them all, but I've still, to this day, not received the hundred dollar one. I keep getting bounced around and told "just do a hard reset" which I've already done several times as well as turning off my phone and everything. That doesn't explain why I've gotten the other purchases but not this one. On top of that, the "help" I've been getting has been taking longer and longer to even respond, each time though I'm getting the same unhelpful answers.  If it was five dollars I would have just forgotten it, but I'm being screwed out of 100 dollars with no answers. I'm extremely disappointed.  Buyers beware.

Pretty cool game. I did buy the small star pack and it never showed up. Kinda lame. If someone could look into it that'd be great. I would just like to receive the stars. Not a refund. Please and thank you

I've read some of the comments and it seems this game is a rip off. You purchase things that you don't get then you report it and all they say is, it was put on your account when clearly its not there.. They have no problems taking the money from your account in seconds when you push confirm.. A friend got me playing this game, actually she stopped playing because she purchased something that she never got.. So yeah a total rip off..

comments: I d give it 10/10 if there way a search button to look for mayors, more communication options (private/public) messaging to facilitate talking in the game etc..and concerning the gameplay, it would better if devs reduce the production time of items. It takes way longer and as players we dont have all day to play even if we used boosters and in game cash !

Wonderful game indeed. The only thing is missing is the financing part. Would be really nice to have a banking inductor a stock market where you could trade financial products like other cities bonds or debt. Financing during the game can be a big problem so having a financial hub from where you could trade and borrow would be really useful. Thank you for developing this amazing game.

This game is crazy and awesome at the same time. My population has been awesome. Just 2 months and it was from 0 - 92 000+! The crazy part is when I see a blue hospital sign, the people dont even tell good reasons. ALL THEY DO IS SAY, Sometimes I go to the clinic just to read MAGAZINES! My citizens are so crazy JUST BEACAUSE IN ONE HECTARE, I AM A GOOD MAYOR!

Too much waiting for things to get made and produced. The storage and items for upgrades FAR too difficult to get. 42 items to raise storage by 5 items. And it can take weeks to find all the items. When you go to global storage and find an item that you really need, by the time that you get there, it's already sold! üò† Also, it takes 3 different items, and you have 3 of one item and 24 of another. Really? Also, it should be that you get needed items more often, randomly rather than at specific times. Other than that, a good game.

Like the competition challenges it holds your attention. the time frames of production are a little long however the markets move products fast. I also like the club wars and the mayors challenges. My dislike is there are not enough thought bubbles in the fact that you only get two the rewards should be more frequently.

The new arenas for war are terrible... There is a massive lag time... I can't even get to the war after rebuilding until the game thinks for approximately 45 seconds... By the time I actually get one shot off it's a minute and a half... Then I'm almost dead and you come back with I'm sorry we're experiencing connectivity issues get it fixed please!
description: Welcome, Mayor! Be the hero of your very own city as you design and create a beautiful, bustling metropolis. Every decision is yours as your city gets larger and more intricate. Make smart choices to keep your citizens happy and your skyline growing. Then trade, chat, compete, and join clubs with fellow Mayors. Build your way to extraordinary with the most popular city builder on mobile!BRING YOUR CITY TO LIFEBuild skyscrapers, parks, landmarks, factories, and much more! Place buildings strategically to keep the taxes flowing and your city growing. Solve real-life challenges like traffic, fires, and pollution. Provide services like power plants and police departments, and boost your population with parks and education. Keep traffic moving with grand avenues and streetcars. Take on fun challenges to shape your society.PUT YOUR IMAGINATION ON THE MAPExpand along the beach with a marina, waterpark, and luxury beachfront. Build a Tokyo-style neighborhood and unlock exclusive landmarks like the Eiffel Tower and Statue of Liberty. Discover innovative technologies with Future Cities and get athletic with sports stadiums. Hit the town with Las Vegas buildings and go Hollywood with movie studios. There‚Äôs always something new and different to make your city unique.BATTLE YOUR WAY TO VICTORYCompete in real-time PvP with Club Wars, where you strategize with Mayor‚Äôs Club members and declare war on other cities. Once the battle is on, unleash crazy disasters on opponents, like the Disco Twister and Plant Monster, to do damage and watch the wreckage happen live. Earn disaster cards, SimCash, and other valuables to use in battle or to improve your city. Also, take on other players in the Contest of Mayors. Complete weekly challenges and climb the ranks to advance through Leagues. Become a top Mayor and get rewards that can upgrade and beautify your city.CONNECT AND TEAM UPJoin a Mayor‚Äôs Club to trade supplies with other members and chat about strategies and available resources. Collaborate to help someone complete their personal vision and get support to complete yours. Build big, work together, lead other Mayors, and watch your city come to life!-------User Agreement: terms.ea.com/enPrivacy and Cookie Policy: privacy.ea.com/en Visit https://help.ea.com/en/ for assistance or inquiries. comments: Used to be r5 of a top alliance  have witnessed  members  spending over 10k dollars . The most pay to play platform I've encountered. If you can spare 100 ‚Ç¨¬£$ per month  minimum.  It can be the best fun ever. But it exponentially grows so you'll never hit the top without continual spending .  Miss all the wonderful peeps but refuse to be a whale or a cash cow .

Money grab. Unless you have $300 a week to spend on this never ending money pit, you will never go anywhere in this game. You can only get so far, then you a required to spend actual cash to continue playing. If you want to max out your base you better have DEEP pockets. This is not a joke, if you want to be a serious player, it will cost you around $300 a week just to keep up. Only the rich get anywhere in this game.

Mobile Strike has reset game.   Nothing below cyber troops are being supported , no RSS .   Also.  One cyber Titan can zero anything that has highest normal T52 troops and best bio titans...... without sending a commander Once u reach building level 1100 offered for less than 19.99 USDyou will have no access to packs less than $100 USD and no access to RSS for older troops

I use to have one of the strongest bases in MKST.. Mistress Vixen..nickname Vix.  Anyhow i have spent easily around $3,000 us dollar on this game. And one day my shield lapsed and I got zeroed after about 40 plus hits. I quit playing. I started back and spent  littke money cause I missed my alliance people I started to consider family after almost a year of play.  Anyhow now they came out with cybernetics and the packs for that are $99.00 everytime. I'm sorry this has went to far. This is a pay to play game 100%.

Lots to do to increase your power, tons of new buildings giving massive power boosts, just wait a little bit & you may get lucky with a $99 pack being reduced to $19. Make sure you have plenty of money for this game. If you don't have the money, then starting out new, you'll be at a stand still around HQ level 20 & commander level 50, with only increasing power by researching, training more troops, & building traps for your wall. This game has been slowing down a lot lately though, not sure if it's the game or my phone causing it.

U spend money to get ready for war.I think I am ready too go to cp and look at the other players base and think I am going to die. Their lvl and power are bigger than mine, so I spend more money an that still don't help for the event this game is starting to suck. My res base I have never spent no then on it and I have it Hq lvl 350 what is up with that. Helping a base who has not spent no money. Help the people who has spent money

comments: Keeps locking up with a white screen and doesn't go to the spinner.  Also last few days the helpful hints had gone away.  They need to get rid of excellent flashing on screen.  You'll be in s timed level and you lose time because you can't see under the words.  Some levels its ridiculous to have to do them 15 times to pass it

I think there is difference between hard to solve or impossible. To get diamonds in order you should be able to get them. As example. Need to get circle first then triangle. But you cant get triangle unless circle is moved first. And mission failed because you didnt get diamonds in order. This is repeats over and over again. This is impossible to solve. I even had to deal with triangle being right down at the bottom. And all other diamonds at the top. I failed of cause. I am giving my view because I fed up with this stupid idea.

I really love this game. But expeditions are more fun then the game itself. I really wish we could actually finish the expeditions instead , of not getting to finish the story behind them. Also during the expeditions to buy things are way to expensive because the amount of maic it takes to remove one item. Pls address these issuea. Really hope to see some expeditions we can really have fun and finish with.

I love the expedition part but not enough time to complete them. Also i cut one tree down and have to wait an hour to cut another. Its takes to much magic to clear paths.Its hard to build the bridges and stuff because of this. Other then that i have no problem with it.

Love the different puzzle styles that go along with the basic mahjong matching game. It gives an extra challenge to completing each game. Sadly I have only gotten to 250 levels after a year or 2 of playing because the puzzles are constantly rigged to lose. I am not a cash player as I have more important living expenses to spend money on so buying power ups and such are not an option for me. Would be great if there weren't so many losing games one after the other. I'm referring to the ones where you get to the last couple of tiles and the gems needed are at the very bottom so you are made to match the 4th set of gems when you are supposed to match the 3rd set first. I get multiple games where the matching tiles are stacked on top of each other so it requires a shuffle to win. As I said I am not and refuse to cash shop on a game that is not worth spending money as it is not a necessity so it would be nice to be able to progress without 10-15 losing games in a row. The spinning wheel doesn't always have ads available and I rarely get power ups from it. I mainly get paws.

Game updated now havent a clue what i need on level 421 and objects i need are blank boxes can play game but dont know what i need if any one can tell me object amount and what levels they are on it would be a help. Also have uninstalled game a installed it again but still dosnt help.

For your unforgettable gaming experience we spiced it up with brain-teasing puzzles and fun riddles, exciting expeditions and challenging quests. You'll never be alone: little Sophie and her loyal cat Oliver will lend color to your journey.You're about to:‚Ä¢  Enjoy 2¬†000+ fascinating layouts;‚Ä¢  Solve captivating quests and puzzles;‚Ä¢  Clear your way from one land to another, getting rid of whimsical plants and building magic portals;‚Ä¢  Collect rare artefacts and gems;‚Ä¢  Restore and decorate your awe-inspiring family estate;‚Ä¢  Set free the enchanted cats;‚Ä¢  Have fun playing with your friends and family.More features you‚Äôll treasure:‚Ä¢  Regular game updates with new characters, levels, and quests;‚Ä¢  Special bonus levels, timed quests, exclusive tile sets;‚Ä¢  Amazing community and support;‚Ä¢  Ability to play offline without losing your progress.
descriptionHTML:
Explore an epic mix of original mahjong and exciting quests across the Magic Lands!

Mahjong Treasure Quest is not only about matching tiles.

For your unforgettable gaming experience we spiced it up with brain-teasing puzzles and fun riddles, exciting expeditions and challenging quests.

You'll never be alone: little Sophie and her loyal cat Oliver will lend color to your journey.

You're about to:

• Enjoy 2 000+ fascinating layouts;
• Solve captivating quests and puzzles;
• Clear your way from one land to another, getting rid of whimsical plants and building magic portals;
• Collect rare artefacts and gems;
• Restore and decorate your awe-inspiring family estate;
• Set free the enchanted cats;
• Have fun playing with your friends and family.

More features you’ll treasure:

• Regular game updates with new characters, levels, and quests;
• Special bonus levels, timed quests, exclusive tile sets;
• Amazing community and support;
• Ability to play offline without losing your progress.

comments: I really enjoy this game has been the only game that has kept my attention for more than a week. Working on week 3 now, most of the game is free but if you want to grow your port quickly than you will need to play into the game. The game really starts to slow down after level 50, I'm up in the high 60 levels now. I do really enjoy all the quests and they do add bonus quests from time to time to help build up your port.

A fun, easy-going game. No crazy-pace required and easy to advance.  The amount of unique ships is crazy, I think only fan of nautical history would really enjoy this aspect. The list of active ships should be available from your town, instead of only from map view. Other than that, it's quite enj9yable and not a complete time-sucker like many 9ther games. Well done.

I just started the game a couple of days ago, but I'm already hooked.  Like most games, you kind of learn as you move along, but a little more guiding would be very helpful. Thanks for making a fun game! I am having a problem getting past the loading screen though. I tried clearing cache, forced stop, delete files, even uninstalling and reinstalling again.

Easy to learn with loads of variables to keep it interesting. Graphics are stellar. As with most 'free' games, there are lots of incentives for you to get out your wallet; if you're as unwilling to do so as I am, you'll have to be patient. Can't fault the developers. Fish gotta swim, birds gotta eat.

If you want a game you can tap on a few things then come back a few hours later, this is it. Not any real goals though so after a while you do feel what's the point but the graphics are good and the events are good too but it needs better goals to help you achieve something. I just do what I want for now. Still play it though

I don't mind spending money on micro transactions if I like the game, and I do like this game.  But the jems in this game are outrageous, if you wanted to buy jems to buy one ship it would cost you $10-$20, depending on the ship.  Because of this, this developer won't be getting any more than the $4 I've spent on it unless they lower their prices.

Do not hesitate and prepare your fleet!

comments: Another rip off game. That tries to slowly bleed you dry of money. The rewards for victory are so small it's almost impossible to upgrade your base unless of course you pay for a shield,but even that's a scam cause with a shield you can't atracvk enemy bases.  Everything is basically pay to upgrade or spend forever trying to save up and even then. Bottom line ftx games are a scam. A shame too I really liked the game at first. But once you start buying stuff for it, it keeps you in a position where you have to keep on paying to have a chance.

Many time bought gold as soon you'll purchase gold the same time upgrades of building will increase by 20 bar of gold... I check twice before purchase was 100 bar for upgrade building as soon as I purchased went to 150 bar of gold ... the same building to upgrade... and rewards are like nothing ... used to loved it a lot but now seems to less liking it because of this..anyways game is awesome but need to invest a bit if you need survive out there in cartel
Great fun

Waste of time and money. You watch adds for a speed up, nothing happen, you install other apps for gold, nothing happen, you submit a report to customer service,nothing happen, they send back problem solved and they didn't do anything about. I bought gold for the app from one of their sponsors, nothing happen. I report it , a girl named Daria sent me back a email and said problem solved, guess what...NOTHING HAPPENED

Total rip off dont waste your time or money. Ever since update..its horrible. The developers will swipe your gold away (basically your money) and give an excuse that your bank or Google issued a refund. After showing and providing evidence that your never received a refund...they do nothing about it! Straight run around. And good luck talking to support..generic responses like the one they give on here.

This was the best Game i ve ever played but every new update creates alot trouble and tension of users. Forta spoiled the games fun. Now they want people to spemd money on scorpion. When they make them. They will introduce a sicario for that too... really dissapointed with tge way you people robbing money ftx.

descriptionHTML:
Destroy your enemies and become a powerful Capo - the leader of your own cartel in the official game of NARCOS!

Power. Loyalty. Warfare. Product.

Step into the dangerous and thrilling role of cartel kingpin in the official game of the hit television show NARCOS. Decide between leading through raw power or gathering respect through loyalty. Sometimes bad people do good things… In the end you must decide, will it be “Plata o Plomo”?

NARCOS
Learn the ropes of running an operation from El Patron himself and manage your “relationship” with the authorities through agents Murphy and Pena. Enter the world of Narcos with exciting events and updates of content from the show.

Recruit and build
Choose Plata and hire sicarios and build your defenses. Collect different sicarios, level them up and have them defend your base and add bonuses to production.

Wage War
Choose Plomo and send sicario led death squads to take over high value resources from other player cartels.

Profit
Develop your operation by building out your jungle finca with processing plants and labs. Select smuggling lines and plans to maximize revenue.

Cartel
Team up with other players to form cartels, lay siege to enemy cartel compounds in multi-day campaigns for domination.

There is money and power to be made. From now on, nowhere is safe.

About NARCOS:
Narcos is an inside look at the men who would stop at nothing to take down the cocaine drug lords. From the Colombian government to the DEA agents, from the policemen who would risk their lives to the US officials who would spin the story. Narcos is an unfiltered look into the war that would change the drug trade forever.

comments: Really enjoy playing this game so addictive. I currently play it on a samsung galaxy phone and I'm over 400 levels played. I am  going to be changing phones over to iphone and wondered if I could download game and carry on where I left off, or would I have to start all over again? Hope not.

I was a devoted player to Blast solitaire but this game has it beat. I love the challenge games as well as the journey to getting more gardens. Wish there were ways to get free wildcards? I hate paying that six grand for a help card. But I am addicted and I highly recommend it!

Love the game but I think the bonus levels to unlock gold crops should be heaps cheaper to play. Some of them are hard and you run out of money to keep trying them as they cost as much as a normal level to play.

It looks good and the gameplay is fun. Unfortunately that fun only lasts so long before the game devolves into micro transaction hell. Each round gets so expensive that I can only play one or two unless I were to buy coin packs. These guys should be ashamed.

Really fun game but costs too many credits to play and the extra five cards and wild are over priced considering the cost of credits per game round. Could be better if these issues get resolved I would edit my review to five stars all around.
It is a fun game. BUT, the levels cost so many coins that it's very slow. Unless you plan to pay real money or can win every level 1st try, expect to play maybe 1 game an hour.

comments: So much development has went into this game, the reason why I like it is because of the consistent updates and new stuff. It's hard to find games now with nothing new to bring to the table. It makes you want to invest into this game. Not to mention how generous they can be with the free gifts and whatnot. Keep it up Netmarble!

NM is slowly setting up higher prices for uniform qualities that should be 750 when on sale.. Now all new uniforms are 1050 when on sale even if the bonus and changes are trash. I'm disappointed that this game is changing drastically to a greedy game. Soon i will uninstall this game if this will continue.

This game is awesome. Love playing it everyday and everytime. But  recently I have a problem with the game crashing almost all the time. Please help me fix this problem.  I also want to ask when will you give Odin a uniform? A better skillset, a heal, and a piercing ability for him to shine again as a god. Looking forward to it Netmarble.

There are some incredibly predatory practices with the in app purchases.  For example, if you buy the new Emma Frost pack, you won't get her work fully leveled gear, and that isn't made clear on the purchase screen.  You will need to buy the package at least once, and possible multiple times over to actually advance her.

Give credit to where credit is due. You guys are taking a step into the right direction. It is a small step, but still, it shows us that you listen. So please listen to us more. The game needs improvements on existing game modes that is becoming stale and boring and repetitive. Most players are also waiting for new game modes. This new update, Version 3.9, is like sending a message to your players that you are listening to them, and that is a good thing.

This game was good. The past 6 months have just been a display of how game companies do not care for user experience but rather their pockets. Cash grab all the way. This game had potential to be the greatest, but a pure let down for the entire community.

Prepare to defend your universe!Recruit your favorite characters, complete missions, and compete with other players to be the greatest hero and save your world.Collect over 100 Marvel Super Heroes and Super Villains to assemble your ultimate team.- Level up your characters and their gear to unleash their full powers!- Build classic teams like the Avengers or X-Men to take advantage of special bonus effects.- Choose from hundreds of Uniforms to increase your character‚Äôs powers and perfect your hero's look.Upgrade powerful characters in Epic Quests!- Get everyone‚Äôs favorite Super Heroes, from Captain Marvel to Doctor Strange, and level them up while playing thrilling Epic Quests.- Unleash each character‚Äôs unique super powers as you make your way through various missions. Blast enemies with Iron Man‚Äôs Unibeam and bash opponents in the name of justice with Captain America‚Äôs shield!- Experience even more thrilling action in PvP Arena modes, where you can bring your best team to take on the world.Team up with friends and overcome incredible in-game challenges.- Take a friend‚Äôs character with you when you go into a mission for emergency assistance!- Join an Alliance and make friends. descriptionHTML:
An epic blockbuster action-RPG featuring Super Heroes and Villains from the Marvel Universe!

The Avengers, Guardians of the Galaxy, Inhumans, Defenders, X-Men, Spider-Man, and more!
Over 100 characters from the Marvel Universe are available to play!

S.H.I.E.L.D.’s very own director, Nick Fury, has sent an urgent message from the future... the convergence is destroying the world as we know it! Prepare to defend your universe!
Recruit your favorite characters, complete missions, and compete with other players to be the greatest hero and save your world.

Collect over 100 Marvel Super Heroes and Super Villains to assemble your ultimate team.
- Level up your characters and their gear to unleash their full powers!
- Build classic teams like the Avengers or X-Men to take advantage of special bonus effects.
- Choose from hundreds of Uniforms to increase your character’s powers and perfect your hero's look.

Upgrade powerful characters in Epic Quests!
- Get everyone’s favorite Super Heroes, from Captain Marvel to Doctor Strange, and level them up while playing thrilling Epic Quests.
- Unleash each character’s unique super powers as you make your way through various missions. Blast enemies with Iron Man’s Unibeam and bash opponents in the name of justice with Captain America’s shield!
- Experience even more thrilling action in PvP Arena modes, where you can bring your best team to take on the world.

Team up with friends and overcome incredible in-game challenges.
- Take a friend’s character with you when you go into a mission for emergency assistance!
- Join an Alliance and make friends. Compete with other Alliances in Alliance Conquest and take home the glory for your own team.

Original new stories only found in Marvel Future Fight!
- Experience unique, never-before-seen stories to find out who’s responsible for threatening the existence of your universe!
- Play through Special Missions featuring the New Avengers, Inhumans, and even Spidey’s Foes!

comments: Wow! Just WOW! I had been very skeptical about downloading this huge gigabyte and pay-to-win game, BUT after finally "trying it out to see" I am now hooked and now a believer of all of the hype! I have gotten pretty far so far and have a pretty decent crew and I have not had to pay a red cent at all. The grinding in this game is actually fun and I do not mind watching an ad or two for fuel. Simple concept, EXCELLENT execution!

Wow, I'm extremely impressed. The gameplay is very fluid (as it runs on a 60fps on my s9+) lagging and unrealism is unheard of. Also, the soundtrack throughout the games retains just as much excitement as you'll feel beginning the game, viewing car selecting and racing. A must have game for car/racing/gaming enthusiast's. Very additcting.

Ok, my game is back but I'm missing a lamborghini 700-4 that was decked out completely with fusion parts maxed out and stage 6 nitrous and tires. So, you owe me a what, 4 start or 5 star car decked as my car was you took from me. I bought crates with money real money for that car. So I want the closest thing to my car the same as it was. Thank u

I used to love this game. But now all it has become is an ATM for the developer. Every good car in the game must be bought. Winning special events costs money. In game rewards have become useless. There are plenty of other racing games out there that won't require you to refinance your house to play. If I could give it zero stars I would.

Sound could use tweaking, I've driven some of the t1 and t2 cars and they do not sound like that. The grind is real in this game but the developer adds events on a frequent basis to over shadow this. Which would be great if the events didn't expect you to either have the devils luck with silver key crates or a never ending supply of cash.   Over all, great game. I still enjoy playing it even when I hit a "pay wall" and that says something about the game. I've only put $5 into this game (bought a $4.99 special pack) and I've still made it pretty far.

This is by far the greatest racing game I've played on a mobile device! The graphics are amazing, the controls are solid, and it keeps me coming back for more. The only issue I've found with it so far is the live races. Its sometimes hard to find a race and the races themselves seem unfair at times. Other than that, its a great game! Highly recommended!
description: CSR Racing 2 ‚Äì The next chapter to the #1 drag racing series of all time has arrived!‚ÄúUnbelievably good looking‚Äù, KOTAKU‚ÄúSo real it hurts‚Äù, CULT OF MAC‚ÄúObliterates the line between console and mobile graphics‚Äù, POLYGONSetting a new standard in visuals, CSR2 delivers hyper-real drag racing to the palm of your hand. Compete against live players across the world with your custom built supercars including LaFerrari, McLaren P1‚Ñ¢, Koenigsegg One:1 and many more.Team up with friends to form a crew, tune your rides for maximum speed and dominate the competition in global crew events. CSR2 is all-new; download for free and start racing now!3D NEXT-GEN GRAPHICS‚Ä¢ CSR2 redefines what you thought possible on mobile, with stunning detail on all your favorite cars.‚Ä¢ Meticulous level of detail inside every car, incl. original manufacturers‚Äô trim options. Racing doesn‚Äôt get more real than this!REAL-TIME RACING‚Ä¢ Race towards a new challenge! Compete against opponents from around the world or race against friends in real-time challenges.CAR CUSTOMISATION‚Ä¢ Cars can be customized with a wide range of paint, rims, brake calipers and interior trims just like a real car.‚Ä¢ Personalize your car with paint wraps, decals and custom license plates!UPGRADE, TUNE AND FUSE‚Ä¢ Car upgrades are only the start. You can now get under the hood to tune gear ratios, tire pressure, nitrous boost settings and much more.‚Ä¢ Stay competitive by stripping surplus cars for parts, and fuse them into your favorite vehicles.BUILD YOUR DREAM GARAGE‚Ä¢ Collect beautiful supercars and show them off in your huge warehouse garage.‚Ä¢ CSR2 features over 200 officially licensed vehicles from the world‚Äôs most desirable car manufacturers including:‚Ä¢ Ferrari‚Ä¢ McLaren‚Ä¢ Bugatti‚Ä¢ Lamborghini‚Ä¢ Pagani‚Ä¢ KoenigseggCHALLENGE FRIENDS AND RACING ENTHUSIASTS AROUND THE WORLD‚Ä¢ Prove your skill in fast-paced, synchronous multiplayer challenges. Master the unique timing of each car to come out on top.‚Ä¢ Chat with other players live, and join a crew to roll with your friends.‚Ä¢ Compete in fresh and exciting online events and increase your rank on the PVP leaderboards.DOMINATE THE CITY‚Ä¢ Compete in single-player Crew Battles across stunning race environments.‚Ä¢ Work your way from rookie to pro by defeating the top crews in a city where nothing is as it seems. Can you uncover the truth?‚Ä¢ Keep an eye out for events to earn extra cash for upgrades and win rare parts for your rides. New events added daily!---------------------Make sure you play with your device connected to the internet to gain access to the latest content and features, and to ensure that your profile is backed up.PLEASE NOTE! Must be 13+ to play. CSR Racing 2 is free to play, but it contains items that can be purchased for real money. descriptionHTML:
CSR Racing 2 – The next chapter to the #1 drag racing series of all time has arrived!

“Unbelievably good looking”, KOTAKU
“So real it hurts”, CULT OF MAC
“Obliterates the line between console and mobile graphics”, POLYGON

Setting a new standard in visuals, CSR2 delivers hyper-real drag racing to the palm of your hand. Compete against live players across the world with your custom built supercars including LaFerrari, McLaren P1™, Koenigsegg One:1 and many more.

Team up with friends to form a crew, tune your rides for maximum speed and dominate the competition in global crew events. CSR2 is all-new; download for free and start racing now!

3D NEXT-GEN GRAPHICS
• CSR2 redefines what you thought possible on mobile, with stunning detail on all your favorite cars.
• Meticulous level of detail inside every car, incl. original manufacturers’ trim options. Racing doesn’t get more real than this!

REAL-TIME RACING
• Race towards a new challenge! Compete against opponents from around the world or race against friends in real-time challenges.

CAR CUSTOMISATION
• Cars can be customized with a wide range of paint, rims, brake calipers and interior trims just like a real car.
• Personalize your car with paint wraps, decals and custom license plates!

UPGRADE, TUNE AND FUSE
• Car upgrades are only the start. You can now get under the hood to tune gear ratios, tire pressure, nitrous boost settings and much more.
• Stay competitive by stripping surplus cars for parts, and fuse them into your favorite vehicles.

BUILD YOUR DREAM GARAGE
• Collect beautiful supercars and show them off in your huge warehouse garage.
• CSR2 features over 200 officially licensed vehicles from the world’s most desirable car manufacturers including:
• Ferrari
• McLaren
• Bugatti
• Lamborghini
• Pagani
• Koenigsegg

CHALLENGE FRIENDS AND RACING ENTHUSIASTS AROUND THE WORLD
• Prove your skill in fast-paced, synchronous multiplayer challenges. Master the unique timing of each car to come out on top.
• Chat with other players live, and join a crew to roll with your friends.
• Compete in fresh and exciting online events and increase your rank on the PVP leaderboards.

DOMINATE THE CITY
• Compete in single-player Crew Battles across stunning race environments.
• Work your way from rookie to pro by defeating the top crews in a city where nothing is as it seems. Can you uncover the truth?
• Keep an eye out for events to earn extra cash for upgrades and win rare parts for your rides. New events added daily!


---------------------

Make sure you play with your device connected to the internet to gain access to the latest content and features, and to ensure that your profile is backed up.

PLEASE NOTE! Must be 13+ to play. CSR Racing 2 is free to play, but it contains items that can be purchased for real money. You can toggle these purchases on/off in the ""Restrictions"" menu on your device.

To prevent unauthorized purchases, select “Set or Change PIN” from the Google Play settings menu, create a PIN, then enable the “Use PIN for Purchases” option. You will then be required to enter your PIN before every transaction.

Terms of Service: https://www.zynga.com/legal/terms-of-service
Privacy Policy: https://www.zynga.com/privacy/policy

6 Agar Street
London WC2N 4HN

EXCLUSIVE LAMBORGHINI CARS:
In partnership with Lamborghini, CSR2 brings you a double world exclusive from the 2018 Geneva Motorshow! The Lamborghini Urus and the Hurac√°n Performante Spyder.
ASTON MARTIN VANTAGE & LIBERTY WALK AUDI R8 V10:
CSR2 is thrilled to bring you the new sleek Aston Martin Vantage and the aggressively styled Liberty Walk Audi R8 V10.
summary: Race your way to the top of the leaderboards in your custom supercar with CSR2!
title: CSR Racing 2

comments: I love to play hold em, but it's just to hard to round up the posse for poker night due to simply getting older. Life takes everyone n different directions. Not too mention, having kids and getting married, doing the family thing. Don't get me wrong, I absolutely love living the family life with my wife and kids but I will always miss poker night with the fellas. Now that I have stumbled upon WSOP I have been able to invite all of the fellas to join and we can all play together still once again. THANK U!!!!

Seen to many players leave because of this. Players with over a billion in chips. Goes to a small table with players having 30k or 40k. Goes all in every hand and kills the table. Players ask him why he does it and not play bigger tables. His answer because game allows me to and I can knock out player after player. Regulate players if they have X amount of chips play on bigger tables. Let the smaller players gain chips and enjoy the game.

It appears that I have reached a certain point where my free play is being met with bot resistance. I've gained over ten million in one day and lost it all and more in suck outs. This game is super fun whilst the going is good, but I fear the algorithms are programmed to entice you to pay real money, which of course you'd have to be mental to do once you realise how loaded this game is. Play for free = fun

Win a bit and loose everything in a few hands...  Once you win a good hand, leave the table.  Dealer will not give a a chance.  After this review, I received an e-mail from the designer assuring me, that game is fair.  I have been losing several hands with pocket KK, QQ, JJ, and so for.  So I stand with my original review.   Win on a good hand and leave game.  Or else you will lose it ALL!

This is a good game , only prob I have is there seems to some hackers/botting which makes it a little hard to play. Now as far as some people's comments even if the  people with a billion chips come to smaller tables , if you all knew how to play you wouldn't have to worry about them taking your chips. Trust me the majority of them started out at low tables also having to have to fight the ones with more money. I have been playing this game for a few years and love it.  Like I said only problem I have is to many bots/hackers.

It would be better if they offered more free chips. Rather than bombarding us Every time we log in with there outrageous prices. Also a flush draw Every other hand and usually someone hits. Barely won a hand since the negative review also. Complete B.S game. I agree with all negative reviews here. 4.5 rating? Haha, most reviews are negative.  Done and done.

descriptionHTML:
So begins a new tale of crystals....

A tried-and-true, yet brand new RPG！

SQUARE ENIX’s first title aimed at a worldwide audience;
a brand new FINAL FANTASY game available for smartphones!
Play an entirely new RPG made in classic FINAL FANTASY style!

Includes characters
from past FINAL FANTASY titles!

Enjoy this expansive storyline
right on your phone!

=========================================
Features

-Simple battle feature with strategy!
Easy and interactive battles! Tap the screen to attack, but combine magic abilities with tactical know-how to overpower your opponents in strategic maneuvers!Plus!
High quality CG animations of your favorite FINAL FANTASY summons!

-Search in the field and complete dungeons!
Move characters through fields and dungeons to search for items, hidden paths, and new routes to your destinations!
Talk to people in towns to receive quests. Complete them to get items, gil, and even rare items!
It's got all the many features of an RPG in an easy portable form!

- Arena PVP battles!
Fight other players and get to the top!
Take your favorite party to war against your rivals and fight for great prizes!

=========================================
Story

Visions――
The hopes and dreams of
legendary warriors given life.
 
Lapis――
A world of crystals and the visions that slumber within.

Harnessing the power of the crystals,
mankind prospered, nations flourished.
But just as day gives way to night,
that era of peace proved but a fleeting illusion.
 
Now, as their world stands on the precipice
of ruin, two young knights summon visions
to their side as they strike out on a journey
to chase the shadows.
 
So begins a new tale of crystals,
and the heroes who would save them...

comments: Love this little game! I wish we had five life's, Three just gets me started. But overall, it's a great game. Getting like Candy Crush the higher the level the more impossible it gets to finish. Please don't make it so hard to win. I keep having to use coins to buy lives. Can never build up enough to amount to anything. Also you can give cash on the scratch off card. PLEASE !!!

Very hard and not as fun as the other games but  because you cannot even solved one level in a 3 lives. My friends do not want to play when I showed them how it is being played. I've noticed that the first part of level 3 is more fun now than before. But still the 2nd and 3rd level is very hard. I admire those who completed the whole cities. They must be geniuses in algorithms in solving the 9 moves in one level. The most amazing part of this game are the graphics.  Awesome really awesome.  Very well done. Still playing this game but also still cannot convince my friends to get out of CC and other games. Will keep on trying though.

This game is set up to STEAL a certain number of lives before you can win a level. Some levels, like Venice, level 79 may never be won. I have bought extra lives twice, extra moves twice, I REFUSE to make anymore purchases. If this was a truly user friendly game, it would BANK any extra moves, lighting, and other bonuses you've earned but did not use. But no, it throws them out. STEALS what you have earned. BANK it for me, I earned it, I should get to keep it. I'm done with this game.

I am glad for the staff at big fish they did a wonderful job getting me back play after all my levels where lost.. They found them all and it made me happy that i can play where i was.. I can not play to often sometimes and had taken me a long time but look forward to every new city i get to open a new and all the challenges i get to participate in.  Thank you all for this game

Fantastic game!  I love the graphics and interesting bits of trivia shared every time a landmark is built.  I also like the extra daily challenges and the special events that open up every so often.  Gummy Drop is challenging but can be played without needing to make any in-app purchases.  One con: the game starts you with three lives (lives replenish after 20 minutes), but in order to permanently increase your lives to five, you must pay $10.

Surprisingly fun! I was setting the ads for this game everywhere but thought they were really unappealing. Work on your ads a little to emphasize the fun prizes for completing levels, the enjoyable hunt for tour letters in old levels, the history of the buildings you save! So many great things happening in this game.

descriptionHTML:
JAM, CRUSH, & MATCH three or more candy like gummies and blast your way through thousands of 🎇 FUN levels in this FREE puzzle game. Solve puzzles and rebuild famous landmarks.

Download the game that over 40,000,000 people are already playing worldwide! CRUSH combos of sweet gummies alone or challenge your friends to see who can get the highest score! Matching candy like pieces is so exciting you won’t want to stop playing this 💕 addictive free match-3 puzzle game. LET’S GO GUMMY!

Blast Sweet Boosts
• Match jelly gummies to make special power ups & boosts
• Crush rows with the Plasma Strike
• Blast candy like pieces with the Bomb Boost
• Pop open daily treasure chests full of gems and resources
• Crush levels and get high scores to collect bonus rewards

Match-3 Excitement
• Juicy gummies squish & pop when you match them
• Puzzles with ⏰ timed and limited moves provide fun challenges
• Blast through unique levels & explore exotic locales around the world

Match-3 Puzzle Game Fun Goes 🌏 Global
• New puzzles and cities are added every month
• Free rewards when you solve limited time events
• Match your way around the world using travel vouchers to fly to any city, anytime
• Crush puzzles to rebuild famous cities
• Pop candy like gummies to build landmarks from Sydney to Tokyo, Paris to Dubai and more
• Blast your way through over 50 cities & collect stamps for your passport

More FREE puzzles to solve with Gummy Drop!
• Fun puzzles don’t stop, with over 10,000 levels to play!
• Sweet holiday & Christmas events like Santa’s Workshop provide collectible passport stamps
• Play timed events for infinite life boosts & other rewards

Match to Collect Resources
• Complete tasty gummy levels to gather resources
• Play though levels again to be able to rebuild the landmarks
• Match through side levels to help locals and score bonus resources

Gummy Drop! is completely free to play but some optional in-game items will require payment.

Can’t get enough of Gummy Drop!? Like us on Facebook, follow us on Twitter, or visit our Headquarters for sweet musings, matching tips, gummy stories, and tasty giveaways!

comments: I would love to be able to play the game again.  The new update has now given me minimal play time as it continuously crashes.  Like I would've thought that the crashing problem would've been fixed by now,  but it just gets worse every day.

It's great! Stop spamming me to rate!! [ Edit ] Okay, I guess at the beginning it did it a lot more but eventually slowed down. Would be nice if it just stopped entirely after rating. I've raised my rating by 1 star.
This game crashes more than drunk drivers on a Saturday night. It was the fun the first day but a day later it crashes without even getting through the loading screen?? Fix your game.
Well made game, lovely graphics, and not very pay-to-win. I love it. Never encountered any of the bugs/crashes the others mentioned so I can't say much about that. It's a smooth experience for me.
So many crashes. Daily 50-100. I cant take this anymore. I think I might quit if this problem will not be resolved. Cache cleared many times. This game is not worth daily constant crashes.

Enjoyable on every front EXCEPT when I receive fb messenger notifications and I use the "quick reply" without opening the app, the keyboard slides the entire application up half way and after I send it takes up to 30 seconds to correct itself if it does at all.  Idk but maybe make it so it allows over lay of keyboards? Or whatever coding nightmare that might bring...just figured I'd mention it

comments: The only problem I have with this game is that, if you have brought everything out of each of your stores and still have coins available WHY CAN'T WE USE OUR LEFT OVER COINS AND BUYS SPOONS? Cause you can't do nothing with left over coins in each state. Other than that, it keeps me ready for any challenge.

I absolutely loved it compared to the other games because it's absolutely free with literally thousands of levels and different menus (so you don't get bored)... It's a great balanced of easy and challenging (but still achieveable without spending a single cent)... My only complaint is that every now and then it hangs (but that's quite rare)... Great job!

The game is fun when it works. Every time I unlock a new restaurant or a new region or bonus level or ANYTHING it won't download. I get a "connection error", and the only way to get past it is to delete the game, re-download EVERYTHING (which clocks in at over 100mb) and try again. Update 3/15: I emailed the devs over a month ago and have yet to get even an automated response.

After all changes in Dublin its n impossible to win levels without purchasing spoons and boosts. It was a great game but it slowly got ruined by the greedy developres i guess. Well..guess what! I am not spending a dime on it and I will just stop play it.

This game is fun, but it would be much better if they make it so that you can watch video ads so that you can get more spoons, boots, and lives. You can only watch a video once or twice for a life. I definitely won't spend my actual money to play this game. It's not a home counsel game.  Also, this game gets difficult quickly. I'm in the Paris level and barely making it through. I like to play this game for fun and to pass time. But the difficulty increases makes it not as fun.

I love this game but the fact that you can't use coins to buy spoons really annoys me. I wish they at least had an option to convert coins to different currency so that you can buy stuff in the next locations. What are you meant to do with your coins after you've finished the city?? It's such a waste.
description: Cook & serve tasty cuisine ‚è∞ FAST ‚è∞ as a chef in Cooking Craze ‚Äì the fun new kitchen game! Bake, cook, and grill your way to world-wide restaurant chef fame! descriptionHTML:
Cook & serve tasty cuisine ⏰ FAST ⏰ as a chef in Cooking Craze – the fun new kitchen game!

Bake, cook, and grill your way to world-wide restaurant chef fame! The restaurant world awaits a hot new chef in this addictively fun time management 🍴 kitchen 🍴 game. Be a top chef and do it all in a cooking fever. Dash around the kitchen baking pizza, grilling tasty burgers, and cooking world-class cuisine. Fast play isn’t enough though; happy customers are needed to build your restaurant empire. Are you up for the challenge, Chef?

Cook Up Fun Anytime, Anywhere
• Download restaurant content and start cooking
• Feverish offline or online time-management game play
• Play Cooking Craze offline on your android device after initial content download
• ⭐Wi-Fi not needed!⭐

Play a Chef in this Fast & Fun Restaurant Game!
• 💰 Dash through kitchen service to earn big tips 💰
• Cook customers breakfast, lunch, dinner, and MORE!
• Bake, grill, and plate food by using a simple TAP and PLAY mechanic

Cook in a variety of settings
• Diner food recipes to perfect
• Scramble to feed customers in restaurant kitchens in NYC, Tokyo, Rome & more!
• Upscale restaurant cuisine provides new challenges

By downloading Cooking Craze, you are agreeing to the following:
• Big Fish privacy policy: http://www.bigfishgames.com/company/privacy.html
• Big Fish terms of use: https://www.bigfishgames.com/company/terms.html

Test Restaurant Kitchen Skills!
• Cooking techniques expand with new restaurants
• Earn positive comment cards with strategic serving of customers
• Create delicious dishes and 🍩 tasty desserts 🍩

Fun Cuisine & Kitchen Upgrades
• Delicious ingredients can be upgraded for premium dishes
• Over 100 ingredients to whip into tasty cuisine
• Manage time efficiently with kitchen upgrades

Fun & Powerful Cooking Boosts
• Time-management with fantastic boosts
• Cook Green with the Eco Boost & go organic for more tips
• 🍳 Make recipes burn-proof with special pans 🍳

Cook Classic Restaurant Dishes in this Free Kitchen Game
• Cook sweet donuts, savory hot dogs & soup
• Grill delicious fish, tasty steak, and mouth-watering 🍔 burgers 🍔
• Ice cream, cheesecake, pasta and shrimp - the recipes grow with each city!

Fun Levels to Master, Chef!
• 🏁 Dash through over 400 levels on three continents 🏁
• New levels and cities around the world added regularly
• Savor hours of exciting time-management fun for android gamers

Kitchen Challenges Require Strategy
• Cook extra shifts to get money for upgrades
• 🏆 Serve food fast to win timed levels 🏆
• Scramble through minimum score levels to earn top tips

Fun chef games are free to play!
• Time Management meets Strategy, meets tasty quests
• Bake & serve in burger joints, bakeries, and 5 star restaurants around the world
• ✨ Beat levels to get golden comment cards and earn coins & spoons for FREE✨

Connect with us! Stay up to date by connecting via:
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/CookingCrazeGame/
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/CookingCraze
Instagram: @cookingcrazegame

More from Big Fish Games: www.bigfishgames.com

comments: The app is really good. It's addictive. But, I really feel they should give out cash or diamonds more easily. If we could earn diamonds or cash for watching a video then it would be great. Cause it takes time for the looks to get voted and until then we cannot play and wait for the diamonds. It's kinda sad. Hope they'll look into this.

Really enjoy this game but its very hard to do well unless you pay real money to buy extras! There should be more benefits without paying for them and each comoleted challenge should provide more money and diamonds than it currently does! And it should be easier to move up levels- I've played for months now and still only at level 5! People will just get bored of playing

So this game Is fun and addicting BUT it favors those with money to spend. I understand that the creators of the app want money from it but at least make it fair for the players when it comes to voting on outfits and such l. The hair accessories in this game cost $10 which is 1 accessory for 3 -5 hairstyles. That's a rip off.

A very addicting, interesting game. The graphics are very real and there are hundreds of styles and brands to choose from. One problem is, it is very hard to budget your money. You get diamonds and tickets every day, which helps, but it is still hard to keep a good income. Otherwise, Covet Fashion is a great game, and I would definitely recommend it.

So the new GM for Covet has blatantly admitted that they are pandering to LCV/new players now. I have spent THOUSANDS on this game to get myself to hcv in 11mos and now I'm being screwed over for it? What kind of business favors new customers over established ones that spend the most money? These are the same players that have openly admitted to voting against us!

Love this game. Only thing I don't like is that when you buy something it only gives you one item. In the Design game it gives you several when you purchase an item. I find it hard to play this game bc I run out of money and diamonds too quick. If that aspect changed I would give it 5‚òÜ

descriptionHTML:
Show off your great style with Covet Fashion, the game for the shopping obsessed! Join millions of other fashionistas, discover clothing and brands you love, and get recognized for your style! Feed your shopping addiction and create outfits in this fashion game designed to hone your style skills. Express your unique style by shopping for fabulous items to fill your closet, putting together looks for different Style Challenges and voting on other players’ looks. Plus, win exclusive in-game prizes for looks that earn 4 stars or more!

SHOP THE BEST STYLES. We’ve partnered with brands like Calvin Klein, Rachel Zoe and Vince Camuto to bring you the latest fashions to obsess over. With over 175 brands to shop from you’re sure to discover styles you love.

STYLE THE PERFECT OUTFIT. Choose from thousands of glamorous clothing and accessory items in addition to chic hair and makeup styles on our new diverse array of models to create looks for various styling challenges such as photo shoots, cocktails and red carpet fittings.

VOTE ON WHO WORE IT BEST. Cast your vote and decide what’s hot on the Covet Fashion scene! Over hundreds of thousands of entries per styling challenge! Are other players’ looks 5-star worthy or did they miss the mark?

PLAY WITH FRIENDS. Want to get advice on your outfits or celebrate your wins? Join a Fashion House to make friends or connect to Facebook and chat about any and all things Covet Fashion.

Did you know you can shop your favorite Covet Fashion items in real life? All of the clothing and accessory items featured in the game link to places where you can buy them for your real-life closet. Not only can you discover new brands and trends, you can own them, too!

Download Covet Fashion now and start styling!

FOLLOW US
Instagram: instagram.com/covetfashion
Facebook: https://m.facebook.com/covetfashion
Twitter: https://twitter.com/CovetFashion
Pinterest: http://pinterest.com/covetfashion/

covethelp@crowdstar.com

Payments FAQ:
Does Covet Fashion allow in-app payments?
Covet Fashion is a free-to-play app, but like many apps in the App Store, there is the option of purchasing in-app items using real money. Turn off in-app purchases on your device if you’d like to disable this feature.

Privacy Policy: http://www.crowdstar.com/privacy
Terms of Service: http://www.crowdstar.com/tos
Acceptable Use Policy: http://www.crowdstar.com/aup

- This game requires an internet connection (WiFi or 3G) to play
