comments: I hate to say it but what I thought at first was a cool extra is now ruining the game. It's no longer competitive on skill, it's just about how much you are willing to pay to get upgrades which negates any skill involved. It's just a money grab. If you don't pay and upgrade you lose!  Simple as that. So if you want a game with skill this is no longer it. If you want a game to empty your wallet to feed your ego then this is the game for you!

Super glitchy!!! Love this game but I'm getting crazy annoyed!! Lost my lucky spins used one and it took 4 off me!!! The game has done this multiple times!! It needs to bed fixed, remove all the bloody adds.

Could you guys maybe cool it with the damn ads? I can't even navigate the menus now without a 60% chance of getting a 15 second video about some crappy game with "war", "clash" or "clans" in the title...  Other than that, the gameplay itself is ok. Aside from maybe the lowered necessity for Tetrises because of power-ups or the annoying-ass "some pieces are affected by gravity, but we won't point it which ones until you cause them to drop by attempting to set up your next move" mechanic.  Seriously though, those ads after EVERY GAME NOW are cancer on toast. Knock it off.
To many cheaters on the tournaments and no way to report them. Doesn't even make sense why they would cheat, it's obvious when you can watch the games. Spoils it so much for others

description: Get ready for the very big adventure with very small heroes! The sequel to the award-sometimes-winning-and-if-not-we're-just-happy-to-be-nominated Best Fiends! But it's nothing like that game! Except that it's got the same characters, and you're still beating up slugs. But it's a clicker adventure, which is different, and we think a lot of fun!* TRAVEL through the world of Minutia, beating up bad guys!* SLAP, COLLECT & LEVEL UP pretty much everything in the game!* LEARN MATH trying to understand how much damage you're doing!* LOSE TOUCH with your family and friends!* RECOMMEND it to people you don't like!Story: The Fiends finally made it to Mount Boom, only to be defeated and imprisoned in very similar boxes. Now it's time for YOU to turn the tables! Round up the old gang, level them up and defeat wave after wave of slugs as you make your way to the elusive villain behind the Slug Invasion!With the help of the Fiends, and the awesome reckoning power of Mount Boom, and the magical souvenirs that boost your strength, and whatever new stuff we come up with down the line, you'll save the world in no time. And then realize there's more to this game than even that! And then hate us for making a game you can't stop playing!And there's no energy mechanics, you can play it whenever you want, for as long as you want! Which is good, since you've obviously got some time on your hands if you bothered to read this far through the description. So get it already. Best Fiends FOREVER!-------------PLEASE rate Best Fiends Forever - Your feedback helps us make Best Fiends Forever the best game experience possible!Join more than 2,000,000+ people and counting in the Best Fiends community. descriptionHTML:
Get ready for the very big adventure with very small heroes! The sequel to the award-sometimes-winning-and-if-not-we're-just-happy-to-be-nominated Best Fiends! But it's nothing like that game! Except that it's got the same characters, and you're still beating up slugs. But it's a clicker adventure, which is different, and we think a lot of fun!

* TRAVEL through the world of Minutia, beating up bad guys!
* SLAP, COLLECT & LEVEL UP pretty much everything in the game!
* LEARN MATH trying to understand how much damage you're doing!
* LOSE TOUCH with your family and friends!
* RECOMMEND it to people you don't like!

Story: The Fiends finally made it to Mount Boom, only to be defeated and imprisoned in very similar boxes. Now it's time for YOU to turn the tables! Round up the old gang, level them up and defeat wave after wave of slugs as you make your way to the elusive villain behind the Slug Invasion!

With the help of the Fiends, and the awesome reckoning power of Mount Boom, and the magical souvenirs that boost your strength, and whatever new stuff we come up with down the line, you'll save the world in no time. And then realize there's more to this game than even that! And then hate us for making a game you can't stop playing!

And there's no energy mechanics, you can play it whenever you want, for as long as you want! Which is good, since you've obviously got some time on your hands if you bothered to read this far through the description. So get it already. Best Fiends FOREVER!

-------------

PLEASE rate Best Fiends Forever - Your feedback helps us make Best Fiends Forever the best game experience possible!
Join more than 2,000,000+ people and counting in the Best Fiends community. We love hearing your feedback, seeing your fan art (fanart@seriously.com) and fighting slugs together!

* Snapchat (snapchat.com/add/bestfiends)

comments: I used to play this game and it never gave me the option of saving before and it still doesn't. That was over a year ago. I love this game but when I had to get a new phone I had to start all over, so I didn't play for a long time. I just recently redownloaded it and it still doesn't have a save option. When are you going to change that? I play one of your other games and it has a save option. When are you going to give this game a save option because I have mentioned it before and nothing has changed. I want to keep playing but I would also like a Google play save option in case I have to get a new device.

This is a great app. It has great graphics and doesnt make up anything from the actual show like other games do. My little sister is just crazy for this game. She even pursuaded her friends to get this game! Amazing game, no flaws. Definetly worth 5 stars!

I like this game. But there's a bug. When I try to watch a video to play a mini game for free, the video freezes but the pop up ads don't freeze.... It doesn't make sense.  Why add pop up ads when we're already watching them for the free mini games.  At first I couldnt put this game down, I became addicted, but since the bug started to happen, I started to lose interest.

I'm not sure what happened but my game reset. What also stinks is my game used to be glitchy when I'd leave the game a day later and come on, not even two seconds passed in the game. If highly suggest to stay on online mode since that seems like the only mode that keeps time

This is bullcrap! This is the second time this game has all of a sudden stopped working and I cannot get back in to play. I am soo disappointed that you keep letting this happen!! I seriously could use some HELP!!! Please FIX this issuse immediately!!! I want to continue to play MLP... :'(

I will give this game 5 stars if u can get some help.  When ever I try to open my inbox to look at my shards or collect the hearts I have been sent,  my game just crashes. I've tried uninstalling and reinstalling the game,  playing offline,  clearing the cache data and almost everything else I can think of. Also when I try doing anything with twilight I can't do any tasks, plus I can't find twiligr either.  Please help me. I love this game. But I may stop because it keeps crashing

descriptionHTML:
Saddle up for fun friendship and adventure with all of the most popular ponies in Equestria in the free official game based on the phenomenal MLP TV show!
Only Twilight Sparkle -- the student of Princess Celestia -- and her friends Rainbow Dash, Fluttershy and the rest can save the day for every horse in the city as they farm resources, meet cute friends and reach for their dreams!
* OVER 300 CHARACTERS: Meet a royal prince or princess one day, a cute adventure-seeking horse the next day and who knows what the next! Give them places to stay, nibble on hay and hear what they have to say.
* SO MUCH TO EXPLORE: See the Crystal Empire, Canterlot, Sweet Apple Acres farm and more!
* MAKE A PRETTY PONY HOME: Beautify your MLP town and make it better than in any other city sims out there with cute houses, adorable decorations and enough magic for everypony that gallops by!
* FANTASTIC QUESTS: Go on adventures based on your favorite stories from the TV show, and confront villains such as Tirek, King Sombra, Nightmare Moon, the Changelings and more!
* MINI-GAMES: Play Ball Bounce with Twilight Sparkle, Magic Wings with Rainbow Dash, and get down with every horse in town in the Equestria Girls Dance games!
* CUSTOM FASHION: Give cute makeovers to turn any pony into a prince or princess pony with royal dresses and beautiful hairstyles featuring a rainbow of colors.
* FRIENDSHIP IS MAGIC: Interact with friends and compete in hoof-pounding events!
* REAL PONY VOICES: Enjoy the official voice talent from the show!
Perfect for fans of city-builder sims, free games or anyone who dreams of lounging on a pile of hay on the farm, surrounded by cute MLP horse friends such as Twilight Sparkle and Rainbow Dash, and becoming a royal prince or princess.
_____

You can download and play this game for free. Please be informed that it also allows you to play using virtual currency, which can be acquired as you progress through the game, or by deciding to watch certain advertisements, or by paying with real money. Purchases of virtual currency using real money are performed using a credit card, or other form of payment associated with your account, and are activated when you input your Google Play account password, without the need to re-enter your credit card number or PIN.
In-app purchases can be restricted by adjusting the authentication settings within your Play Store settings (Google Play Store Home > Settings > Require authentication for purchases) and setting up a password for each purchase / Every 30 minutes or Never.
Disabling password protection may result in unauthorized purchases. We strongly encourage you to keep password protection turned on if you have children or if others could have access to your device.
This game contains advertising for Gameloft’s products or some third parties which will redirect you to a third-party site. You can disable your device’s ad identifier being used for interest-based advertising in the settings menu of your device. This option can be found in the Settings app > Accounts (Personal) > Google > Ads (Settings and Privacy) > Opt out of interest-based ads.
Certain aspects of this game will require the player to connect to the Internet.
_____

description: The Tribez is not just a game where you build a farm! The Tribez is an adventure where you travel to a distant past full of secrets, mysteries, and many hours of addictive exploration of an unknown, but beautiful world!  You are invited to visit a primitive world inhabited by a peace-loving people, who have been hidden beyond a miles-deep portal from time immemorial. Build your own stone-age village, explore territorieshidden by mountains and seas, farm fertile lands, and lead your tribe, which considers you sent by the gods, to prosperity.  The Tribez is a world in which you feel alive!REVIEWS:‚ÄòThe Tribez‚Äô is the insanely popular empire-building game that‚Äôs revolutionizing the idea of social gaming.‚Äô (http://www.thedailybeast.com/) ‚ÄòThe design is so beautiful and there is so much detail that it's a real pleasure to navigate through the scenes and help the villagers.‚Äô (http://www.appszoom.com) ‚ÄòWhat makes The Tribez genuinely pleasant to play is the attention paid to the graphics.‚Äô (http://www.gamezebo.com)KEY FEATURES:‚úî This game works when you‚Äôre offline too ‚Äì play it on a plane, in the subway or in the car. Enjoy! ‚úî Simple, intuitive controls. ‚úî Adorable characters you‚Äôll love! Meet the farmer, the builder, the tax collector, and many others!‚úî A beautiful vibrant world you'll be immersed into instantly.‚úî Lively animations make the prehistoric world come to life. descriptionHTML:
The Tribez is not just a game where you build a farm! The Tribez is an adventure where you travel to a distant past full of secrets, mysteries, and many hours of addictive exploration of an unknown, but beautiful world! You are invited to visit a primitive world inhabited by a peace-loving people, who have been hidden beyond a miles-deep portal from time immemorial. Build your own stone-age village, explore territorieshidden by mountains and seas, farm fertile lands, and lead your tribe, which considers you sent by the gods, to prosperity. The Tribez is a world in which you feel alive!

REVIEWS:
‘The Tribez’ is the insanely popular empire-building game that’s revolutionizing the idea of social gaming.’ (http://www.thedailybeast.com/)
‘The design is so beautiful and there is so much detail that it's a real pleasure to navigate through the scenes and help the villagers.’ (http://www.appszoom.com)
‘What makes The Tribez genuinely pleasant to play is the attention paid to the graphics.’ (http://www.gamezebo.com)

KEY FEATURES:
✔ This game works when you’re offline too – play it on a plane, in the subway or in the car. Enjoy!
✔ Simple, intuitive controls.
✔ Adorable characters you’ll love! Meet the farmer, the builder, the tax collector, and many others!
✔ A beautiful vibrant world you'll be immersed into instantly.
✔ Lively animations make the prehistoric world come to life. You’ll be mesmerized by how the crops growon the farm and how the builders work on construction sites.
✔ Tons of items, characters, buildings, and decorations.
✔ Truly inexhaustible possibilities to develop your own stone-age empire by producing goods, increasingyour population, expanding your borders and attempting to farm the best lands.
✔ Hundreds of captivating quests: search for treasure and artifacts, discover distant islands, explore mysterious caves, grow unusual crops on your farm, and much, much more!

The game uses in-app purchases. In-app purchases can speed up gameplay.

recentChanges: ‚Ä¢ Your island has turned emerald green, which means it‚Äôs time for Spring Celebrations. Alas, the wicked leprechauns stole all the gold from your village! Find gold bars, build a Leprechaun Castle and get a Leprechaun Shop as a reward.

‚Ä¢ Soon you‚Äôll meet Tapi. Help her babies hatch, protect them from murlods, and help Tapi find a home on your island. Complete all the quests in time; you‚Äôll receive a generous reward and a Seeker's Hut to bring you valuable resources.
summary: Lead a village of tribezmen to prosperity and happiness!
title: The Tribez: Build a Village

comments: I absolutely love the story line and I've spent more on the game than I'd like to admit. But spending money doesn't really get you much farther because the energy goes so quickly. I think you would get far better reviews and more happy customers if you got rid of the energy system and upped the ads for more revenue from that standpoint. Then you could keep the micro transactions for the secret scenes. This way you'd still be making money,  but your customer retention would go up. I have so many ideas that would help this app out and I'd love to share them as I love this story. If you are interested in what I have to say please reply

I love the game. Wish we didnt have to pay for every secret scene and had a little bit more energies before having to wait for more or buy some. Would be great if we had more options for free energy. Love the story and characters. Hurry with season two already!!!  Im anxious to see further stories on ryan and the character Lol ‚ù§.

It's really a good game. It's awesome! But that energies are my main problem! Don't you think that...... only 300 energies that means only 30 lines are not enough and too little for a day..!?..!???!.. and 10 energies per line isn't too much!!??! Please make it down to 5 energies for each lines...and only for dialogues.. And if you give 500 or 100 energies (if 1 line cost 5 energies then there will be only 100 or 200 lines. Not much for a whole day!!!!!) and take 10 hours to get free energies again then the game will be perfect!! Everyone can't buy energies (including me)! You know! Please consider this case sympathetically.!.!..  I beg you.....!....

Lovely story line... love story that keeps you coming back everyday.... at times we are urged to buy energies.. however the energy provided gives sufficient dosage of the story each day... sad that it's going to get to the end...  And i wish I could go back and re read certain moments which is not possible.... apart from it.. this is amazing...

Great storylines!!! Great graphics!  However the energy to even do one chapter is way too low!!!  There should be more choices in filling up the energy.  Let your veiwers choose to watch more ad's or something similar to games where each day you can have one chapter and keep the secret moments as a paid option.  I myself would  have more of my friends play,share and even buy if the cost wasn't $100+ for ten chapters!  Oh and FYI check your editing just a few hiccups in a few clips.   Huge fan on the writer/authors...  Very steamy!! Sincerely JR

This game is misleading. You can only play the "secret scenes" if you pay, but the wording makes it sound like your choice so you keep playing in hopes you can see one. And the secret scenes I assume are the ones which actually push the relationship forward. The game staggers and is deeply misleading.

descriptionHTML:
Nu conteaza daca esti un jucator cu experienta sau un incepator, in Poker Romania asiguram o experienta reala pentru niveluri diferite! Joaca impreuna cu prietenii tai reali si impotriva a mii de jucatori conectati!

1. Aplicatie gratuita, poti juca deasemenea si prin intermediul contului tau de Facebook!
2. mese aseaza-te si porneste si turnee zilnice!
3 Mii de jucatori conectazi in fiecare zi!
4. Joaca impreuna cu prietenii si fati prieteni noi, aici!
5. Verifica unde joaca prietenii tai si alatura-te lor oricand!

Acest joc este destinat adultilor, pentru distractie si petrecerea timpului liber. Nu se castiga premii in bani reali in urma succesului in cadrul jocului, iar acest succes nu garanteaza rezultate similare si in cazul unui joc avand mize in bani reali.

comments: Really fun at fisrt, but after a month or two of playing planet shields become way to strong. Even with the dark matter bonuses and increased infectivity from your bacteria slots it takes too many attacks and nanos. The game desprately needs a way to penetrate shields, or reduce shield strength.

One of the best idle clickers out there, excellent progression and upgrade systems, lots of extra features that keep you playing. I played daily for about 60 days in a row. Got bored after the 3nd black hole for some reason.
How does one get the achievement No Time To Lose?  And, please fix the scrolling.  Whenever I scroll any list, it snaps back again. EDIT: The best I've seen of its kind.

The game is a decent enough time waster. However, when you begin getting into higher numbers the game breaks. I have over 100x the required about of bacteria to destroy a planet but it still says i can only take out 99.48%.  I have currently 75.528 oo bacteria and the planet Esloytis says it requires 47.310 nn bacteria to complete, but im at 99.7%. The numbers being dealt with are literally astronomical and unfathomable as a human, but following the progression of the game so far it would seem i have fathoms more bacteria than should be required.

I am not really happy with the new update... The colony prices have been increased... Now it would take even more time to collect the amount of bacteria needed to destroy a planet... Please change it back to its old colony costs... Overall, the game is awesome...

Good game, but $3.79 a month to remove ads? Most games have a one time payment to remove ads and it's usually less than that. Only $13 a month for World of Warcraft. There's SLIGHTLY better value for your dollar there.

descriptionHTML:
Welcome, Doctor! We've been waiting for you. Everything is prepared for you to take over and start cultivating bacteria to initiate BACTERIAL TAKEOVER!

We will start by taking over the smallest planets and move on to more difficult ones with a larger population and stronger infection resistance. We will need billions, trillions, quadrillion and even more bacteria to attack these planets. Which means your expertise in expanding and upgrading our bacterial colonies will be irreplaceable!

Build colonies, buy upgrades and generate bacteria on your own till you have enough to destroy planets and discover new powerful mutations! Remember that Plague is caused by the bacteria and it is our strength.

Bacterial Takeover is a mobile clicker and also idle game which allows you to become an evil genius that is set out to use biological weapons to destroy the whole Universe.

Main Features

- Explore universe and Destroy Planets
- Produce Nanobots and Bacteria
- Research Black Holes and Planets
- Evolve, Irradiate, and Mutate new Bacteria, overcome bacterial resistance
- Choose your Playstyle, a Tapping (clicking) or Idling
- Hoard Minerals, Gene Strands, Dark Matter and much more…

Join the community
https://www.facebook.com/bacterialTakeover/

Learn more
http://wiki.bacterialtakeover.com

description: In Asphalt 8, you‚Äôll race in some of the hottest, most high-performance dream machines ever created, from cars to bikes, taking them on a global tour of speed. From the blazing Nevada Desert to the tight turns of Tokyo, you‚Äôll find a world of challenge, excitement & arcade fun on your road to the top!REAL LUXURY DREAM CARS & MOTORCYCLES!‚Ä¢ Over 190 high-performance cars & bikes to drive & push beyond their limits.‚Ä¢ Top licensed manufacturers & models: the Lamborghini Veneno, Bugatti 16.4 Grand Sport Vitesse, Ferrari LaFerrari, McLaren P1, Porsche 911 GT3 RS, Ducati Monster 1200 & more, including a selection of racing motorbikes!‚Ä¢ Newly recorded high-fidelity motor sounds for realistic audio immersion.‚Ä¢ Customize & upgrade your rides with over 2,300 decals to take down opponents with style!GET AIRBORNE WITH ASPHALT 8‚Ä¢ Hit the ramps & take the race beyond the limits of physics, breaking free from gravity into the sky with a car or bike!‚Ä¢ Perform barrel rolls & wild 360¬∫ jumps to soar past your opponents.‚Ä¢ Maneuver through the air, pulling off insane stunts in your car or motorcycle to maximize your speed & find a fast route to the goal.EXOTIC NEW LOCATIONS‚Ä¢ Over 40 high-speed tracks in 16 different settings, such as Venice, French Guiana, Iceland, the Nevada Desert & other exciting locations to ride your car or bike across!‚Ä¢ Race any track you want in original mode or its mirror variation to ensure a fresh challenge in Career mode that‚Äôs sure to keep you on your toes.‚Ä¢ Discover plenty of shortcuts hidden throughout every location. Mastering them is sure to raise your game to the top of the competition!AN ENDLESS STREAM OF CONTENT FOR SPEED FREAKS!‚Ä¢ 9 seasons & over 400 events in Career mode, with plenty of challenges for even the most experienced car & motorcycle riders.‚Ä¢ Stunning visuals thanks to next-gen shaders, real-time geometry reflection & other amazing HD effects.‚Ä¢ Check out the Infected & Gate Drift modes for a fresh twist on racing.‚Ä¢ Win top prizes in the Limited-Time Cups, including early access to some of the latest cars in the game!‚Ä¢ A detailed damage system.THE ULTIMATE MULTIPLAYER RACING EXPERIENCE!‚Ä¢ Gear up for simultaneous multiplayer action for up to 8 real players!‚Ä¢ Multiplayer Seasons & Leagues! Race your best against other players to score points & unlock prizes in limited-time Racing Seasons.‚Ä¢ Dare friends to asynchronous races as you chase your rivals‚Äô ghost cars & bikes across the track.‚Ä¢ Compare scores on the new leaderboards with friends & rival riders around the world.‚Ä¢ Share your racing achievements & prove that you‚Äôre the ultimate speed machine.MUSIC TO REV YOUR SOUL‚Ä¢ A heart-thumping mix of amazing music licensed for Asphalt 8 to drive your need for fast arcade racing.CONTROL CUSTOMIZATION‚Ä¢ Rearrange your on-screen icons & controls however you like to customize & optimize your style of play. So, are you ready for a real HD stunt-racing experience? Can you handle the Ferrari, Mercedes, or Audi of your dreams, among dozens of high-octane motorcycles? descriptionHTML:
In Asphalt 8, you’ll race in some of the hottest, most high-performance dream machines ever created, from cars to bikes, taking them on a global tour of speed. From the blazing Nevada Desert to the tight turns of Tokyo, you’ll find a world of challenge, excitement & arcade fun on your road to the top!

REAL LUXURY DREAM CARS & MOTORCYCLES!
• Over 190 high-performance cars & bikes to drive & push beyond their limits.
• Top licensed manufacturers & models: the Lamborghini Veneno, Bugatti 16.4 Grand Sport Vitesse, Ferrari LaFerrari, McLaren P1, Porsche 911 GT3 RS, Ducati Monster 1200 & more, including a selection of racing motorbikes!
• Newly recorded high-fidelity motor sounds for realistic audio immersion.
• Customize & upgrade your rides with over 2,300 decals to take down opponents with style!

GET AIRBORNE WITH ASPHALT 8
• Hit the ramps & take the race beyond the limits of physics, breaking free from gravity into the sky with a car or bike!
• Perform barrel rolls & wild 360º jumps to soar past your opponents.
• Maneuver through the air, pulling off insane stunts in your car or motorcycle to maximize your speed & find a fast route to the goal.

EXOTIC NEW LOCATIONS
• Over 40 high-speed tracks in 16 different settings, such as Venice, French Guiana, Iceland, the Nevada Desert & other exciting locations to ride your car or bike across!
• Race any track you want in original mode or its mirror variation to ensure a fresh challenge in Career mode that’s sure to keep you on your toes.
• Discover plenty of shortcuts hidden throughout every location. Mastering them is sure to raise your game to the top of the competition!

AN ENDLESS STREAM OF CONTENT FOR SPEED FREAKS!
• 9 seasons & over 400 events in Career mode, with plenty of challenges for even the most experienced car & motorcycle riders.
• Stunning visuals thanks to next-gen shaders, real-time geometry reflection & other amazing HD effects.
• Check out the Infected & Gate Drift modes for a fresh twist on racing.
• Win top prizes in the Limited-Time Cups, including early access to some of the latest cars in the game!
• A detailed damage system.

THE ULTIMATE MULTIPLAYER RACING EXPERIENCE!
• Gear up for simultaneous multiplayer action for up to 8 real players!
• Multiplayer Seasons & Leagues! Race your best against other players to score points & unlock prizes in limited-time Racing Seasons.
• Dare friends to asynchronous races as you chase your rivals’ ghost cars & bikes across the track.
• Compare scores on the new leaderboards with friends & rival riders around the world.
• Share your racing achievements & prove that you’re the ultimate speed machine.

MUSIC TO REV YOUR SOUL
• A heart-thumping mix of amazing music licensed for Asphalt 8 to drive your need for fast arcade racing.

CONTROL CUSTOMIZATION
• Rearrange your on-screen icons & controls however you like to customize & optimize your style of play.

So, are you ready for a real HD stunt-racing experience? Can you handle the Ferrari, Mercedes, or Audi of your dreams, among dozens of high-octane motorcycles? Do you have an insatiable need for groundbreaking speed? Well, consider this your green light to go & download Asphalt 8, fast!

comments: This has a lot of potential. Connection issues are horrendous after this last update. Also, add a help section that explains what everything means. Lots of stats, numbers, ratings, etc. that we have to figure out on our own. Another thing, stopped receiving notifications after updating to Oreo.
Overall it's pretty fun and addicting.  My only real issue came up with today's update. My 40-rated team got matched to play against a 60-rated team in my first Challenge game. wut

The game was great until the update. Took my team from a 43 to a 41. Put alot of time into it, hope this gets worked out. They also nerfed training. Don't even bother wasting 15 coins on an extra session.

Update: ***500 coins for ~350k in game cash isnt even 1 rookie signing.... you can get 3 star players for that kind of coin. **** the latest updates have added cool new features like the coach analysis, fewer bugs and more consistency. The coach analysis function could be cool but every description is "this player is making great progress, keep pushing him!" Even for aging players who are getting worse as the seasons progress. It does however project where the player could trend stats wise.  Still no goalie stats. Still no trade options (not sure how that would wotk) but they added refunds to contracts you release from your roster which depend on the player and their contract value,  time remaining etc...  Would be cool to also be able to make in game adjustments, like if your star goalie is letting goal after goal slip through swapping goal tenders would be nice otherwise there doesn't really seem to be a point in having 2 goalies even on the roster.  Overall it's a Fun game with a LOT of potential, if you're a fan of hockey you should definitely give this a try. Would like to see some of these things as the game develops

Please fix how it automatically signs a new player if you don't renew a contract.. the purpose is to dump cap space and it signs some random player and then won't let me release him.  Also STOP changing my line ups. At any point any time ever. There's no need to change it or else you night as well play the game for me. I spend alot of time re doing them and then next thing I know every thing is changed. Not sure why or what causes it buy it is annoying as hell

Overall it is a decent game. However finding an opponent for the games especially the rank games sucks. Either you get another player who is far superior to you or another who is far below your level. It needs to be more equal to be fun.

comments: it's such a fun game I love it! only problem is you have wait about an hour to play the next chapter bc you need tickets for each chapter and u can't choose many outfits and hair styles without diamonds and you only get a few..... moral is you have to pay for tickets and diamonds to continued the story make some choices and change hair and clothes

Not worth it. The stories are TERRIFIC.  problem is you can only have 1 ticket per hour. If you wait 2 hours for 2 tickets your still going to get 1. The only way u could have more than 2 is if u purchase . So for that reason I'm installing sorry I can't wait that Long and sometimes I'm barely active and can only read 1 chapter is just not my thing.

It's alright. The stories are super good. But the GEMS üíé are sooooo bad!!! You get 20 or something to start with and you can't do anything exciting without having Gems. So I'm gonna uninstall because im sick of waiting for gems. If you didn't have the whole gem problem then this game would be amazing. PLEASE SORT IT OUTTTT!!! {then it would be 5 stars easily!}

This is a great game. But everytime I try to open the game it crashes. Not to mention I just bought lots of tickets to read the chapters and now I can't use them because the game keeps crashing. Either fix this or give me my money back.

To make your own choices.... You need gems!   Well too bad there's no way to get more free gems.  You get 1 gem for reading a chapter.  But that's not near enough to actually make the choices you want.  If that was fixed and you could get more free gems,  game would be more awesome

The stories can get a bit addicting. However, the tickets you need to read them are ridiculous. I can go to sleep, wake up, and only have one ticket. It says you can speed up to get another ticket by watching adds. That's OK. But I've watched so many adds and haven't received even one ticket for them. Honestly debating on deleting it. Seems like a big waste to have to wait so long. Especially when you like to read the stories. There's a couple apps that are better. And you can get further with. It seems the only way to actually enjoy this app the way I want to is to spend money to buy tickets. Why spend money when I can just open a book?

descriptionHTML:
Tend to your very own garden and unravel an exciting story in Family Yards: Memories Album - a casual match-3 game about family, making friends and exploding fruit bowls.

Help Alice and her family fix their garden, find the missing family pictures and restore their dream house. Solve challenging and fun match three puzzles to reveal more parts of your family garden, and then decorate them as you like! Collect hidden photos to complete the family album, meet and work together with fun-loving in-game characters, and unlock new boosters and quests.

What are you waiting for? Go on a gardening adventure and restore your beautiful family yard!

Game Features
✿ Hundreds of addictive match-3 levels: swap, match and crush all the fruit you want!
✿ Decorate the family garden to restore it to its original beauty!
✿ Explore different areas of the yards, each with its own unique look!

✿ Follow the story of Alice and her Grandparents and uncover the family secrets!
✿ Meet fun characters that will help you through the story!
✿ Invite your Facebook friends over to play in your yard!
✿ We also have a cute kitten to brighten your day!

NOTE: Family Yards: Memories Album is completely free to play, but some in-game items can be purchased for real money. You can switch off the in-game purchase option in device settings. You need an Internet connection to play this game.

comments: Wow, I thought some of the other reviewers might be exaggerating with the number of adverts. Three adverts before level one starts, one of them was a 30 second unskippale one. comments: I love this game. It's very dynamic and the gameplay is good too. The only problem I have is every single time I do PvP... It pairs me with an opponent far greater than what I can hope to beat. Sure, that's great for improving, but it disheartens me and makes me feel like a horrible player when I can't even beat ONE PvP opponent, ever, while playing the game. I would suggest to the devs that the matching system be a little more flexible when pairing. Give us a matching system that will actually give us lesser prepared players too so we can have the fun of winning, as well. Also, I am disconnected every single time I do PvP battles and bounties. Quite unstable, unfortunately.

Amazing shooter game, awesome hero collecting game, great multiplayer game. Definitely suggest that you at least try it out. But one thing you should look out for, it's pretty easy to sink between 5 and 20 dollars a week into this. Sometimes even 40 to 60. But, it's pretty free-to-play friendly if you can't afford to buy some gold.

I really like the game. It's fun and has enough activities and quests to keep you occupied for a while. My only complaint is how they match people up for the PVP missions. Sometimes you get matched up with people with far higher power and Team level menu which makes it nearly impossible to win. other than that I really enjoy the game

Super fun game. I haven't got bored of the game because there's always events going on which is good. One of the better if not the best shooting game I've played. I think there is a slight glitch when using Steele. Sometimes after I activate his open fire skill he doesn't shoot when I press the shoot button.

Latest update definitely made the game harder. I used to run 4 gauntlet levels with little issue but now I can't get through 1 without losing people. Resurrected characters are completely unwelcome and unfair in pvp when you tell on kills for money. Probably going to uninstall, you're welcome for the money Hothead

Starts off ok but then the pay walls creep in and you are constantly bombarded with prompts to spend money. The PVP is absolutely pointless, highest power rating wins every time without exception so you know if you've won or lost as soon as it picks an opponent. Needs a lot of work before I'd consider dropping any real money on it.

comments: I wasnt sure about this series at first, but it's really grown on me. The unique art style, interesting characters and immersive world make this an incredible game, especially considering it's a free mobile app! I would definitely love to see more sims like this in the future, (especially with the bad boy type). Seeing it transfer to desktop would be awesome! Overall, everything about this game is wonderful but, like everyone else says, the amount of energy given for free isn't enough! I think it would be wise to either lower the cost of energy actions take, give more free energy out, or split the story into parts in which 1 part can be played for free each day. Other than that it's a great sim!

My absolute favorite of all of the Is it Love games. Colin is an amazing character with an equally amazing backstory, and the way he connects with the MC is just incredible. The twists and turns in each chapter leave me craving more of the story. The energy they give you is somewhat lacking, but I'm used to it by now. Highly reccomend!

Really don't like how the guy treats the girl, what a scumbag! Plus I've been playing for over a week and the plot is unbelievably slow, the energy doesn't last long enough. There are much better otome style games out there.

Well the energy situation is beyond annoying. You only get very little for free and the prices for the energy and just WAY too expensive. I do like the story a lot though and will probably take 8 years to complete the story so I don't have to pay 50 bucks

OK, so I absolutely agree with everyone that the energy you get for free is nowhere near enough & packages are too expensive for what you get. I know, I've bought many. This story particular started bad, but now that I'm at the end, I'm hooked. Please continue to update. I have lots of bought energy going to waste!!

I don't really like the concept of earning energy every 24 hours. But I've got to say every time i see that message when my energy runs out. It leaves me on a cliffhanger and it keeps me in the story. Even if the energy wasn't there i would still play the game to my hearts content! Overall AMAZING story and characters!!

comments: Had to delete game due to ads popping up when I unlock phone.  If it wasn't for the ad issue, might played longer. It was getting tiresome going down to mine, a cave somewhere in the middle to find to restart a mission, then back to the top to smelt/craft. Then you have the auto mining platforms that are movable but one wrong touch and it resets.   Graphics were great.  There are other game like this, that don't spam ads during nongame play, that are equal or better
Hey wonderful game! Except that I might have broken it...killed the Amber Elder before crafting tesla coil.
its insane how much you have to pay for upgrading digging tools,, uninstallig it after a year playing, sad but true
Nice idle clicker. Nothing too hard or complicated. Just fun to login a couple times a day and waste 5 min of your time

Game takes longer and longer to load with every update: I'm at the point that I fire up the game and have to wait 10 minutes plus until I can actually play. Works fine after, but getting tiresome. As is the really pointless nuclear reactor that takes months to fuel for one short run. Weapon upgrades now stupid requirements - latest needs more obsidian than I've mined in over a year.... Get a grip on reality people!
I don't hate the game; however I have just wasted 40 gems for doubling resources farmed, but they did not double... please address this asap  Thanks
description: Deep Town is science fiction strategy game where you play as an AI, with a sole purpose to gather, construct, and replicate. DIG DEEPCrust of a planet is very deep, filled with different metals, gems and rare findings. A high tech digging system as yours, is capable of drilling through any rock, using tons of different techs like driller robots, cryogenic freezing techs, fire blasts and others, you name it! MAKE FACTORIESMake buildings, auto mine resources, smelt and forge metals, craft items, Build efficient factory pipelines, and sell things for profit!Build a world of your own, an underground town of steampunk minded bots.EXPLORE YOUR PLANETOne word - archeology. On your digging journey - find caves and send explorer bots to see what's inside, uncover the hidden story behind your planet's past, and answer the age long question - where are we?Deep town is a free indie game, and one of the best strategy games in your pocket with idle elements, and factory clicker one tap mechanics it could be the best miner or digger out there. We love to describe it as an Underground city builder of sorts. If you ever played digging games, this town clicker is for you!
descriptionHTML:
Deep Town is science fiction strategy game where you play as an AI, with a sole purpose to gather, construct, and replicate.

DIG DEEP

Crust of a planet is very deep, filled with different metals, gems and rare findings. A high tech digging system as yours, is capable of drilling through any rock, using tons of different techs like
driller robots, cryogenic freezing techs, fire blasts and others, you name it!

MAKE FACTORIES

Make buildings, auto mine resources, smelt and forge metals, craft items,
Build efficient factory pipelines, and sell things for profit!
Build a world of your own, an underground town of steampunk minded bots.

EXPLORE YOUR PLANET

One word - archeology. On your digging journey - find caves and send explorer bots to see what's inside, uncover the hidden story behind your planet's past, and answer the age long question - where are we?

Deep town is a free indie game, and one of the best strategy games in your pocket with idle elements, and factory clicker one tap mechanics it could be the best miner or digger out there. We love to describe it as an Underground city builder of sorts. If you ever played digging games, this town clicker is for you!

description: Found your own Motorcycle Club in Bloody Roads, California:Chopper, Biker and dirty streets, that is what awaits you in Bloody Roads, California. Found your own Motorcycle Club (MC) and drive around, terrifying the neighborhood and get the district under your control. In Bloody Roads, California you become a merciless outlaw, who not only loves his bike but loves having power as well. Play with strategic thinking and tactic to get the best out of the game and always be one step ahead of other players to reach your goals.Of bikers and outlaws ‚Äì the story:Back then, three years ago, I was making good business, mainly firearms. A bit of extortion, a couple girls. All on a pretty good scale. In those days, I had it all! But then I got too careless and the ATF raided my crib. Luckily, they didn‚Äôt have too much evidence against me. Still, that mess brought me three years in Rikers Island. During a yard exercise, a guy tried to knife the President of the Bastards of Hell MC. Usually, of course, the first rules in the slammer are: Don‚Äôt see, don‚Äôt listen, don‚Äôt tell. And most importantly, don‚Äôt get involved. But the MC guys were honest types. I guess that was why I didn‚Äôt just turn my head. Now the Club owed me. I guess I could a joined the MC, but I preferred doing my own thing. Still, the whole appearance of these guys really impressed me. Three years later I am finally a free man again and the clink did not tame me one bit. However, it is time to start something new. Ever since I can imagine I loved living my freedom on my chopper. My bike always was more to me than just a vehicle. So founding my own motorcycle club and painting the streets red with my fellas ever since felt natural. Together we keep the streets free of those who think can mess with us. That‚Äôs what you ought to do:Just out of jail and free again but with your own district now that you can manage from underground it is your duty to start your career as a gangster anew and found your own mc club. Your goal must be to expand the Motorcycle Club (MC) and rule the district with the help of your biker friends. Earn money, expand your influence and attack and rob other players in game. But watch out! The cops got their eyes everywhere so always remember to briber them and be sure that they keep their eyes shut and stay out of your business. With fortunes and tactic you‚Äôll be the king of the road and rule them with merciless severity.In game Features:Bloody Roads, California is a strategy and building game, that asks for strategic thinking, fortunes and tactic. These are the features you get in the game and that will keep you entertained and on the edge of your seat for hours.‚Ä¢	Found your very own MC‚Ä¢	Fight against bikers from other players in merciless streetwars‚Ä¢	Get onto your chopper and built up your own empire‚Ä¢	Earn money by running tattoo studios, bars and other establishments, to expand and built up your MC‚Ä¢	Train your bikers to keep your business going.‚Ä¢	Have a blast with this multiplayer strategy game
descriptionHTML:
Found your own Motorcycle Club in Bloody Roads, California:

Chopper, Biker and dirty streets, that is what awaits you in Bloody Roads, California. Found your own Motorcycle Club (MC) and drive around, terrifying the neighborhood and get the district under your control. In Bloody Roads, California you become a merciless outlaw, who not only loves his bike but loves having power as well. Play with strategic thinking and tactic to get the best out of the game and always be one step ahead of other players to reach your goals.


Of bikers and outlaws – the story:

Back then, three years ago, I was making good business, mainly firearms. A bit of extortion, a couple girls. All on a pretty good scale. In those days, I had it all! But then I got too careless and the ATF raided my crib. Luckily, they didn’t have too much evidence against me. Still, that mess brought me three years in Rikers Island. During a yard exercise, a guy tried to knife the President of the Bastards of Hell MC. Usually, of course, the first rules in the slammer are: Don’t see, don’t listen, don’t tell. And most importantly, don’t get involved. But the MC guys were honest types. I guess that was why I didn’t just turn my head. Now the Club owed me. I guess I could a joined the MC, but I preferred doing my own thing. Still, the whole appearance of these guys really impressed me.
Three years later I am finally a free man again and the clink did not tame me one bit. However, it is time to start something new. Ever since I can imagine I loved living my freedom on my chopper. My bike always was more to me than just a vehicle. So founding my own motorcycle club and painting the streets red with my fellas ever since felt natural. Together we keep the streets free of those who think can mess with us.


That’s what you ought to do:

Just out of jail and free again but with your own district now that you can manage from underground it is your duty to start your career as a gangster anew and found your own mc club. Your goal must be to expand the Motorcycle Club (MC) and rule the district with the help of your biker friends. Earn money, expand your influence and attack and rob other players in game. But watch out! The cops got their eyes everywhere so always remember to briber them and be sure that they keep their eyes shut and stay out of your business.
With fortunes and tactic you’ll be the king of the road and rule them with merciless severity.

In game Features:

Bloody Roads, California is a strategy and building game, that asks for strategic thinking, fortunes and tactic. These are the features you get in the game and that will keep you entertained and on the edge of your seat for hours.

• Found your very own MC
• Fight against bikers from other players in merciless streetwars
• Get onto your chopper and built up your own empire
• Earn money by running tattoo studios, bars and other establishments, to expand and built up your MC
• Train your bikers to keep your business going.
• Have a blast with this multiplayer strategy game

description: One of the most addictive and entertaining physics based driving games ever made! And it's free!Meet Newton Bill, the young aspiring uphill racer. He is about to embark on a journey that takes him to where no ride has ever been before. From Ragnarok to a Nuclear Plant, all places are a racing track to Bill. With little respect to the laws of physics, Bill will not rest until he has conquered the highest hills up on the moon! Face the challenges of unique hill climbing environments with many different cars. Gain bonuses from daring tricks and collect coins to upgrade your car and reach even higher distances. Watch out though - Bill's stout neck is not what it used to be when he was a kid! And his good old gasoline crematorium will easily run out of fuel.Features: - Lots of different vehicles with unique upgrades (many different vehicles: bike, truck, jeep, tank, etc.) - Tuneable parts include engine, suspension, tires and 4WD - Numerous stages with levels to reach in each (Countryside, Desert, Arctic and the Moon! +++) - Share your score with a screenshot with your friends! - Cool graphics and smooth physics simulation - Designed to look good on low resolution and high resolution devices (incl. tablets) - Real turbo sound when you upgrade your engine! - Garage mode: build and drive your dream vehicle with custom parts! - Get new boosters to drive even further - 27+ Levels! - 28+ Vehicles!Vehicles: jeep, motocross bike, monster truck, tractor, hippie van, onewheeler, quad bike, tourist bus, race car, police car, ambulance, fire truck, snow mobile, super offroad, and many more! Hill Climb Racing is free to play but there are optional in-app purchases available.Remember that we're always reading your feedback and are hard at work creating new vehicles, levels, features and of course fixing any issues you may find. So we'd really appreciate if you'd report what you like or dislike and any issues you may have with the game to support@fingersoft.net and please include your device make and model.Follow Us:* Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Fingersoft* Twitter: @fingersoft* Web: https://www.fingersoft.net* Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/hillclimbracing_officialTerms of Use: http://fingersoft.net/eulaPrivacy Policy: http://fingersoft.net/privacyHill Climb Racing is a registered trademark of Fingersoft Ltd. All rights reserved.
descriptionHTML:
One of the most addictive and entertaining physics based driving games ever made! And it's free!

Meet Newton Bill, the young aspiring uphill racer. He is about to embark on a journey that takes him to where no ride has ever been before. From Ragnarok to a Nuclear Plant, all places are a racing track to Bill. With little respect to the laws of physics, Bill will not rest until he has conquered the highest hills up on the moon!

Face the challenges of unique hill climbing environments with many different cars. Gain bonuses from daring tricks and collect coins to upgrade your car and reach even higher distances. Watch out though - Bill's stout neck is not what it used to be when he was a kid! And his good old gasoline crematorium will easily run out of fuel.

Features:
- Lots of different vehicles with unique upgrades (many different vehicles: bike, truck, jeep, tank, etc.)
- Tuneable parts include engine, suspension, tires and 4WD
- Numerous stages with levels to reach in each (Countryside, Desert, Arctic and the Moon! +++)
- Share your score with a screenshot with your friends!
- Cool graphics and smooth physics simulation
- Designed to look good on low resolution and high resolution devices (incl. tablets)
- Real turbo sound when you upgrade your engine!
- Garage mode: build and drive your dream vehicle with custom parts!
- Get new boosters to drive even further
- 27+ Levels!
- 28+ Vehicles!

Vehicles: jeep, motocross bike, monster truck, tractor, hippie van, onewheeler, quad bike, tourist bus, race car, police car, ambulance, fire truck, snow mobile, super offroad, and many more!

Hill Climb Racing is free to play but there are optional in-app purchases available.

Remember that we're always reading your feedback and are hard at work creating new vehicles, levels, features and of course fixing any issues you may find. So we'd really appreciate if you'd report what you like or dislike and any issues you may have with the game to support@fingersoft.net and please include your device make and model.

descriptionHTML:
The definitive high-definition FINAL FANTASY game for mobile phones!

Key Features:

■ A deep story and stunning visuals.
Experience an exciting story penned by Kazushige Nojima of FINAL FANTASY VII and FINAL FANTASY X fame, visualized with 3-D graphics never before seen in an RPG for mobile phones!
Each chapter release will be accompanied by grand in-game events adding new playable content and exciting customization items for your character!


■ A new and refined RPG turn-based battle.
Experience a new battle system specifically designed for mobile devices, creating highly tactical battles where each action flows into the next, chaining attacks and abilities in a rhythmic flow that brings destruction to your foes!


■ FINAL FANTASY's vaunted "Job System" returns.
Delve into a deep character customization system allowing for a near limitless number of combinations between job classes and specialized elemental abilities.
Choose your job, build your "deck," and destroy your enemies!



--------------------------------------

■Story: The Warrior of Light

Despair has cast a long, dark shadow across this land. The winds have stopped, the seas churn, and the earth rots.

The people await for a hero to appear—the hero foretold in an ancient prophecy: "When darkness shrouds the land, the Warrior of Light will come. Hope rides in his wake."

After a long journey across the Ether, castaways without pasts appear on the shores of Palamecia. One of them is destined to become the warrior of legend.

You stand among them.

Are you the hero whom the prophecy foretells?

--------------------------------------

■ Operating System
Android OS 4.0 or later

descriptionHTML:
You’ve seen the show, now live the life!

Become a glamorous celebrity and begin your exciting journey on the world’s most popular dance competition in 'Dancing With The Stars: The Official Game'! Play colorful match-3 puzzles to train gorgeous dance moves and top the leaderboard each week. Choose what sort of celebrity you want to be as you navigate the dazzling world of fashion, fame and fortune!

Combining popular match-3 gameplay with innovative features, 'Dancing With The Stars: The Official Game' will give you the dancing experience you’ve been waiting for.

- Addictive and sparkling Match-3 gameplay!
- Incredible and authentic dancing, just like on the show!
- Win beautiful prizes and build your wardrobe collection!
- Collect stunning and exotic dance dresses, and show off your unique fashion to your friends!
- Choose the path your celebrity will take with intriguing dilemmas!
- Compete in a weekly leaderboard, dancing your best moves in front of judges in the Live Show!

One of BBC Worldwide’s most popular global brands, Dancing with the Stars has been licensed to 52 countries, and a version of the show has been seen in over 75 countries, with over 250 series aired around the world to date - and now YOU can take part.

Follow us on social media:
Twitter: @dwtsthegame
Instagram: @dwtsthegame

comments: Fun, easy to play, complex to reach higher levels, this game has, so far, been great. No microtransactions (thus far) to continue playing, which is a huge plus. A few have stated a couple of bugs, which I agree with, adding only one other comment; I do wish their was an offline option for at least some gameplay. Online still necessary for a lot, but offline to run some dungeons. This could, in theory, help with some server space, as well.

This game is one of the best game I ever played in mobile. I love the graphic which is cute and there is so many content, so it's not boring. And another positive side, you can get the special currency easily in the game. It's not a p2w games ^^ but the sign board was one of the best micro transaction I've ever seen. Try it and you'll see.. it's a lot of fun ^^

I've been looking for a game like this for ages! I was a fan of Runestone Keeper and wanted something similar for my phone. These guys knocked it out of the park. I rarely spend money on phone games, but these guys deserve every penny and accolade coming their way. Fun and  simple, yet brilliant in execution and design. Tons of content already, and I can't wait to see what's next. Keep up the great work!

This game is so much fun! My only complaint is that the gear is gone when done with the maze, so you start it over. As well as "learning new titles". It gets kinda old having to start that over every time you beat a full maze. But that aside, this game is definitely addictive! Keep up the great work!

Your game is amazing. You guys are amazing. After everything you went through, you deserve these stars at the very least. Your game isn't pay to win, it's just a grand experience and I love it.  One of the BEST games on the market easily.  Keep up the good work, you're all doing fantastic.  Respect

I've been playing like nine months and it's very addictive you really grow and have many choices. It's truly free to play and gems are everywhere. Buying a signboard for real money is the best bang for your buck and a lizard if you feel like buying something else.  Totally recommend it. I only hate getting creator gumball is so expensive other than that it's a great game. It's a game that goes as fast or as slow as you feel like playing.

descriptionHTML:
Brand new Adventure & RPG game of 2018. FREE to Play Now! (Game for free)

DESCRIPTION
This is a mysterious adventure. How long can you survive during the unknown journey? Enter the Gumballs & Dungeons!Start off a great adventure with world wide players,lead your Swordsman,Demon Hunter,Mage and Death Knight to beat the Evil Dominator of the Erathia continent.

FEATURES
● Explore the Gumballs & Dungeons with world wide players,challenge friends and check leaderboards and achievements
● Experience more than 12 different game maps and hidden stages, including Magic Forest, Sage's Tower, Dracula's Castle, Skeleton Island ...
● Build and upgrade your GUMBALL Fleet,go to the celestial city, challenge world wide players and win resources to upgrade your fleet.
● Collect powerful new gumballs and upgrade existing ones,including Mage, Swordsman, Odin, Vampire,Zombie ...
● Upgrade your Alchemist Workshop which can produce coins and resources constantly

SUPPORT
Are you having problems? Visit http://qcplay.helpshift.com/a/gumballs-dungeons or https://www.facebook.com/gumballs.dungeons or contact us in game by going to Settings > Guide.

Forums & Guide:
English: https://goo.gl/ecChhs

Wiki:
http://gdmaze.wikia.com

http://rs.qcplay.com/html/Terms_of_service.html

It's necessary to use the below permissions:

RECORD_AUDIO
There is a 'Voice Chat' function in the game, this function allows users to send the voice messages to each other, so it's necessary to use the RECORD_AUDIO permission.
The video below shows how it works in the game:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KqNb75QXq8g&feature=youtu.be

GET_ACCOUNTS
In order to allow users to sign in the game with Google account, it's necessary to grant access to the GET_ACCOUNTS permission when signing in with google at the first time.

comments: The music is beautifully relaxing, but then you get blasted after every round with the ad music. Couldn't the music keep playing or have ads with no blaring music??? I am enjoying this relaxing, mind game however, I had to reset my phone and all my progress was lost...not cool! I've contacted the developers / company twice with no fix offered yet.üòîüòï Hoping to get an accommodation and a way to avoid this issue in the future!

This is a pretty awesome app which makes our mind to formulate words with the given letters. But many a times we come across words for which we are unaware of the meaning. If you guys can create a small block on the screen which displays the meaning of the last word created/accepted. Then this app will become an ultimate learning app or say vocabulary building app as well. Hoping to see the enhancement is sometime near future.

If I could give zero stars I would. This game was great to pass time and a good game for a brain teaser. But recently bought a new phone and even though I signed into Facebook it did not save me levels coins or anything else that I worked so hard to get. It reset me back to the beginning. So never buy a new phone if you don't want to start over.

I really enjoy playing. Addictive even my husband downloaded!  My only frustration is that myself an him paid for no ads however he seems to get perks such as extra random coins an i dont! Why?? The game is good but doesnt feel consistent for all.

The advertisement I saw for this game, WASNT EVEN THIS GAME. I downloaded it expecting a different time of word game, looked like a whole bunch of Scrabble word tiles lined up and you'd choose words. This game is nothing like that. Its ok, but very misleading advertisement and disappointed in that.

It's fun and cute. I like that it gets harder as you progress. Edit: March 17th, 2018. There was an ad after you completed a level and that was fine. That's how it was last night and usually the ads were quick. Now there is an add at the very bottom of your game which really makes it difficult to concentrate and you accidentally click it every time you shuffle your letters. This was 5 stars, but now it's going to have to be 3. That, to me, is very annoying and eventually I'll stop playing altogether as a result.

descriptionHTML:
Connect letters in a level and finish a word. So entertaining and totally for free!
You have surely played many word games and been invincible.
Now there is a completely new word link game waiting for you to take the challenge! Want to prove your skills?

Word Crossy combines word search and crossword style games. By Connecting letters, you get a complete word and fill it into a crossword blank. This is only the first step! If you want to win, you still need to find all the words hidden in the crossword. Challenge yourself and train your brain.

Feature:
- Easy to play and amusing, Connecting words to build a complete word.
- More than 300 levels and multiple words to search for.
- Crossword style to make the game experience even more interesting.
- The degree of difficulty increasing according to player’s progress.
- No time limits.
- Letters redraw and useful hints when needed.
- Beautiful visual experience.

How do I play?
- Connect the letters on the wheel to get a correct word.
- Find all the words and fill in the crossword blanks.

Play Word Crossy to train your brain, let your free time be more fun!

NOTES
• "Word Crossy" is free to play, but you can purchase In-app items like coins.

comments: This game has a great support department, they try their best to resolve all issues that come up in the game quickly.  I love playing this game it has some of the most fantantic story lines and great graphics.  Again I would like to thank all the staff at My Tona makers of Seekers Notes and especially Amy Smith for all her help. Trina   P.S. I would like for the makers of the game to make the COINS available towards the purchase of RUBIES - either at the bank or in TRADE at one of the shops, I have $2,509,310.00 at this time and still accumulating, I never use that much at the shops.

Deceptively simple it's very enjoyable and a little addictive. Challenging enough to keep me interested it can be a little frustrating that is not as generous as it could be with producing items needed but it's not so slow to produce as to put me off. Love the challenges and find the interaction with friends is simple. After the most recent update I noted a lot of complaints but these all seem to have been addressed by the developers.
Only just got going on the game and so far it's a pleasant way to pass the time. I'm guessing it could end up costing a bit as some items are so hard to find!

Love this game! Updates are just frequent enough that I can complete the missions before the next update without getting behind or waiting too long for the next update. Also good about listening to feedback
Need tutorials more often during the game for fuller enjoyment.
Great game. Love the variety and challenges.

comments: Notifications about attacking won't show even not showing in the comm if enemy destroy portal! Fix that servers!
Fielding feels like solving an NP-hard problem.

I live in a rural area and found that that you have opened portal submission only for good level players. I can't level up because there are no portals near me so the open portal recon is just useless. The closest portal is 14kms away. What to do ? I feel to delete the game or go gps spoofing .That's the last option left for players like us.

You can totally ignore all of the sci-fi background story since it is irrelevant to the game play. Loved playing for awhile, but you soon realize that it is the same people doing the same things to the same landmarks (portals) on a daily basis, so the game becomes not one of skill or ability, but of seeing who can outlast the others or who can spend the most money on gas (or in one case, renting a private plane). If you have 3 or 4 hours of daily free time and don't get bored easily, this is a game you might enjoy.

Wow, shocking. As I play pokemon go casually I figured I'd give this a try. What a joke, layout is all muffed up, options which should be selectable can't be selected because all the text is overlapping. The design also doesn't look particularly interesting.

descriptionHTML:
✮ Winner of the Grand Prize at the 2015 Japanese Media Arts Festival

Ingress transforms the real world into the landscape for a global game of mystery, intrigue, and competition.

Our future is at stake. You must choose a side.

A mysterious energy has been unearthed by a team of scientists in Europe. The origin and purpose of this force is unknown, but some researchers believe it is influencing the way we think. We must control it or it will control us.

“The Enlightened” seek to embrace the power that this energy may bestow upon us. “The Resistance” struggle to defend, and protect what’s left of our humanity.

Install Ingress and transform your world.

The World is the Game
Move through the real world using your Android device and the Ingress app to discover and tap sources of this mysterious energy. Acquire objects to aid in your quest, deploy tech to capture territory, and ally with other players to advance the cause of the Enlightened or the Resistance.

Strategy
The struggle is being played out globally. Track the progress of players around the world, plan your next steps, and communicate with others using an Intelligence map.

What is the Niantic Project?
Is this just a game? An Investigation Board (http://www.google.com/+NianticProject) filled with cryptic clues and secret codes awaits. The story evolves everyday. Powerful secrets and game tech are there to be unlocked.

Form Alliances
The struggle to save the planet spans the entire world. Groups of people acting together can be more effective than individuals acting alone. Cooperation across neighborhoods, cities, and countries will be needed to achieve the ultimate victory.

Note: Ingress uses the "Read_Contacts" app permission to make it easier to invite your friends to join you in your mission to save the world. The app will not contact anyone without your explicit action to recruit a particular friend.

Join the investigation
G+: http://www.google.com/+Ingress
Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/Ingress
Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/Ingress
Help Center: https://ingresshelp.zendesk.com

descriptionHTML:
Match sugar candies and swap rainbow drops to master this fun and challenging match-3 puzzle adventure inspired by THE BOOK OF LIFE!

Travel through DOZENS of fantastical worlds and conquer HUNDREDS of puzzle challenges! Compete and play with your friends! Download now today!

We interrupt this product description with breaking news: Book of Life has gone COCO LOCO for Dia de Los Muertos!

Goodbye beanie babies and so long fidget spinners – coconut shells are the latest craze, and they’re sweeping the citizens of San Angel into a tizzy of coco creations! Everywhere you look, residents are crafting spooky skulls out of coconut shells in preparation for Dia de los Muertos.

Sold-out grocers hang signs in their windows reading, "NO MO' COCO!" and tropical beaches have been picked clean of their natural coconut supply. It's safe to say that Mexico is loco for coco! Local hero Manolo Sánchez even posted a DIY tutorial on his blog yesterday for "Coco con Cocoa" a chocolate-y twist on this skeletal sensation.

Stay tuned as this story develops! We now return you to your regularly scheduled product description.

comments: More and more focus on pay to win and the 4th weapon, the distance weapon makes it too complex and disturbing. In particular the boomerangs because there are almost no chances to avoid a hit. In unequal battles the inferior just got an extra disadvantage --> no David vs goliath anymore possible. It sucks

This is the worst chapter or update in  the game.. when I saw notification of the update I was very excited but when I opened this game the main quest was insane difficulty so I started side quest which was easy difficulty, but it was not for me it was easy for the enemy.. I played that more than 10 times but I didn't win 2 rounds so I just came here and wrote this review... And if you think I'm a noob.. then yes I am but only in this chapter not in previous ones..

At first look it didn't mesmerise me, but after 2-3 matches I feel in love with it! It is awesome and has tons of weapons and other stuffs. The multiplayer option is also great and chest opening is such a treat. One worry is that the weapon below the primary weapon is still locked (why I don't know), otherwise the game is superb. Graphics are top notch and fighting doesn't come more realistic than that!

I have been playing SF3 for quite a long time til now and I just got a problem with one side mission. It was the "Head hit only" with an Accused. I play as the judge and all. However, when I hit him like a combos of headhits, it didnt hurt him at all. It is like he became invincible. Anyway, I love everything of SF3. The storyline, gameplay, graphic and so on, they are all great. And I hope you would fix that one single problem of mine along with others who have the problem of crashing as I had read the comments. That is all for me. Keep up the good work, Nekki.

After the latest update, in side quest - wasteland I won twice both the times the game hung up but when the opponent wins it moves through to next easily. I can attach the screen shot of wanted.. kindly fix this it's frustrating  Now for the third time this has happened gonna uninstall the game bye

Again I played that mission and after defeating the game stucked again. The same thing happened 5 times in a row. Very much Dissapointed.
description: Step into the world of shadows at the time of changes. Reveal all its dark secrets and become the greatest warrior this land has ever seen. In this RPG-fighting game you will take on a role of a hero whose destiny isn't determined yet. How do you see the future? It's your call! Choose from three different fighting styles, experiment, combine your gear, learn some fresh new moves and explore a massive world full of adventures! Enjoy the beauty of a real fight which has been made possible due to modern technologies and smooth animations. CREATE YOUR OWN FIGHTING STYLE Shadow Fight 3 offers you 3 unique fighting styles to choose from. Collect new moves, perks, weapons, gear and combine them in the way YOU like it. Be fast and graceful, strong and shattering, enigmatic and deadly. Raise a character that will represent your distinctive playing technique and personality. AT THE EDGE OF TECHNOLOGY Shadow Fight 3 brings the fighting genre to a whole new technological level. Colorful graphics, smooth animations, realistic physics and effects create a picture of a living and breathing world you've never seen before!  DEEP AND IMMERSIVE STORYLINE Shadow Fight 3 is a story-driven game. You'll find yourself in a dangerous world that is on the threshold of a great war with you in the middle. Three powerful factions are tearing these lands apart and plotting against each other. Which side would you choose? You decide! MANAGE YOUR GEAR COLLECTION. There's large amount of weapons and armor in Shadow Fight 3. If you've ever dreamed of having a rare collection of war goods, now's your time! The world of shadows has got splendid rewards for the most adventurous ones! Collect epic gear, combine and upgrade it, equip it with new lethal moves and perks. Fight your enemy with style! It is all limited by your imagination only. Shadow Fight 3 in a nutshell: - Smooth animations and lifelike physics- Spectacular SHADOW-based fighting mechanics- Lots of gear and weapons to collect- Gorgeous visuals- Three unique factions and fighting styles- Hundreds of perks and supermoves- Character creation tool- Diverse fighting modes

description: Monster Busters is a fun match-3 puzzle game for all ages. Match same colored monsters to save the gingerbread cookie friends! Enjoy each and every stage with entertaining challenges.Install the best match-3 puzzle game to your mobile device & start the adventure today!  Be a Hero to Save Your Friends Anyone could be a hero saving the gingerbread friends captured in the monster tower. Not so scary but actually cute-looking monsters have taken away your friends while they were playing with you! No worries though cause they‚Äôve got a brave friends to save them. And it‚Äôs you! Let‚Äôs go climb up the monster tower to find your friends back. Play with Your Loving OnesA game for all ages you can play with your grandmother, father, children, of course your friends, and all other loving ones. Play and talk about Monster Busters while you‚Äôre spending time together. Not only that you can meet with new friends from all over the world! descriptionHTML:
Monster Busters is a fun match-3 puzzle game for all ages. Match same colored monsters to save the gingerbread cookie friends! Enjoy each and every stage with entertaining challenges.
Install the best match-3 puzzle game to your mobile device & start the adventure today!


Be a Hero to Save Your Friends

Anyone could be a hero saving the gingerbread friends captured in the monster tower. Not so scary but actually cute-looking monsters have taken away your friends while they were playing with you! No worries though cause they’ve got a brave friends to save them. And it’s you! Let’s go climb up the monster tower to find your friends back.


Play with Your Loving Ones

A game for all ages you can play with your grandmother, father, children, of course your friends, and all other loving ones. Play and talk about Monster Busters while you’re spending time together. Not only that you can meet with new friends from all over the world!


All Alive Characters

You can see your own avatar move up and down the monster tower, and unlike most other games, even the characters you’re fighting against are all alive to add up the extra fun and lively energy in game. It’s very unique and fun finding your own strategy for each character to win the missions too! Missions that are challenging but absolutely doable.

descriptionHTML:
**** The future of science fiction themed card games has come to the Google Store! Download Clone Evolution to begin commanding your army of clones today!
【Game background】
It’s the year 2045 and on the boderland of South America’s Atacama Desert, a team of expert scientists under the command of the evil F-Tec are presenting their findings of a series of never seen before biological experiments to senior F-Tec officials.
Within the capsule surrounded by the crowd, stands a familiar figure, a clone comprised of the strongest genes ever synthesized in the history of cloning. As the onlookers stare intently, the eyes of the figure inside slowly begin to open…
The news of F-Tec’s success in developing this threat to mankind has now spread to all corners of the world. Fortunately, a former F-Tec scientist has been working from the inside to uncover this conspiracy and has all the evidence he needs to conduct his own research and develop the means to defeat the clones and to resist the company’s evil plan.

【Game features】
● Intelligent auto system: Free up your hands and enjoy the fun as the system takes the strain
As progress continues in the background, put your trust in the game to receive rewards, train your clones and develop your legion on your behalf, even when you’re away from the game!

● Gene cloning: The most comprehensive gene bank in the universe is ready for you to explore and utilize
Clone Evolution’s unique gene pool contains six attributes and more than a hundred genes of numerous historical heroes including Alexander and Pharaohs who are eager to do battle.

● Multi-line development: Equip for clones with chips from our dual system
