comments: This game is good and the story was interesting. The reason why i give three stars is because the magic challenges sometimes need to consume lots coins or lunes. And everytime there is new event which need to collect bonbon... It is teally hard to collect it and instead we need to buy... i know this game is free for both pay to play and free to play... but all i see is pay to play since the bonbons need to buy and sometimes events that come back by popular demand also consume lots of money.... I actually liked this game but since you made this game really.... i had to give only 3 stars since the game had to use mk ey A LOT....

Rather then an actual chapter as in some other games, game play is only a page in a normal book if you are lucky. I love the story lines but I would actually love to read the story and not be teased with a tiny blurb of the chapter instead. Maybe if the chapters were longer and worth buying tickets for I would actually spend more money on this game bc it's very cute.   Trying to play threw the stories are so annoying! You need sooooooooo many story tickets! The chapters should be longer per ticket.. it takes like 15 tickets to get threw a chapter! The only good part is u get 5 a day unless u buy more.... please make the chapter length longer per a ticket :( I'd like to actually read a story..

I loved it , it is so addicting and the characters are gorgeous, but it is way too short. I find myself paying fake money from the game to buy tickets just to know what happens next! You might actually fall in love with the characters! That's how amazing it is!

This is my favorite app and has been for almost a year. The only problem now is the adds they can get very frustrating and angering. I do put a lot of money into this game and wish you would consider taking away the adds per player after they put so much money into the game.

I adore this game, I've almost had it for a year now. I chose Klaus and I am head over heels in love with him. I enjoy playing a little bit of his story everyday. The artwork is just beautiful as is the story. It's well written and interesting. However, there's one thing that really upsets me and that's the in game currency,  coins. They're incredibly difficult to acquire. Yes, there's the "free coins" but unless you want to spend actual money(which you're trying to avoid obv). The free options that take the least amount of time only give you 7 or 9 coins so good luck with that. Honestly, this game would truly be a 5 star gem if that was fixed. At least bump it up from 7 to 100 and make the offers that cost money actually work. I just did one(it was for a 1$ basically) and didn't get it. Otherwise, thanks for an absolute gem of a game c:

This used to be my favorite Solmare game, but the pop-up ads have ruined it. They can pop open at anytime, playing loud music and ruining the experience. When they pop up, I usually just end up closing the app, no matter what I was in the middle of because they are so annoying. I will probably end up uninstalling this app because of them.  If this was not an issue, it would be a 5 STAR game.

You are a vampire hunter who is about to head to Idra Forest with your partner wolf.
The forest is believed to be where the vampire castle is.
Your mission is to visit this castle in order to save the village people.
Can you complete the mission without being consumed by vampires?



You are a witch who is led to Idra Forest by a mysteriously beautiful melody.
You soon find yourself at a hotel named Libra Sincera, where you are turned into a vampire.
A black cat comes to tell you that you have only 10 days to find the rose garden, whose roses can turn you back to human.
What's their motives? And can you go back to your normal life?

＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿

comments: I enjoy this lifetime favorite with people worldwide, and Uno Dare is my most favorite mode. I understand it will be discontinued in June and I wish it wasn't so.    ...Hey Uno & Friends, could you please not ask me to rate an app I've already rated??? I was asked to read it again and then I came back to find I had made that specific request not to ask me to re-rate something. Your app needs to be reprogrammed so it knows if someone has rated it or not. (sigh)

Tokens take too long to refill. Level up gives a few coins, why not a token refill? Tournament champion gets 4 tokens. 7 tokens for a day? Cheapskates! When do you want us to play, every 5 days? So cheap in giving prizes, guessing you want us to buy eh? I'll give myself a few weeks playing this game and am out. No daily prize wheel, just a daily "less than 20 coins" reward. Sooooooo cheap!

It's just ok.  Hard to see your entire hand at times and some of the rules are different than the actual UNO game itself. When I contacted this apps tech support, they sounded as if they could care less and said they will not be making any changes to the game.  So I play until they want me to buy credits then I stop.  When they give me more free credits I play again.  I like the game UNO, just not this one so much.  Why do I still play?  Hmmm, that's a good question.

Greatest game ever~~¬§mean it.  The Updated game even better.  Need to be easier to play with Friends that you JUST made ~~maybe REPLAY!!!  üò¨ üò≤ üò† üòê üò≠  Friends where are you? Great for tablets.   I am UNO happy . Happy New years  .Oh don't terminate the game unless you just have to, I well try finding something other to do. Nothing Good ever lasts anyway.   Thanks for reading.  UNO POWER.

LOVE! Please DO NOT end the game! This app is perfect all the way around. Best card game app ever. SOOO many people are gonna be upset if you take it down, so leave it up! These uno players are ready to rock this app! You will never not have people playing. It would be kind of cool if you could create your own avatar though.. & pick outfits and such. Not necessary, but a fun little quirk (:

Classic UNO with a couple of modern twists and turns. I have never spent any real money in a game and I don't ever plan to, but here you also don't really need to. I've won many tournaments and got really far in the game without buying anything. You get extra coins by winning and completing daily tasks, as well as watching ads. But you're not forced to watch them. It's not just about luck. You have to play smart to win, just like any other card game. I love it.

descriptionHTML:
70 million players around the world play the game in 15 languages.

A friendly zombie falls in love with a girl and sets off in search for Zombium to become a Human.

The world of zombies is vast, bright, and full of funny characters. Explore magnificent islands and make your way through the thickets to take a step closer to solving the Zombie’s secret. Grow unusual plants, fruits, and flowers to cook Zombium. Construct world famous buildings, complete tasks, and decorate your island to become a Human and find your Love.

In the game you’ll find various zombie-workers helping you clear the island and build a town, such as woodcutters, stoneminers, fishermen, treasure hunters and cooks. You'll be able to harvest dozens of unique plants and make terrific potions. You can travel to different islands in search of new treasures in order to reach the Ancestors’ Land, become a Human, and then return to the city of people and find your Love.

Follow us on our official Facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/ZombieCastaways/

Terms of Use: http://vizor-interactive.com/documents/zc_mobile/eula_googleplay.html

descriptionHTML:
Ad free version of Wordfeud with statistics.

Play against 30 million opponents!

Wordfeud is a multiplayer puzzle game where you can challenge friends and random opponents and play in up to 30 separate games simultaneously!

Create and place words on the 15 by 15 tile board and earn points for creativity and placing letters on the high scoring Double Letter, Double Word, Triple Letter and Triple Word tiles.

Search for friends to play against or allow Wordfeud to match you up with an opponent. Even chat with them - smack talk or praise - it's your choice!

Tired of the same standard board each game? Choose the option to randomize the board and change up where the DL, TL, DW, TW tiles are placed - giving the classic game a new twist!

Features:
- Choose to play with friends or be matched up against random opponents
- Play in 30 simultaneous games!
- Random board option to mix up the DL, DW, TL, TW tiles
- Push notifications informing you of opponent's latest move
- Uses English, German, Spanish, Portuguese, French, Dutch, Norwegian, Swedish, Danish and Finnish dictionaries
- Chat with your opponents

For more information on Wordfeud, visit us at Wordfeud.com and follow on Twitter @wordfeud. Also check out the Facebook fan page at http://www.facebook.com/WordfeudGame

comments: This game is so lopsided. Long losing streaks. Waiting for 1 card to make a good meld, meanwhile my opponent is pulling them out right and left. I can be 2 points away from winning and they just pull 2 melds out of their hat for a win. Uninstalling! Make your game fun.

So... if this isn't a scam... how can I quit a game before it's over and immediately be paired with the same opponent. Every time I've had an opponent drop out, it takes a few seconds to notify me they left the game. Every day a new reason to NOT pay a cent for this fraud. I play out of sheer boredom.

Players with higher ranks should not be able to play  against players that are lower rank with less experience. Plus the ring challenge if you don't reach  the 30000 you should get the amount that it stops on, instead of 1000 points.

Want to love this game, but it just constantly cheats!! It would be more enjoyable if you could have so many free plays per log in to just enjoy some play, like other games do. Instead you run out of gems right away after being cheated out of one or two games, which really stinks!!  I'm not paying through the nose just to enjoy playing a game. You are too greedy and a big fat CHEAT King and it has really disappointed me, because the game would be great fun if I could actually play it!!!

Uninstalling...too many hiccups! Costs too much too play a simple game of cards. This game is all about making a lot of money for 'King' corporation. Can't really say anything nice about this game. Pretty much agree with the reviews. (didn't even have installed for 24 hrs.)

I agree with the cheating and everything everyone else is talking about, but I also have a problem with the automatic card shuffle in the middle of your turn. Wait for the players turn to end, then shuffle.  I have lost several games because of this.  I now have a 3 lose rule because of the way this game messes with you and then I'm out and won't play for days or weeks, because I refuse to pay for a game that cheats.

descriptionHTML:
Play the traditional card game rummy with a multiplayer twist for mobile. Set over the rooftops of 1920’s London and hosted by a group of cats, we want you to join our club and play the world at cards!

Make your way through the card clubs of Lucky Lane and play against opponents from all over the world, in this brand new live player versus player game!

There’s no closing time, it's never too late and we’re always open for business with special live events over the weekends – download now for free, and play the world at cards with Shuffle Cats!


Shuffle Cats features:
· The classic card game updated for bite-sized fun on the go!
· Live, multiplayer games with people from around the world!
· Unlock new and exciting challenges that offer inventive ways to play.
· Boost your play by using Lucky Charms against your opponent.
· Intuitive and highly polished - card games never looked so good!
· Lighthearted interaction with other players, using fun chats and live card movement.
· Easily sync your progress between your phone and tablet devices.

If you love playing Candy Crush Soda Saga or Farm Heroes Saga or you love classic card games like rummy, whist and solitaire, download Shuffle Cats now and discover an exciting new way to play card games for free on your mobile!

Visit https://care.king.com/ if you need help!

Shuffle Cats does not offer “real money gambling” or an opportunity to win real money or prizes. Practice or success at social gaming does not imply future success at “real money gambling”. Internet connection required. Shuffle Cats is completely free to play but some optional in-game items will require payment.

You can turn off the payment feature by disabling in-app purchases in your device’s settings.

By downloading this game you are agreeing to our terms of service; http://about.king.com/consumer-terms/terms

Finally, a big thank you to everyone playing Shuffle Cats! See you on the rooftops!

comments: Fantastic game.I am loving this game. Still there is few problem.Miniclips please solve the issues. After players matching ,game is hacked/stopped by several times.Only way to win that kind of match,any of one player has to quit or network issues.Its waste of time,also harm for devices (battery drainage,high heating). So,admin plz look after these prob.Why it's hanging or hacking.

As football based game it is superb, in terms of gameplay, graphics etc. But the biggest idiotic part of this game is that if freezes like magic. The whole game main screen becomes unresponsive and stays like that no matters the game is restarted or the damn phone is. Get this thing sorted out Miniclip. You have a reputation to maintain or not?

Could you please enable the user to save his progress in a Gmail account??  So that, when you lost or change your phone, you can recover the level and progress you had before instead of restarting from the beginning!!!!!!!!!!!!   If you could allow more media for sharing the game, it would be better, Facebook is not the only social media!!   And sometimes, it bugs!! Sometimes, the game is very slow and causes you to lose. Indeed, you shoot but the ball goes after many seconds even though the connexion is good!! Consequently you loose against a weak player, And this makes very angry!!!   Should those problems fixed, I will rate 5 stars.

I think this game is a really fun addicting game. The main reason why I got it was because of 8 ball pool. That game is also very fun. The only thing I don't like about football strike is that when I get on sometimes it won't let me click the spinner. So it's like my phone froze. But my phone didn't freeze. It's just the app. So can you guys please fix this.

At first I was skeptical about this game. I had downloaded it and went without playing for a couple of weeks. Then,one day I just happen to open the app and play. Best move I ever made for an app! This game is just flat out addicting, fun and challenging.  I was pleasantly surprised about how much fun it is and that there is, most of the time, something new.  Chalkenign friends and new people always makes for a challenging and fun time waster. Even if I don't have the time to play, I still make time!! Haha

There is a bug in your game I went first of my league, supposingly I am entitled to 350 cash, but it wasn't there.  How could you make it so unfair for someone. Why bother having a prizes if not given to the right person.

descriptionHTML:
You’ve never played a football game like this before. Take on your friends in multiplayer free-kick face-offs, or make a name for yourself in the Career Mode!

Challenge the world across different online game modes! Hit the targets in a fast-paced, time-limited battle for points in Shooting Race mode, or take turns as both striker and goalkeeper in the one-on-one Free Kick mode!

Customise your striker and goalkeeper with tons of unlockable items! Show off your style or represent your team’s colours!

Take on Career mode, travelling through different stadiums around the globe and taking on unique soccer challenges to unlock medals!

With simple, fast gameplay, Football Strike is easy to play and offers endless competitive football fun!

KEY FEATURES:

• Take your shot and make amazing saves, all with the flick of the finger!
• Play online in Shooting Race and Free Kick modes!
• Play against friends or challenge players from across the world!
• Represent your favourite team! Play as FC Barcelona, Borussia Dortmund, FC Zenit, FC Schalke 04 and more!

comments: So I love the app but in free mode it will let you play.missions.. In a couple of the missions I have noticed it has given me 200 passengers to bring to a airplane boat (forgot what its called) and you cannot land a plane big enough for 200 passengers on it! No room to land without the wing getting clipped off by the tower and no place to take off from it! Other than that it is an awesome game

A really good game to play if your board and have nothing to do. Its proberly one of the best flight simulators on mobile devices ive ever played. The graphics are acctually really good for a mobile game that runs smoothly. The controles can somtimes be wonky but youll get used to it. I love to play this game i really enjoy. The best thing about it is that, its FREE! Good job 'fun games for free' üëèüëåüñí‚ò∫

Was able to start playing right away because of the level of simplicity and yet you have to learn so you can challenge yourself in the more advanced campaigns that soon come up. The game will leave you finding out that a couple of hours has passed in a blink of an eye because of the fun you're having. I really just started the game so I will come back and update this in a few months as I advance in the game.

I've been losing sleep for days now playing this incredible game. Hahaha! Great graphics, smooth controls, realistic sounds, and easy-to-navigate interface. It doesn't force users to pay real money to fully enjoy and access the game. I wish the game offers a first-person mode where you get to play inside the cockpit and navigate the aircraft. That would be so much extra fun! Hats off to the team behind the game's development! :)

Pretty cool app. I'd like it more the planes/jets could be personalized with personal/or existing airline company names and if you could play commercial type flying modes. All without having to level up or earn money or pay real money for. Like a free fly mode. Oh,oh... and that there was real life situations that happen as a result of no fly zones and stuff. Otherwise it's pretty cool so far.

This is the most addictive flight simulator I have ever played. The game is fairly easy to progress through without having to spend any money. If I had to find one fault it would be that you can't reverse when on a runway which means some times you have no option but to crash your plane as there is very little room to turn around.

Download the app for free now and don't miss amazing NEW CONTENT on periodic UPDATES

Forget dumb repetitive games. In Flight Pilot Simulator 3D Free, your duty includes racing against time, control a fire in the middle of the mountains, and land safely on a tiny airstrip (or even on an aircraft carrier warship)


● Play it anywhere
Flight Pilot Simulator 3D Free does NOT require any internet connection. You can enjoy it in the subway, or while traveling on a real plane, or in the car on the road, or during services in a temple (or maybe even on toilet!)

comments: I have 89 power ups and cannot use them. This is the most ridiculous thing I have ever seen in a bingo game, it's cheating. Ok so they put up power ups that I don't have and want me to buy them.Here's the kicker, if I don't buy them it stays up the whole game and doesn't let me use the ones I have!!!!! Ahhh greed! What a joke. Absolutely unfair. I've never seen anything like it. So so sad. And now since the new update it takes way too long to level up!! They just more greedy with each update. Again, so, so sad.
Pricey to play on a consistent basis. Also at last number called, give us a second or so to touch screen. Lost many BINGO's that way. Makes it seem unfair to me...

I really love the concept of completing puzzles, different quests and special side games. The graphics are great as well. I don't, however, like that you're almost forced to pay for tickets or you can play MAYBE one game a day. Needless to say, I'm not spending money to boost up my tickets.
Game freezes and I always lose my tokens. Not fun. I dont play for days to save just to play 2 stupid games

If you are not on a super high speed connection, or buy $100's in power ups or tickets dont plan on getting too far on this gamw.... it lags and doesnt let u bingo if you haven't purchased from the app!!!

descriptionHTML:

descriptionHTML:
Rings of Anarchy is a medieval fantasy 3D MMORPG mobile game. In this game, players travel to the wondrous homelands of the elves, dwarfs, gnomes, orcs, cyclopses and more in order to collect 27 powerful rings and save the world! Featuring many unique game modes and systems, such as the free equipment system, where equipment is obtainable only via killing monsters. The free trade system, in which players can freely trade items without price restrictions. A powerful and diverse social system, including Emperors and civilians, masters and apprentices, guilds and teams. Plus a balanced and exciting world boss system where bosses can be found across the world map and refresh all day long.


[Game Features]

——New Era, offline auto-combat
Unique auto-combat system design that even offers offline auto-combat will help you to upgrade and kill bosses when you are busy, creating a win-win situation for both work and play.

——Advancement, exclusive customization system
Featuring a fully customization system, in which you can advance as you see fit, outside the constraints of a traditional class system. Acquire your very own exclusive titles, spectacular skills and featured looks.

——Cool mounts, customizable looks
Dozens of cool mounts including tyrannosaurus, skyfyre and griffins are at your service. Customizable equipment and looks will make you stand out of the crowd.

——Trade freely, buy or sell equipment
In the market of this game, you can freely sell any unused or extra equipment obtained from killing bosses or completing quests. None of your resources or time shall be wasted.

descriptionHTML:
Mighty Party: Heroes Clash is a turn-based tactical card battle RPG.

Brave Hero, fight in fast 3-minute dynamic PvP battles! Summon dozens of epic war heroes to defeat all the opponents in the turn-based battle arena! Prove your guild alliance is the strongest one in the fantasy world of Mighty Party: Heroes Clash!

Play the troops of Imperial Archers, defend them with Wind Ninja, strengthen them with Magic of Divinity and destroy opponents forces!
Get ready to clash your Mighty Party on!

Features:
● Turn-based & fast-paced innovative battle system. Real strategy and tactics!
● Infinite battle combinations from dozens of war heroes.
● Epic Warlords with unique battle skills.
● Captivating PVP (Ranked Battles, Brawl, Arena matches, Tournaments, Survival, Raids, Events etc.) with great epic rewards!
● Single player campaign with an epic story of through the realm. A true hero’s Journey!
● Turf Wars is a game mode where your guild alliance fights using their troops against opponents for the most valuable territories. Prepare the Guild for glory!
● Lots of ways to evolve mighty heroes: level-up them, bind them with others, turn them into Legendary ones, upgrade skills in Turf Wars!

Defeat others in online PvP -> Receive Magical and Legendary Chests -> Recruit and Evolve new battle Heroes -> Gather your MIGHTY PARTY -> Clash with other players in PVP -> Join the strongest Guild Alliance -> Be no. 1!
Assemble your forces and lead your Mighty Party to victory!

Note:
Mighty Party: Heroes Clash is free to download and play, however, some game items can also be purchased for real money. If you do not want to use this feature, please set up password protection for purchases in the settings of your Google Play Store app.

A network connection is required.

Support:
Are you having problems? Please contact us via e-mail mightyparty.panoramik@gmail.com or in-game by going to Settings > Support.

Visit our Facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/mightyparty.game

descriptionHTML:
Welcome to the ultimate idle One-Tap Tower Defense RPG with simple, easy taps on the screen!

It all began when monsters invaded humankind. An eternal defensive battle against the brutal monsters threatening the Heroes' civilization rages on.

Immerse yourself in the Retro 8-bit fantasy-world of Knights and Heroes!

Features:
- Simple Control – Fend off endless waves of monsters with easy, simple taps
- Idle & Incremental - Experience the game progressing even when you’re not looking!
- 8-bit Style – a retro throwback to the good old days
- 25 Heroes with different attributes, strengths & weaknesses – Collect and build your ultimate team of Heroes for Tower Defense
- RPG – level-up, rank-up, build your own skill-trees, find the right items, and ascend your collection of Heroes beyond their limits
- Strengths & Weaknesses, Type-Effectiveness system between Heroes and Monsters – Uncover various Heroes’ strengths and weaknesses against different monsters to explore an unlimited number of strategies
- Various Dungeon Types – Advance through thousands of stages and dungeons to find the best way to upgrade your Hero collection
- Nonstop Tower Defense – game will automatically make progress even if when it’s not running! If you’re busy, simply come back later, check the progress and collect rewards to upgrade your Heroes!

Explore the simple, easy, and convenient idle Tower Defense RPG now!

I've quickly come to love this game, but I also love plenty of games who get by on much less frequent and interfering advertising. . You're generic response doesn't address anything I said except the target word "ads." I'm talking about ads you can't skip after many levels.  Save the unskippable ads for when we choose to watch them.

comments: This game just freezes constantly when opening reports, it takes so long that farming in this app is nearly impossible other than loot assistant. Messages constantly appear white and don't allow you to type. I have played tw on iPhone before and never had a problem with the app. It's like the developers don't even bother on android.

Please allow us to zoom in and out on the map. Please fix the back button so it goes to the previous page rather than the village overview. Something as basic as a menu should not lag and be smooth, especially on flagship phones. I pay for premium but this app is hard to use sometimes compared to iOS... Otherwise the app is an alright alternative to the browser.

I love this game. However, since the new update, when I play on my phone I'm not able to send emails and I have to click on the village button every time I change villages before I can do anything with that village. It is very inconvenient and impedes my ability to send important emails without logging in on a computer. Fix it.
this is one of the worst apps i have ever seen. it would be better if you didnt make anything rather than this.

description: Can you bring the taste of the whole world into one game? In Tasty Town it's possible!Your success in Tasty Town starts with 3 Fs: Fresh Farm Food! Grow fresh produce at your farm and take it to your restaurant, where international chefs will do their magic in the kitchen to deliver delicious dishes for your customers. Don't worry if you need a hand from time to time: helping and being helped is part of the experience! Create or join a Chefs Club with friends to complete events and get special rewards.Your gourmet customers may order anything, from a burger, pizza or sushi to a cake or a muffin, so be ready to craft the perfect dish at all times!However, it isn't all about the cooking: Make sure you have a nice building with crazy wonders that will make you popular and decorations that show off your classy taste.- Collect chefs from all over the world, level them up in the Academy, and cook tasty international recipes.- Grow fresh vegetables and raise happy animals at your Farm to produce your own ingredients.- Decorate your restaurant with extravagant wonders. They'll make you popular! The more popular you become, the more you'll be able to improve your restaurant.- Join forces with other players in your Chefs Club. You'll make friends and become the best in the business!- Expand your business in the town by catering parties at the Chillout Area and completing orders with your Delivery Trucks.Tasty Town is FREE to download and FREE to play. However, you can purchase in-app items for the game with real money. If you wish to disable this feature, please turn off the in-app purchases in your phone or tablet‚Äôs Settings.
descriptionHTML:
Can you bring the taste of the whole world into one game? In Tasty Town it's possible!

Your success in Tasty Town starts with 3 Fs: Fresh Farm Food! Grow fresh produce at your farm and take it to your restaurant, where international chefs will do their magic in the kitchen to deliver delicious dishes for your customers. Don't worry if you need a hand from time to time: helping and being helped is part of the experience! Create or join a Chefs Club with friends to complete events and get special rewards.

Your gourmet customers may order anything, from a burger, pizza or sushi to a cake or a muffin, so be ready to craft the perfect dish at all times!

However, it isn't all about the cooking: Make sure you have a nice building with crazy wonders that will make you popular and decorations that show off your classy taste.

- Collect chefs from all over the world, level them up in the Academy, and cook tasty international recipes.

- Grow fresh vegetables and raise happy animals at your Farm to produce your own ingredients.

- Decorate your restaurant with extravagant wonders. They'll make you popular! The more popular you become, the more you'll be able to improve your restaurant.

- Join forces with other players in your Chefs Club. You'll make friends and become the best in the business!

- Expand your business in the town by catering parties at the Chillout Area and completing orders with your Delivery Trucks.

Tasty Town is FREE to download and FREE to play. However, you can purchase in-app items for the game with real money. If you wish to disable this feature, please turn off the in-app purchases in your phone or tablet’s Settings.

comments: Improved in many ways, but you'll most likely need platinum turtles to earn Super Shredder DNA.  He is faster than a level 71 Splinter and he cheats. He uses all abilities with 0 cool down time, he keeps getting armor, shield, and healing... making winning impossible, unless you are +20 levels higher than him.

It's a fun, easy, addictive game. My ONLY complaint is that even when you buy a card, you don't get to CHOOSE which Character you are getting. If I'm paying $100 for something, I better get to PICK what I'm getting - this game doesn't let you do that.  I also think it takes WAY TOO LONG to evolve Characters, and overall the add-ons are FAR TOO EXPENSIVE for what you are getting, but you don't HAVE TO spend money if you don't want to.

The game is a great game, I love how they added characters from all eras, it sorta reminds me of turtles in time. The only huge downfall of this game is that it's pretty much a pay to play game smh. I've never seen a game that is so money hungry in my life. The $10 monthly subscription  is absurd, the SFX ingame dont work and for 5 bucks more you can play Elder scrolls online that has a ton of content compare to this game.

Subscription should come with better benefits. $10 a month...6 months worth I could've bought an xbox game. Ya know. Pizza re-gen should be a bit quicker. Some people like to grind. And the pizza limitation kills the grind. Good graphics tho, and great characters. But waaaay to hard to acquire the turtles. Big let down on that aspect

Great game just wished Very amazing game especially if you are a turtles fan.. lots of choices with characters.. you can definitely get stronger without having to pay.. you just need to put in the time , and do  do daily event's.. i wish some characters were easier to get;))

After a long battle with the worst customer service i have ever dealt with i will regrettably no longer be playing this game. The game itself is pretty solid but is a money sink. If you need help from the company you may as well quit. The game is a solid 4/5 but the company's attitude and considering you being disposable sadly makes them a 1/10

descriptionHTML:
Bros vs Foes!

At every turn, the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles have thwarted Kraang Prime’s plans to terraform the Earth into Dimension X. What’s an evil overlord to do? Hatch a nefarious new scheme, to create an army of Ultra Mutants! Everywhere, the Kraang have kidnapped mutants - including the Ninja Turtles - for their DNA!

With his brothers pulled through a Kraang Dimension X portal, Leonardo must recruit the Ninja Turtles’ allies and foes alike before it’s too late.

Hang on to your shells!

ORIGINAL NINJAS: Explore the Turtles universe with an All-New Original story. Battle your way through 7 chapters and over 70 stages to take on the baddest of bosses – Shredder, Kraang and more!
RESPECT THE SHELL: For a limited-time, play and experience an all-new chapter based on this summer’s blockbuster, Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Out of the Shadows! When their recon mission goes awry, the Turtles must take on the Foot Clan and favourite bad boys Bebop and Rocksteady! Fight to win and collect these exclusive characters!
TURTLE POWER: Help Leonardo as he takes on the Kraang army to save his brothers and fellow mutants. Play alongside Leonardo in a 5-on- 5 battle with your favorite TMNT characters.
MUTANT MAYHEM: Collect and level up over 30 TMNT characters! Train them to learn their super sweet moves and build your Turtle-rrific team! Don’t forget to pack your freezer for Ice Cream Kitty!
SHRED ALERT: For the very first time, fight the Kraang as a Ninja Turtle friend… or FOE! Collect and play as Tiger Claw, Rocksteady, Bebop, and more. Create strategic teams and take on the Kraang!
FOOD FIGHT: Collect daily prizes and card packs to enhance your team!
WE RUN THIS TOWN: Fight against the Kraang in the Ninja Turtles’ favorite locations from the TV show, including Dimension X, the sewers and the classic New York City rooftops!

Gentlemen, let’s save the world!

--

Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Legends collects non-personal user data (including aggregated data) and connects with 3rd party social media applications.

Please note, Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Legends is completely free to play but offers some game items for purchase with real money. If you choose not to use this feature, you can disable in-app purchases in your device's settings.

For users residing in the EU, Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Legends may include the use of persistent identifiers for game management purposes and installation of this app constitutes your permission to such usage of persistent identifiers for all users on your device.

comments: Despite some occasional issues with support from the developers, this is one of the best mobile games I've ever played. Now that they're finally adding new content regularly, it keeps me interested day after day.
Won't even let me play not worth your time.

Not a bad game, don't need money really to level up and get to a good standing against others. It goes pretty quick till level 65ish  and starts to slow down. If you want to spend money it helps speed leveling and getting your guys up stronger faster obviously. If you have patience and don't mind not leveling to fast, or just taking your time in general this game is for you. Lots to do. My favorite part is trying to find a way to make my team the strongest I can, using the massively different combos of hero's u can use and all the things you can add to them to make them stronger. You can literally go with a 1 man team or a 5 man team based on materials u have to equip them with to make sure they can last in battle. Have fun and good luck all... comments: I love many aspects of the game, but there are some seriously frustrating issues. After accidentally clicking through the out of food warnings twice I think I'm done playing. It is silly to invest an hour into exploring only to lose it all because of an extra click, especially when you have a bunch of telaports. When player runs out of food, options should be camp, teleport, or suicide...and suicide should NOT be clicking anywhere on the screen. Provide a button.

descriptionHTML:
Official sequel of classic popular adventure game Dungeon Survivor.

Dungeon Survivor II – Dark Tide is a simulation and dungeon adventure game.

This time, you will lead your daring mission to the no-man’s land, have an unexpected fantasy adventure in the ancient and mysterious continent.


Story of the World
- Be the Ruler of the Sanctuary, the eschatological Manor, guide your people and warriors to fight against the fallen Country.
- Upon the journey, you’ll encounter different people.
Will you draw out the sword or reach out your hand? That is for you to decide.
- Little, helpless and pathetic humans gather together to battle against the Black Tide.
Every decision you make is of vital importance.

Class & Adventure
- 6 main Classes with more than 50 sub-classes, each with unique personality.
- Easy but flexible team formation, Mixed? All Melee? All Mages, whatever you like.
Your Imagination is the only limit.
- Diverting strategy setting, play a sure card and win the battle!
- Vicious creatures, quirky traps, weird strangers-the world is always full of accidents and surprises.
- Find the powerful Monster and beat them up!

Battle & Speed
- Real-time PVP with hand control. let’s duke it out in the Arena!
- Heading to the leaderboard for the CROWN！
- Marching on the Lost Castle and unlock the Arena!

Classic placing and gain mode
- No pains but gains
Place and gain resources every time you enter the game.
- Wit and adroit like you, even with limited resources, can definitely build up a prosperous Manor.

======Contact Us======

descriptionHTML:
In Asphalt 8, you’ll race in some of the hottest, most high-performance dream machines ever created, from cars to bikes, taking them on a global tour of speed. From the blazing Nevada Desert to the tight turns of Tokyo, you’ll find a world of challenge, excitement & arcade fun on your road to the top!

REAL LUXURY DREAM CARS & MOTORCYCLES!
• Over 190 high-performance cars & bikes to drive & push beyond their limits.
• Top licensed manufacturers & models: the Lamborghini Veneno, Bugatti 16.4 Grand Sport Vitesse, Ferrari LaFerrari, McLaren P1, Porsche 911 GT3 RS, Ducati Monster 1200 & more, including a selection of racing motorbikes!
• Newly recorded high-fidelity motor sounds for realistic audio immersion.
• Customize & upgrade your rides with over 2,300 decals to take down opponents with style!

GET AIRBORNE WITH ASPHALT 8
• Hit the ramps & take the race beyond the limits of physics, breaking free from gravity into the sky with a car or bike!
• Perform barrel rolls & wild 360º jumps to soar past your opponents.
• Maneuver through the air, pulling off insane stunts in your car or motorcycle to maximize your speed & find a fast route to the goal.

EXOTIC NEW LOCATIONS
• Over 40 high-speed tracks in 16 different settings, such as Venice, French Guiana, Iceland, the Nevada Desert & other exciting locations to ride your car or bike across!
• Race any track you want in original mode or its mirror variation to ensure a fresh challenge in Career mode that’s sure to keep you on your toes.
• Discover plenty of shortcuts hidden throughout every location. Mastering them is sure to raise your game to the top of the competition!

AN ENDLESS STREAM OF CONTENT FOR SPEED FREAKS!
• 9 seasons & over 400 events in Career mode, with plenty of challenges for even the most experienced car & motorcycle riders.
• Stunning visuals thanks to next-gen shaders, real-time geometry reflection & other amazing HD effects.
• Check out the Infected & Gate Drift modes for a fresh twist on racing.
• Win top prizes in the Limited-Time Cups, including early access to some of the latest cars in the game!
• A detailed damage system.

THE ULTIMATE MULTIPLAYER RACING EXPERIENCE!
• Gear up for simultaneous multiplayer action for up to 8 real players!
• Multiplayer Seasons & Leagues! Race your best against other players to score points & unlock prizes in limited-time Racing Seasons.
• Dare friends to asynchronous races as you chase your rivals’ ghost cars & bikes across the track.
• Compare scores on the new leaderboards with friends & rival riders around the world.
• Share your racing achievements & prove that you’re the ultimate speed machine.

MUSIC TO REV YOUR SOUL
• A heart-thumping mix of amazing music licensed for Asphalt 8 to drive your need for fast arcade racing.

CONTROL CUSTOMIZATION
• Rearrange your on-screen icons & controls however you like to customize & optimize your style of play.

So, are you ready for a real HD stunt-racing experience? Can you handle the Ferrari, Mercedes, or Audi of your dreams, among dozens of high-octane motorcycles? Do you have an insatiable need for groundbreaking speed? Well, consider this your green light to go & download Asphalt 8, fast!
__
HOT WHEELS and associated trademarks and trade dress are owned by, and used under license from, Mattel. ©2017 Mattel. All Rights Reserved.

comments: Poker is a lot like dating.

I used to love this app. They updated it a few weeks ago and I hate it. I'm not able to get into a game without waiting. Maybe there is a way around that but I haven't figured it out. It's not user friendly like it used to be. I'm uninstalling this app.

This last update (1.94.2) is f***ed. I constantly get logged out randomly in the middle of a hand and am forced to fold. Also, the filters for games have been generalized so I can no longer narrow down to the game type I want. That one is not even a bug just an awful bewildering design change.

I have been playing on this site for at least 14 years now I loved it I played with real money but in last 4 or 5 years I haven't been able to play with real money I do spend reel money to buy fake chips I'm not happy with the new settings that I can't find the tables that I like to play and can't play with real money let me tell you that until you fix this and change your settings back the way it was few days ago I wound play and I Will ask all my friends that I referred to this site to stop playing and deposit.  So please fix the problem.  Thanks
It's an ok app. Noticed to many patterns to believe it's random. Don't play real money unless you feel comfortable throwing it away. Most player's who seem to win are from some third world country.
Start page doesn't open on fave game.  Can't reload chips ahead of time.  Also, seating distribution needs attention on Omaha tables.

comments: More and more focus on pay to win and the 4th weapon, the distance weapon makes it too complex and disturbing. In particular the boomerangs because there are almost no chances to avoid a hit. In unequal battles the inferior just got an extra disadvantage --> no David vs goliath anymore possible. It sucks

This is the worst chapter or update in  the game.. when I saw notification of the update I was very excited but when I opened this game the main quest was insane difficulty so I started side quest which was easy difficulty, but it was not for me it was easy for the enemy.. I played that more than 10 times but I didn't win 2 rounds so I just came here and wrote this review... And if you think I'm a noob.. then yes I am but only in this chapter not in previous ones..

At first look it didn't mesmerise me, but after 2-3 matches I feel in love with it! It is awesome and has tons of weapons and other stuffs. The multiplayer option is also great and chest opening is such a treat. One worry is that the weapon below the primary weapon is still locked (why I don't know), otherwise the game is superb. Graphics are top notch and fighting doesn't come more realistic than that!

I have been playing SF3 for quite a long time til now and I just got a problem with one side mission. It was the "Head hit only" with an Accused. I play as the judge and all. However, when I hit him like a combos of headhits, it didnt hurt him at all. It is like he became invincible. Anyway, I love everything of SF3. The storyline, gameplay, graphic and so on, they are all great. And I hope you would fix that one single problem of mine along with others who have the problem of crashing as I had read the comments. That is all for me. Keep up the good work, Nekki.

After the latest update, in side quest - wasteland I won twice both the times the game hung up but when the opponent wins it moves through to next easily. I can attach the screen shot of wanted.. kindly fix this it's frustrating  Now for the third time this has happened gonna uninstall the game bye

The 1st Main Mission of chapter 4 hot stucked. I deafeated my opponent and it has stocked at that point. Closed the game and started again, the the mission is in same position. Again I played that mission and after defeating the game stucked again. The same thing happened 5 times in a row. Very much Dissapointed.
description: Step into the world of shadows at the time of changes. Reveal all its dark secrets and become the greatest warrior this land has ever seen. In this RPG-fighting game you will take on a role of a hero whose destiny isn't determined yet. How do you see the future? It's your call! Choose from three different fighting styles, experiment, combine your gear, learn some fresh new moves and explore a massive world full of adventures! Enjoy the beauty of a real fight which has been made possible due to modern technologies and smooth animations. CREATE YOUR OWN FIGHTING STYLE Shadow Fight 3 offers you 3 unique fighting styles to choose from. Collect new moves, perks, weapons, gear and combine them in the way YOU like it. Be fast and graceful, strong and shattering, enigmatic and deadly. Raise a character that will represent your distinctive playing technique and personality. AT THE EDGE OF TECHNOLOGY Shadow Fight 3 brings the fighting genre to a whole new technological level. Colorful graphics, smooth animations, realistic physics and effects create a picture of a living and breathing world you've never seen before!  DEEP AND IMMERSIVE STORYLINE Shadow Fight 3 is a story-driven game. You'll find yourself in a dangerous world that is on the threshold of a great war with you in the middle. Three powerful factions are tearing these lands apart and plotting against each other. Which side would you choose? You decide! MANAGE YOUR GEAR COLLECTION. There's large amount of weapons and armor in Shadow Fight 3. If you've ever dreamed of having a rare collection of war goods, now's your time! The world of shadows has got splendid rewards for the most adventurous ones! Collect epic gear, combine and upgrade it, equip it with new lethal moves and perks. Fight your enemy with style! It is all limited by your imagination only. Shadow Fight 3 in a nutshell: - Smooth animations and lifelike physics- Spectacular SHADOW-based fighting mechanics- Lots of gear and weapons to collect- Gorgeous visuals- Three unique factions and fighting styles- Hundreds of perks and supermoves- Character creation tool- Diverse fighting modes

recentChanges: In this update we bring to you the long-awaited Chapter 4!
It features:
- 15 new main quests, based on your previous choice
- Ranged weapons! 36 types of them, including harpoons, arbalests, shurikens and more!

comments: If you like flying WW2 era fighters then you'll love this game. Even for being a mobile game I am impressed with everything the game offers. The only thing I do not like is Android users,like myself, cannot fly the plane from the cockpit, hopefully that option will be available soon!

Awesome game, awesome graphics and gameplay! Controls I rated four stars due to sluggish firing it seems....or...it could be my device too. Im not exactly sure. Also, not a deal breaker, could we shut off the verbal commentary during battle and keep the sound effects? That'd be awesome. Great game all around though.

When I first started playing this game a while ago it was great. Alot of fun. But after every update it gets less enjoyable. Originally gave it 5 stars but I honestly can't agree to that any more. Especially with the tokens and duplicate planes. I have no reason to spend any money, the tokens are useless and after 18 duplicate planes I just won't buy crates. Not worth it.

Game is a POS. They used to work pretty well then they started upgrading everything and now it doesn't work hardly at all. Massive disconnects tons of unplayable lag. So far the only thing I found that works well in this game is the buy me button.. they don't seem to have a problem with that part of the game it works very well the rest of the game sucks.!

I like this game, its the best WW2 Airfight game. I play many WW2 Airfight game in android, but this is the best one. Good Job War Wings. Can you make more than 4 vs 4 or 8 vs 8 in big map or something more than 4 vs 4? It will be look like war games not PVP, just advice. Keep the good work.

The game is great but the enemy planes should have a health bar or something like that. You could also introduce clouds where there is almost no visibility and some power ups based on experience pts of a plane.. But still a really nice game

Compete against millions of players worldwide, destroy enemy squadrons and climb the global leaderboards. descriptionHTML:
Take to the skies and join the battle in epic WWII dogfights! Climb into the cockpit of your fully customisable warplane and get ready for take-off - your mission is about to begin!

Be an ace pilot! Fly solo as a lone wolf or team up with your squadron to control the skies. Pull off gravity-defying stunts and tricks, get the enemy in your sights and hit the trigger to shoot them down. It’s life or death up there, and only the bravest and most skilled pilots will survive!

War Wings lets you fly into the heat of the action in multiplayer PVP dogfights. Compete against millions of players worldwide, destroy enemy squadrons and climb the global leaderboards. Show the world that you own the skies!

**********************************************************************
""GOLDEN CUBE"" AWARD FOR BEST GAME – Unity
BEST NEW GAME - Mobile Developer Conference (HK)
MOST INFLUENTIAL GAME - Metro Media
BEST ORIGINAL MOBILE GAME - Mobile Developer Conference (HK)
**********************************************************************

FEATURES
- Epic 4v4 real-time online PvP dogfighting
- Experience true combat: planes and weapons with realistic damage
- Deck out your warplane: rich customization allows different tactics and strategies
- Huge selection of aircraft to choose from: 70+ customizable models
- Fly WWII - era warplanes based on plane models through history
- Global PvP rankings with rewards and customizable player emblems
- Wide variety of controls: motion, virtual stick or D-Pad

This game requires a minimum 1Gb of free space on your device.

────────────────
Play War Wings with friends!
────────────────
Like us on Facebook! http://www.facebook.com/PlayWarWings

recentChanges: The jet fighters are coming!
- Brand new T8 jet fighters are added: German Me 262 A-1a, British Attacker FB 2, American F-80C-10 and Soviet Yak-15.
- Weekly Leaderboard: Earn points from fighting battles. Claim the weekly rewards and be promoted to a higher league.
- Friend gifting: Now it's supportive to send gifts to your friends. Extra rewards are waiting for you!
- Optimize Team up function. Invitation can be sent in global chat.
- Fix bugs related to the crash or cheating.
summary: Fly into battle in this epic WWII air combat game!
title: War Wings

comments: Fun, easy to play, complex to reach higher levels, this game has, so far, been great. No microtransactions (thus far) to continue playing, which is a huge plus. A few have stated a couple of bugs, which I agree with, adding only one other comment; I do wish their was an offline option for at least some gameplay. Online still necessary for a lot, but offline to run some dungeons. This could, in theory, help with some server space, as well.

This game is one of the best game I ever played in mobile. I love the graphic which is cute and there is so many content, so it's not boring. And another positive side, you can get the special currency easily in the game. It's not a p2w games ^^ but the sign board was one of the best micro transaction I've ever seen. Try it and you'll see.. it's a lot of fun ^^

I've been looking for a game like this for ages! I was a fan of Runestone Keeper and wanted something similar for my phone. These guys knocked it out of the park. I rarely spend money on phone games, but these guys deserve every penny and accolade coming their way. Fun and  simple, yet brilliant in execution and design. Tons of content already, and I can't wait to see what's next. Keep up the great work!

This game is so much fun! My only complaint is that the gear is gone when done with the maze, so you start it over. As well as "learning new titles". It gets kinda old having to start that over every time you beat a full maze. But that aside, this game is definitely addictive! Keep up the great work!

Your game is amazing. You guys are amazing. After everything you went through, you deserve these stars at the very least. Your game isn't pay to win, it's just a grand experience and I love it.  One of the BEST games on the market easily.  Keep up the good work, you're all doing fantastic.  Respect

I've been playing like nine months and it's very addictive you really grow and have many choices. It's truly free to play and gems are everywhere. Buying a signboard for real money is the best bang for your buck and a lizard if you feel like buying something else.  Totally recommend it. I only hate getting creator gumball is so expensive other than that it's a great game. It's a game that goes as fast or as slow as you feel like playing.
description: Brand new Adventure & RPG game of 2018. FREE to Play Now! (Game for free)DESCRIPTIONThis is a mysterious adventure. How long can you survive during the unknown journey? Enter the Gumballs & Dungeons!Start off a great adventure with world wide players,lead your Swordsman,Demon Hunter,Mage and Death Knight to beat the Evil Dominator of the Erathia continent.FEATURES‚óè Explore the Gumballs & Dungeons with world wide players,challenge friends and check leaderboards and achievements‚óè Experience more than 12 different game maps and hidden stages, including Magic Forest, Sage's Tower, Dracula's Castle, Skeleton Island ...‚óè Build and upgrade your GUMBALL Fleet,go to the celestial city, challenge world wide players and win resources to upgrade your fleet.‚óè Collect powerful new gumballs and upgrade existing ones,including Mage, Swordsman, Odin, Vampire,Zombie ...‚óè Upgrade your Alchemist Workshop which can produce coins and resources constantly‚óè You can also read many wonderful stories that have more than 100,000 words in the gameSUPPORTAre you having problems? Visit http://qcplay.helpshift.com/a/gumballs-dungeons or https://www.facebook.com/gumballs.dungeons or contact us in game by going to Settings > Guide.Forums & Guide:English:    https://goo.gl/ecChhsWiki:http://gdmaze.wikia.comTerms of Service:http://rs.qcplay.com/html/Terms_of_service.htmlIt's necessary to use the below permissions:RECORD_AUDIOThere is a 'Voice Chat' function in the game, this function allows users to send the voice messages to each other, so it's necessary to use the RECORD_AUDIO permission.The video below shows how it works in the game:https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KqNb75QXq8g&feature=youtu.be  GET_ACCOUNTSIn order to allow users to sign in the game with Google account, it's necessary to grant access to the GET_ACCOUNTS permission when signing in with google at the first time.
descriptionHTML:
Brand new Adventure & RPG game of 2018. FREE to Play Now! (Game for free)

DESCRIPTION
This is a mysterious adventure. How long can you survive during the unknown journey? Enter the Gumballs & Dungeons!Start off a great adventure with world wide players,lead your Swordsman,Demon Hunter,Mage and Death Knight to beat the Evil Dominator of the Erathia continent.

FEATURES
● Explore the Gumballs & Dungeons with world wide players,challenge friends and check leaderboards and achievements
● Experience more than 12 different game maps and hidden stages, including Magic Forest, Sage's Tower, Dracula's Castle, Skeleton Island ...
● Build and upgrade your GUMBALL Fleet,go to the celestial city, challenge world wide players and win resources to upgrade your fleet.
● Collect powerful new gumballs and upgrade existing ones,including Mage, Swordsman, Odin, Vampire,Zombie ...
● Upgrade your Alchemist Workshop which can produce coins and resources constantly
● You can also read many wonderful stories that have more than 100,000 words in the game

SUPPORT
Are you having problems? Visit http://qcplay.helpshift.com/a/gumballs-dungeons or https://www.facebook.com/gumballs.dungeons or contact us in game by going to Settings > Guide.

Forums & Guide:
English: https://goo.gl/ecChhs

Wiki:
http://gdmaze.wikia.com

Terms of Service:
http://rs.qcplay.com/html/Terms_of_service.html

It's necessary to use the below permissions:

RECORD_AUDIO
There is a 'Voice Chat' function in the game, this function allows users to send the voice messages to each other, so it's necessary to use the RECORD_AUDIO permission.
The video below shows how it works in the game:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KqNb75QXq8g&feature=youtu.be

GET_ACCOUNTS
In order to allow users to sign in the game with Google account, it's necessary to grant access to the GET_ACCOUNTS permission when signing in with google at the first time.

summary: A totally free "dungeon crawler" with tons of Easter Eggs and secrets. No ads!

comments: Good app but few glitches. One day I was playing against computer. It made a miraculous move of eating my pawn at a place where none of my pawn ever existed. Awesome. :P Net connectivity is as good that when other apps show good connection under high speed wifi, ot shows no connectivity. Lol

Freakking great. Best chess app EVER!!!!. I have the free one and it can teach you tactics, help you in situations and if you dont want that no need to do it. You can even costumize your wallpaper or theme. Skill ratings 100-2600 playing real people. Or you can play a computer, 400-1200 or 1400 i think. Great app, get it you wont regret it.

I think this app is horrible simply.. I'm a diamond member, but I don't think i will be for much longer. There's other chess sites that don't disconnect and lag so much. Main dislikes is the constant disconnection, no order at all in the videos section. Tactics, lessons and drills bugs and crashes when turning the mobile or screen goes off. Specially drills bugs and just repeats the same one over and over when you finished instead of going to the next one. Also, app was unhappy I was logged in on my turned off computer.. come on..

I cannot respond to chats. The support team promises they will fix the issue, but it's only lies so that I can give the app a decent rating. Now my custom board, pieces, and background settings get reset every 2 days. Frustrating app.

The last update sucks! Premove is not at all intuitive. It now just shows the block which we want to move the pawn and doesn't move the pawn itself like before. The toast message that showed 'challenge rejected' was better than the current one. Dislike it!!
I have no connection issues but some times game discontinues with showing no n/w.pls solve otherwise good game Finally uninstalled... Worst team.

comments: Really not a fan of the daily crates being replaced by the fortune wheel. 2 silver crates and a gold every week replaced by what is essentially a bronze crate every day and occasionally a gold, if you're very lucky. Also, why replace, billion, trillion, jillion etc. With numbers? At a glance it's much more confusing.
Typical app game that is fun at first but then game progress slows down. Therefore encouraging the player to purchase items to advance farther into the game. Yawn.
Don't download, i got sooooooo far and then all of a sudden it deleted all of my work and progress. Don't get it

I am not sure how to add my friends on this app. So, it's Really putting me down. He has a iPhone and I have a Samsung. Don't download this at all if you're expecting to play with friends. It doesn't work
Glitches with bonuses not working in space make it to boring to continue.
Worst game . My whole Family is no longer playing. Gems for tasks you never get and all the ads.
description: Build your empire one city at a time in this new tap idler sure to make you money hungry! Tap to make money, tap to upgrade your city‚Äôs business buildings, and tap some more! Unlock, hire, and collect as many Advisors and Bizbots as you can to upgrade your business value, build your cities faster, and earn a stash of cash as you rise from rags to riches! Valuable Adviser bonuses will have you tapping even faster! Can you become a billionaire business tycoon or will you fail as a capitalist?From the creators of Coin Dozer and Brick Breaker Hero, Taps to Riches will have you tapping everywhere you go!- Expand your empire into multiple cities with unique challenges- Hundreds of hilarious Advisers who add valuable business bonuses! Collect them all!- Dare to reset your progress and take advantage of Bizbots, a precious resource that give you even more money bonuses per tap!- Buy and upgrade your businesses to see them evolve into architectural masterpieces!- Tons of Bonuses and Achievements for you to discover with all of your tapping frenzy!- More features to come!Taps to Riches is a unique city building simulation game with tap and click mechanics. Upgrade businesses in game to make money and earn extra cash as you venture into new cities.   Start from the bottom as a newly freed villain with big dreams of once again achieving world domination. Tap your way into riches and money by upgrading buildings and investing in your city. The more cash you invest in businesses the more money they produce for you. Hire valuable Advisors to unlock special business bonuses, and use Bizbot resources for even more cash bonuses!

comments: I have loved Hot Wheels for years and this is a good game. Fun and challenging. However I have been a bit frustrated because sometimes I just explode for touching a wall like on level 6. Awesomeüòí Not to mention I sometimes just hit a ramp and don't reach the end and fall into a void. Also fix your Poppa Wheelie's handling. You killed it, literally. Just try and fix your game a bit and I will give a 5.

The game is good. There are problems though. D-muscle is absolutely useless. It's the worst car in the muscle set and has no business being the fourth car in that set. The final upgrades for the fourth car on all sets are far too expensive. It requires an insane amount of grinding to unlock the last cars. The prices of supercharged upgrades are all over the place. Why do all of Haulinator's cost 100 coins while Dune It Up's cost 1000-2000?

Good graphics. If you fail and do exact same again you may pass level if you level up car, you end up failing sooner and have to slow down but after trying 7 r 8 times gets annoying and the level up car is worse than your basic car. Too frustrating so deleting

Game would be good if the dev's took time to work out the huge amount of bugs. Everytime I run this, I get 3 races deep then everything stops responding. Running it on Samsung Galaxy S9+ with perfect cell service. All the buttons click but do nothing. Uninstalled.

Horrendous abuse of in game ads like I've never seen before in an app. At some points, you literally cannot proceed until you open the play store. The game races are short balancing acts wherein you simply try to keep your car on its wheels. Do not download, and do not let your kids start playing.

My 2 almost 3 year old and I really like this game. It's pretty fun BUT it seems to freeze up after a few races and I have to shut the game off and restart it to play more. This obviously frustrates little man and I'm sure I'm not the only one this has happened to. Other than that, we think it's a great game.

comments: This has a lot of potential. Connection issues are horrendous after this last update. Also, add a help section that explains what everything means. Lots of stats, numbers, ratings, etc. that we have to figure out on our own. Another thing, stopped receiving notifications after updating to Oreo.
Overall it's pretty fun and addicting.  My only real issue came up with today's update. My 40-rated team got matched to play against a 60-rated team in my first Challenge game. wut

The game was great until the update. Took my team from a 43 to a 41. Put alot of time into it, hope this gets worked out. They also nerfed training. Don't even bother wasting 15 coins on an extra session.

Update: ***500 coins for ~350k in game cash isnt even 1 rookie signing.... you can get 3 star players for that kind of coin. **** the latest updates have added cool new features like the coach analysis, fewer bugs and more consistency. The coach analysis function could be cool but every description is "this player is making great progress, keep pushing him!" Even for aging players who are getting worse as the seasons progress. It does however project where the player could trend stats wise.  Still no goalie stats. Still no trade options (not sure how that would wotk) but they added refunds to contracts you release from your roster which depend on the player and their contract value,  time remaining etc...  Would be cool to also be able to make in game adjustments, like if your star goalie is letting goal after goal slip through swapping goal tenders would be nice otherwise there doesn't really seem to be a point in having 2 goalies even on the roster.  Overall it's a Fun game with a LOT of potential, if you're a fan of hockey you should definitely give this a try. Would like to see some of these things as the game develops

Please fix how it automatically signs a new player if you don't renew a contract.. the purpose is to dump cap space and it signs some random player and then won't let me release him.  Also STOP changing my line ups. At any point any time ever. There's no need to change it or else you night as well play the game for me. I spend alot of time re doing them and then next thing I know every thing is changed. Not sure why or what causes it buy it is annoying as hell

Overall it is a decent game. However finding an opponent for the games especially the rank games sucks. Either you get another player who is far superior to you or another who is far below your level. It needs to be more equal to be fun.

comments: I liked the game so much. No! I love it, but it's just that I'm now on level 65 but I'm stucked since I only have few gems left and I needed to extend the time, and buy some customers which I find amazing just to save your energy and the stage but I also find it hard since I have already completed 3 stars from lower levels and why is it that I can't play the levels I have already completed? I would really suggest that lower levels would still be played just to be able to collect gems. I hope you can fix this issue though. I'm so loving this game and I'm getting addicted to it. I got stucked on level 65 on my two days of playing. Thank you

Moving on is hard on some levels because they are specifically designed for you to use gems and they are hard to come by. However, If you are patient enough you can eventually earn them. I enjoy that you don't have to drag the items to the customers. It's definitely an enjoyable and challenging game. I'm currently at a "coming soon" stage where I can no longer move ahead. I've been waiting a long time and do not want to wait forever. Please do an update soon!!!

I love this game! So few games actually suck me in, but this game had me addicted right away. I play on my phone and laptop. Yes I have two different games at different levels lol. I love how upgrades are so easy and it isn't impossible to upgrade or move on. It gets challenging as you go up levels but it's so fun.

Great game but some levels really hard I cant pasd this one level im on for days maybe update make it easier pass level I'm on I just did update...I hope so... love game anyways great game to.. identical cooking joy to map was a great game to but also hard get passed certain levels that game to n I can try play fast with my hands to still cant pass to not playing  cooking joy anymore going stick with this one see if game gets easier to

It's fun till you run out of energy. They get you too rate the game right away while you are having fun with free lives. Give you enough lives to rate it good then the lives end and you have to watch a min advert or 30 mins for one life Regen. OR PAY. They just want your money at that point. So sad.

Brilliant little time waster of a game.. yet.. once you start getting to the higher levels.. the less chance of earning gems and i aint noway paying for them.. last time I stupidly paid for gems on cooking fever..and got my account hacked into! Big lesson learnt! I do still play this alot tho so overall, definitely a good game. üëç

descriptionHTML:
Join the excitement and high adrenaline rush of Pro 11’s fantasy soccer leagues and tournaments to become the best soccer manager in the world!

Find out if you have what it takes to become a top ranked soccer manager, oversee your soccer club and dominate your national soccer league, as well as the Champions League! Pro 11 brings you the combined action and thrill of running a soccer fantasy league and playing with soccer clubs such as Madrid, Barcelona, to build your dream team of superstar soccer players. It’s up to you to create the line-up, manage transfers, conduct training sessions, negotiate sponsor deals and much more.

Manage your own soccer club with Pro 11 and compete against the best soccer teams from soccer leagues across the world. Pro11 is the perfect match for any soccer enthusiasts that follow the soccer leagues such as the Premier League, La Liga, Serie A, Ligue 1 and the legendary Champions League.

Instant Action – Advance by Dominating Your National soccer League

Pro 11 is your best fantasy soccer game for instant action! With Pro 11, you have complete control over your soccer matches, you can instantly decide when you want to play, and you always play against other human soccer managers. While other multiplayer games rely on specific match times, Pro 11 allows you to showcase your soccer manager skills whenever you’re online and dominate your fantasy soccer league. Lead your team to the top of your national fantasy league and advance all the way to the Champions League.

Experience the excitement of managing your favourite soccer club – Engage on all levels

Take your fantasy soccer team to glory by controlling all aspects of your professional soccer club. Bid for players as you track the live soccer transfer market, train your squad, negotiate contracts for your soccer players, and enjoy real time soccer management for your team’s soccer matches. Encourage your squad to rise to glory with motivational speeches in daily engaging mini games.

Top graphics and Captivating Gameplay

Pro 11 brings you a high-quality graphics experience throughout the entire game. Watch awesome 3D motion captured soccer player movements based on real-life recorded human movements. Watch brilliant, stunning game moves play out in real time while you’re the manager in charge. With Pro 11’s state of the art graphics, your soccer fantasy comes to life.

Main Game Features:

★Collect the best soccer players from the top soccer leagues
★Explore the youth’s potential and find the next Ronaldo or Messi
★Manage your team’s soccer training sessions and participate in mini games
★Fun multiplayer game allows you to play with or against your friends
★Buy and sell soccer players instantly - Simple and fun to use transfer market
★Negotiate the best sponsor deals for your team
★Take advantage of advanced tactic options as you lead your team to victory

Discover the thrilling world of soccer management and begin your journey to the top today! Choose Pro 11 and join our fast growing community!

comments: Once you progress a little the tournaments become more like roulette than poker. After a few hands in a 24 player tournament the blind levels can reach c. 1/4 of your chips!!!

Most unstable game app I've played. App crashes frequently during play. I've had the app crash when about to receive chips. Also, this is a very slow loading app taking at least 10x to 20x longer to run even when quickly toggling back and forth between apps.
Paid for this game only to have microtansactions making it where if I lose a couple games and don't make enough I have to pay more money to continue playing.
Its a fun way to kill time. I wish the blinds wouldn't start with me each game. In the big money games, losing the first blinds  can mean quite alot.
I loved this game on pc now on my note 8 I can have it everywhere offline play makes it that much better thank you youda games
Thank goodness for rent By my calculations I have only squandered 1M chips
description: Play single player holdem poker on your Android and beat every cowboy in Texas in this great Texas Hold'em Poker RPG game called Governor of Poker 2 Premium.Millions of poker players have enjoyed Governor of Poker, without an internet connection.With an easy Texas Holdem poker tutorial for players that don't know how to play poker, but want to learn poker and good opponents for star poker players with real poker skills!The poker chips you win are required to buy houses, win transportation, play against advanced poker AI opponents, win Texas and beat the new Governor of Poker.‚Ä¢Get ready for many hours and hours of Hold'm Poker play:- Over 80 challenging poker opponents to beat;- 27 stunning card saloons in 19 amazing Texas Holdem cities;- Get hold of the five big poker assets.‚Ä¢Amazing Texas Poker AI Engine:A great poker engine will challenge new poker players and world poker champions alike.Refine your tactics to match the countless poker playing styles of your opponents and watch them go "Steamy" and Tilt after showing off your great card bluffs!Players will play better in each new city and poker tournament, no cheating allowed!‚Ä¢Full Story:Governor of Poker 2 starts where the first game ended.A new Dallas government decided to put a ban on all Texas Holdem poker games and now considers the game to be illegal.Time to take matters in your own hands and prove them wrong! Poker isn't a game of luck, but requires poker skill.‚Ä¢Play Always and Everywhere Offline Poker, no internet connection required:Because there is no live internet connection needed to play a good game of Texas hold'em poker, you can just play Governor of Poker 2 offline anywhere you want!Don't wait for human players in multiplayer poker games, that don't respond or leave the pokergame or go allin all the time. Just play this offline poker game !‚Ä¢Customize poker characters:Prove you are a bigshot by customizing your poker style to fit your reputation. Be sure to visit one of the many great hat shops across Texas and get yourself the poker deluxe hat of your dreams!The game includes HD Poker graphics for a great experience on all Android phones and tablets.Travel through Texas by Train, Casino Boat or Stage Coach and play poker whilst on your way to the next poker city in Texas.Every city has lots of exciting cash games and big poker tournaments with even bigger Chip prizes, competition and bigger tournaments. You‚Äôll experience more checks, calls, raises, folds and all-ins than you can imagine!Enjoy sit-n-go tournaments, Shootout tournaments, Bounty tournaments, Cash games.** NO INTERNET CONNECTION REQUIRED **You don't need an internet connection and don't have to wait for other poker players, it's an offline poker game.Have you always been a Texas holde'm pokee fanatic? Great sense of personality. Excellent poker tutorial.. It's a Royal Flush."- Jayisgames: "Governor of Poker 2 is well-made, highly accessible, and surprisingly addictive for all kinds of players."- Zylom: "Play this challenging poker game now!"- Miniclip 5 stars out of 5: "Howdy!
