descriptionHTML:
Play single player holdem poker on your Android and beat every cowboy in Texas in this great Texas Hold'em Poker RPG game called Governor of Poker 2 Premium.

Millions of poker players have enjoyed Governor of Poker, without an internet connection.
With an easy Texas Holdem poker tutorial for players that don't know how to play poker, but want to learn poker and good opponents for star poker players with real poker skills!
The poker chips you win are required to buy houses, win transportation, play against advanced poker AI opponents, win Texas and beat the new Governor of Poker.

•Get ready for many hours and hours of Hold'm Poker play:
- Over 80 challenging poker opponents to beat;
- 27 stunning card saloons in 19 amazing Texas Holdem cities;
- Get hold of the five big poker assets.

•Amazing Texas Poker AI Engine:
A great poker engine will challenge new poker players and world poker champions alike.
Refine your tactics to match the countless poker playing styles of your opponents and watch them go "Steamy" and Tilt after showing off your great card bluffs!
Players will play better in each new city and poker tournament, no cheating allowed!

•Full Story:
Governor of Poker 2 starts where the first game ended.
A new Dallas government decided to put a ban on all Texas Holdem poker games and now considers the game to be illegal.
Time to take matters in your own hands and prove them wrong! Poker isn't a game of luck, but requires poker skill.

•Play Always and Everywhere Offline Poker, no internet connection required:
Because there is no live internet connection needed to play a good game of Texas hold'em poker, you can just play Governor of Poker 2 offline anywhere you want!
Don't wait for human players in multiplayer poker games, that don't respond or leave the pokergame or go allin all the time. Just play this offline poker game !

•Customize poker characters:
Prove you are a bigshot by customizing your poker style to fit your reputation. Be sure to visit one of the many great hat shops across Texas and get yourself the poker deluxe hat of your dreams!
The game includes HD Poker graphics for a great experience on all Android phones and tablets.

Travel through Texas by Train, Casino Boat or Stage Coach and play poker whilst on your way to the next poker city in Texas.
Every city has lots of exciting cash games and big poker tournaments with even bigger Chip prizes, competition and bigger tournaments. You’ll experience more checks, calls, raises, folds and all-ins than you can imagine!
Enjoy sit-n-go tournaments, Shootout tournaments, Bounty tournaments, Cash games.

** NO INTERNET CONNECTION REQUIRED **
You don't need an internet connection and don't have to wait for other poker players, it's an offline poker game.

Have you always been a Texas holde'm pokee fanatic? You'll love Governor of Poker 2! What are you waiting for partner? Click install, download and prove you're worthy of the great poker title: GOVERNOR OF POKER !

**** Governor of Poker 2 Reviews ****
- Gamezebo: "Makes poker accessible without being too simple. Great sense of personality. Excellent poker tutorial.. It's a Royal Flush."
- Jayisgames: "Governor of Poker 2 is well-made, highly accessible, and surprisingly addictive for all kinds of players."
- Zylom: "Play this challenging poker game now!"
- Miniclip 5 stars out of 5: "Howdy! Finally it’s here, Governor of Poker 2! Packed with lots and lots of poker extra’s! More cities to conquer and tournaments to play!"

** NOTE:
Please contact support@youdagames.com if you have any issues or suggestions, we would love to help!
You can also follow us at Facebook : https://www.facebook.com/governorofpoker2

Go download Governor of Poker 2 and enjoy the Texas Holdem Poker Adventure!

comments: i bought this game on my samsung galaxy s4 octa core version and it looks more of lagplay and not gameplay. this is dejecting as rockstar games has failed to optimise this game for android devices. it is recommended that they make necessary improvements and make the game playable for medium to high end devices. i have 4gb internal storage out of 16gb free yet the game lags, even on low settings like 0% resolution and draw distance .

This game is so old school and gta 5 is so much better than this game but it is still worth playing. It has a lot of cheats and hacks but it is still very good. It plays up very x1000000 rare. This game is very fun and if you have seen my comment please download this game immediately because it's extremely fun and it is very easy to collect money ps its okay to play offline and if you have seen my comment i recommend you to download this game immediately and have a great time

I loved this game wh3n I was young and this brings back the best memories of my child hood haha.. the controls are kinda lumpy when steering a vehicle. But all other movements are pretty good. Butt,if you happen to have a Xbox one s controller it works perfect on my galaxy s8 plus. Thanks for porting this game to android and giving the option to max the graphics out. Looks very good! Loving the portal game feel too haha!

Just started, i am playing with an Xbox One controller and everything works perfect.  The only problem is you are stuck with the original controls and cant change the buttons functions.  I wish i could use the triggers for gas and braking for driving the cars like in GTA's 4 and 5.  Other than that everything is good.  A classic game, that runs smoothly, and is a great time nostalgia trip.   This one works so well that i am definitley buying the other ports as soon as i am done with this one.

Game could be grate Game looks awesome but the controls don't work right. Walking and running is not fluid. It's stop and go. While driving it is very hard to steer while pressing the gas pedal. I have Max Payne and the controls in that are great what happened with GTA San Andreas. Please fix. Also could you make it so I can move the game to my SD Card. I am using a Samsung galaxy tab 4.

Guys help please! i gave the game 5 stars because i like it so much. description: Five years ago, Carl Johnson escaped from the pressures of life in Los Santos, San Andreas, a city tearing itself apart with gang trouble, drugs and corruption. Where filmstars and millionaires do their best to avoid the dealers and gangbangers.Now, it‚Äôs the early 90‚Äôs. Carl‚Äôs got to go home. His mother has been murdered, his family has fallen apart and his childhood friends are all heading towards disaster.On his return to the neighborhood, a couple of corrupt cops frame him for homicide. CJ is forced on a journey that takes him across the entire state of San Andreas, to save his family and to take control of the streets.Rockstar Games brings its biggest release to mobile yet with a vast open-world covering the state of San Andreas and its three major cities ‚Äì Los Santos, San Fierro and Las Venturas ‚Äì with enhanced visual fidelity and over 70 hours of gameplay.Grand Theft Auto: San Andreas features:  ‚Ä¢ Remastered, high-resolution graphics built specifically for mobile including lighting enhancements, an enriched color palette and improved character models. ‚Ä¢ Cloud save support for playing across all your mobile devices for Rockstar Social Club Members.‚Ä¢ Dual analog stick controls for full camera and movement control.‚Ä¢ Three different control schemes and customizable controls with contextual options to display buttons only when you need them.‚Ä¢ Compatible with the MoGa Wireless Game Controllers and select Bluetooth and USB gamepads.‚Ä¢ Integrated with Immersion tactile effects.¬† ‚Ä¢ Tailor your visual experience with adjustable graphic settings. descriptionHTML:
Five years ago, Carl Johnson escaped from the pressures of life in Los Santos, San Andreas, a city tearing itself apart with gang trouble, drugs and corruption. Where filmstars and millionaires do their best to avoid the dealers and gangbangers.

Now, it’s the early 90’s. Carl’s got to go home. His mother has been murdered, his family has fallen apart and his childhood friends are all heading towards disaster.

On his return to the neighborhood, a couple of corrupt cops frame him for homicide. CJ is forced on a journey that takes him across the entire state of San Andreas, to save his family and to take control of the streets.

Rockstar Games brings its biggest release to mobile yet with a vast open-world covering the state of San Andreas and its three major cities – Los Santos, San Fierro and Las Venturas – with enhanced visual fidelity and over 70 hours of gameplay.

Grand Theft Auto: San Andreas features:
• Remastered, high-resolution graphics built specifically for mobile including lighting enhancements, an enriched color palette and improved character models.
• Cloud save support for playing across all your mobile devices for Rockstar Social Club Members.
• Dual analog stick controls for full camera and movement control.
• Three different control schemes and customizable controls with contextual options to display buttons only when you need them.
• Compatible with the MoGa Wireless Game Controllers and select Bluetooth and USB gamepads.
• Integrated with Immersion tactile effects. 
• Tailor your visual experience with adjustable graphic settings.

Languages Supported: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish, Russian and Japanese.

For optimal performance, we recommend re-booting your device after downloading and closing other applications when playing Grand Theft Auto: San Andreas.

For information about supported devices and compatibility, please see:
http://support.rockstargames.com/hc/en-us/sections/200251868-San-Andreas-Mobile-Support

Mobile Version developed by War Drum Studios
www.wardrumstudios.com

Find out more:
www.rockstargames.com

See videos:
www.youtube.com/rockstargames

Follow us:
www.facebook.com/rockstargames
www.twitter.com/rockstargames

622 Broadway
4th Floor
New York NY 10012

summary: Grand Theft Auto: San Andreas
title: Grand Theft Auto: San Andreas

description: Collect and upgrade over 100 cards starring your favourite players and compete head-to-head in real-time football matches located in iconic, city based Arenas across the world. Show off your finishing skills by curling one in the top corner, or smashing it past the goalkeeper from distance. Be the last line of defence by taking control of your keeper, tip one over the bar, or make an acrobatic save for the cameras.Win trophies to unlock new levels, gaining access to different Arenas and more elite players with unique special abilities. Compete in tournaments to win prizes, challenge to be the last team standing and prove you are the true Football Clash champion.Form a League with friends or others from across the globe, share XP and help improve each other's players whilst leading your team to victory! KEY FEATURES:* Collect 5 types of player cards - Good, Superb, Elite, Legacy and Legendary.* Each player card has its own set of attributes and one special ability.* Select your ultimate All Star team to defeat your rivals.* Create your strategy by selecting one of the 6 different formations.* Immerse yourself in the action with a 3D dynamic shooting and goalkeeping experience.* Outscore your opponent and take your team to glory.* Win card packs to unlock rewards, build and upgrade your squad with your favourite players.* Tour the world in iconic city Arenas on your path to be No.1* Form a League to donate cards and build your own football community.* Challenge your League members to friendly matches to determine who is best.* Compete in knockout tournaments to determine the ultimate Football Clash champion.  Play Football Clash: All Stars now, the ultimate 5-a-side football game!
descriptionHTML:
Collect and upgrade over 100 cards starring your favourite players and compete head-to-head in real-time football matches located in iconic, city based Arenas across the world.

Show off your finishing skills by curling one in the top corner, or smashing it past the goalkeeper from distance.

Be the last line of defence by taking control of your keeper, tip one over the bar, or make an acrobatic save for the cameras.

Win trophies to unlock new levels, gaining access to different Arenas and more elite players with unique special abilities.

Compete in tournaments to win prizes, challenge to be the last team standing and prove you are the true Football Clash champion.

Form a League with friends or others from across the globe, share XP and help improve each other's players whilst leading your team to victory!

KEY FEATURES:

* Collect 5 types of player cards - Good, Superb, Elite, Legacy and Legendary.

* Each player card has its own set of attributes and one special ability.

* Select your ultimate All Star team to defeat your rivals.

* Create your strategy by selecting one of the 6 different formations.

comments: While the overall gameplay is pretty good. The whole game is literally a grind fest. Keep playing the same level over and over until you can upgrade, play another level, then proceed to keep playing the same level again. The competitive mode is also messed up as the opponent gets scores near impossible

Everything is great and good but only have one problem. And this problem will killing you all. That's the loading is damn slow no matter you are in LTE network or wifi situation. Because of slow loading it will kill your battery life fast as well. Please help to fix the problem and I will re-rate again. Thanks

Even with a perfect LTE speed game struggled with downloading hunts. The game forces you to do certain hunts before you can go back to the ones you like and want to finish. Not too mention every other minute it forces you to watch an ad or tries to get you to buy something from them. I will be deleting this app once i finish posting this comment.

Awsome game, the only thing wrong with it is that it takes forever to load. The graphics are amazing and so is the gameplay. This is something that could keep me entertained all day and I wouldn't get bored.üò∫üëå

The game currently wont open, when it does its constantly crashing and force stopping. I have the silver subscription ($1.00/weekly) and im unable to take advantage of the content im paying for  want a refund. The upgrades and new equipment are too expensive, the gear and parts are also too expensive and hard to come by especially for the spearfishing which is the best part of the game.. You certainly can't get very far without spending some real money. You can be killed by animals when the come from behind so you with your limited turning capability you have no chance to defend yourself. A lot of problems.
During cts theres moments get sudden lag and it throws off the shooting causing to miss when i know aiming right. It never had these lag bits before.

description: Rings of Anarchy is a medieval fantasy 3D MMORPG mobile game. In this game, players travel to the wondrous homelands of the elves, dwarfs, gnomes, orcs, cyclopses and more in order to collect 27 powerful rings and save the world! Featuring many unique game modes and systems, such as the free equipment system, where equipment is obtainable only via killing monsters. The free trade system, in which players can freely trade items without price restrictions. A powerful and diverse social system, including Emperors and civilians, masters and apprentices, guilds and teams. Plus a balanced and exciting world boss system where bosses can be found across the world map and refresh all day long. [Game Features]‚Äî‚ÄîNew Era, offline auto-combatUnique auto-combat system design that even offers offline auto-combat will help you to upgrade and kill bosses when you are busy, creating a win-win situation for both work and play.‚Äî‚ÄîAdvancement, exclusive customization systemFeaturing a fully customization system, in which you can advance as you see fit, outside the constraints of a traditional class system. Acquire your very own exclusive titles, spectacular skills and featured looks. ‚Äî‚ÄîCool mounts, customizable looksDozens of cool mounts including tyrannosaurus, skyfyre and griffins are at your service. Customizable equipment and looks will make you stand out of the crowd. ‚Äî‚ÄîTrade freely, buy or sell equipmentIn the market of this game, you can freely sell any unused or extra equipment obtained from killing bosses or completing quests. None of your resources or time shall be wasted.
descriptionHTML:
Rings of Anarchy is a medieval fantasy 3D MMORPG mobile game. In this game, players travel to the wondrous homelands of the elves, dwarfs, gnomes, orcs, cyclopses and more in order to collect 27 powerful rings and save the world! Featuring many unique game modes and systems, such as the free equipment system, where equipment is obtainable only via killing monsters. The free trade system, in which players can freely trade items without price restrictions. A powerful and diverse social system, including Emperors and civilians, masters and apprentices, guilds and teams. Plus a balanced and exciting world boss system where bosses can be found across the world map and refresh all day long.


[Game Features]

——New Era, offline auto-combat
Unique auto-combat system design that even offers offline auto-combat will help you to upgrade and kill bosses when you are busy, creating a win-win situation for both work and play.

——Advancement, exclusive customization system
Featuring a fully customization system, in which you can advance as you see fit, outside the constraints of a traditional class system. Acquire your very own exclusive titles, spectacular skills and featured looks.

——Cool mounts, customizable looks
Dozens of cool mounts including tyrannosaurus, skyfyre and griffins are at your service. Customizable equipment and looks will make you stand out of the crowd.

——Trade freely, buy or sell equipment
In the market of this game, you can freely sell any unused or extra equipment obtained from killing bosses or completing quests. None of your resources or time shall be wasted.
developerAddress: P.O.Box 957,Offshore Incorporations Centre,Road Town,Tortola, British Virgin Islands

title: Rings of Anarchy

description: Mighty Party: Heroes Clash is a turn-based tactical card battle RPG.Brave Hero, fight in fast 3-minute dynamic PvP battles! Summon dozens of epic war heroes to defeat all the opponents in the turn-based battle arena! Get ready to clash your Mighty Party on!Features:‚óè Turn-based & fast-paced innovative battle system. Real strategy and tactics!‚óè Infinite battle combinations from dozens of war heroes. ‚óè Epic Warlords with unique battle skills.‚óè Captivating PVP (Ranked Battles, Brawl, Arena matches, Tournaments, Survival, Raids, Events etc.) with great epic rewards!‚óè Single player campaign with an epic story of through the realm. A true hero‚Äôs Journey!‚óè Turf Wars is a game mode where your guild alliance fights using their troops against opponents for the most valuable territories. Prepare the Guild for glory!‚óè Lots of ways to evolve mighty heroes: level-up them, bind them with others, turn them into Legendary ones, upgrade skills in Turf Wars!Defeat others in online PvP -> Receive Magical and Legendary Chests -> Recruit and Evolve new battle Heroes -> Gather your MIGHTY PARTY -> Clash with other players in PVP -> Join the strongest Guild Alliance -> Be no. 1!Assemble your forces and lead your Mighty Party to victory!Note: Mighty Party: Heroes Clash is free to download and play, however, some game items can also be purchased for real money. descriptionHTML:
Mighty Party: Heroes Clash is a turn-based tactical card battle RPG.

Brave Hero, fight in fast 3-minute dynamic PvP battles! Summon dozens of epic war heroes to defeat all the opponents in the turn-based battle arena! Prove your guild alliance is the strongest one in the fantasy world of Mighty Party: Heroes Clash!

Play the troops of Imperial Archers, defend them with Wind Ninja, strengthen them with Magic of Divinity and destroy opponents forces!
Get ready to clash your Mighty Party on!

Features:
● Turn-based & fast-paced innovative battle system. Real strategy and tactics!
● Infinite battle combinations from dozens of war heroes.
● Epic Warlords with unique battle skills.
● Captivating PVP (Ranked Battles, Brawl, Arena matches, Tournaments, Survival, Raids, Events etc.) with great epic rewards!
● Single player campaign with an epic story of through the realm. A true hero’s Journey!
● Turf Wars is a game mode where your guild alliance fights using their troops against opponents for the most valuable territories. Prepare the Guild for glory!
● Lots of ways to evolve mighty heroes: level-up them, bind them with others, turn them into Legendary ones, upgrade skills in Turf Wars!

Defeat others in online PvP -> Receive Magical and Legendary Chests -> Recruit and Evolve new battle Heroes -> Gather your MIGHTY PARTY -> Clash with other players in PVP -> Join the strongest Guild Alliance -> Be no. 1!
Assemble your forces and lead your Mighty Party to victory!

Note:
Mighty Party: Heroes Clash is free to download and play, however, some game items can also be purchased for real money. If you do not want to use this feature, please set up password protection for purchases in the settings of your Google Play Store app.

A network connection is required.

Support:
Are you having problems? Please contact us via e-mail mightyparty.panoramik@gmail.com or in-game by going to Settings > Support.

Visit our Facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/mightyparty.game
developerAddress: 195030, Maly pr. 57/4, Saint Petersburg, Russia

title: Mighty Party: Heroes Clash

comments: Collecting heroes and making your own team is super fun. I wish I could get into the story a bit more, but there are a ton of spelling and grammar errors in the cut scenes that make it difficult to remain engaged. It would be nice if the writing matched the excellent quality of artwork on the game.

I dont ever write reviews for games but this game is so fun, if you like games where you collect level and awaken units like in other similar games you will love This, if you are busy they do have an auto   play function that even collect rewards and starts the next level for you which makes grinding less daunting. The graphics are amazing no flaws there and as a new player right now the newcomer rewards are so helpful.

Customer service is a joke. The game is pretty simple to play, once you get the hang of it. But don't join the game until they bring out a new server, impossible to complete with long time playing players unless you're willing to spend a hell of a lot of money to catch up. Current two servers I play on are pretty dead due to this.
It's been more than a year and com2us haven't fixed the boss raid glitches: disconnections and boss doesn't take damages. Though they will have new costumes and useless mons coming out regularly.

This game have the worst browser in this planet,how much time i need to reload the event page until i can read it?? Unstable server perform,, I still can play moba and pubg while i got dc hundred times in this game,, How long this server game will be better?? I play from 2015,2015-2016 the server is still good
At last, I got a reason to get rid of this game. the latest update was taking veeeeery long. This game has its good points but not so fair. Not really practical, PAY to win game.

comments: There should be some way that will easily calculate and show the total food, wood, iron & silver production individually. Also show subtracting from troop count how much food is getting finally stored. Total atk figure of all ships & troops before going to fight.... Etc... There are many ways to improve... R u interested to make such changes?

Srill no fix for balance. Game has a lot of potential but until there is better balance it will continue to suck. Every update just introduces more was to pay. Perhaps if the devs did something about the balance issues more people would buy in. Until this is done the game will end up as a sinking ship.
Lags upon opening, then freezes with a white screen when I touch anywhere. Yes I have a stable internet connection and Yes I have tried clearing the cache prior to loading the game.

Great game or should say WAS a great game. Been playing this for over a year now but developers just not getting the bugs fixed. Lag and more lag, mail and report system still not fixed. It was a 5 star game. Pitty I spent money on the game.üòí
Unfortunately, if you don't spend money, this game is a waste of time. AND building at the higher levels takes months to build!!!
If you don't read and learn from customers. .....you will loose them. This is a phone game. Not a 1 tb computer game..why so many updates that slow game play down?

comments: Sorry to say, but in terms of balance it is the worst game I have played so far. This game is the most unbalanced game, even for beginners. Currently I have 4 heroes and the funny part is that all four are weak against defense, such as a cannon, a rail gun, 2 stars for the full upgrade. Even high level players can attack on beginners. Defence is too much high for the attacking players, against 2 heros unit and I've noticed that lower level players can not overcome my defence while high-level players pass easily. This game is good and entertaining, there is not much flaw in this game, but this game is very unbalanced and unfair. Many players have complained about this.
Insane build times make it pretty pointless to play. Log on once a day, start another 3 day build.... boring.

description: Hold onto your helmets - the award-winning Fieldrunners series returns! From exploding Popcorn Chicken to the mighty Megabot, it‚Äôs time to assemble the ultimate army as you fight to build your empire, and conquer rival players from around the world!Recruit heroes, train troops, add defensive structures and manage resources to transform a quaint town into your own impenetrable fortress of mayhem. Whether you‚Äôre defending your turf, conquering the land in the campaign missions, or ripping through opponents worldwide in multiplayer skirmishes, there‚Äôs loot and glory to be had at every turn. FEATURES:‚Ä¢ Addicting full control strategic combat gameplay‚Ä¢ Take charge and attack in the Fieldrunners universe!‚Ä¢ Manage resources to turn your town into an impenetrable fortress!‚Ä¢ Recruit and upgrade powerful heroes, each with their own unique abilities!‚Ä¢ Tear through enemy bases with tactical real-time attacks‚Ä¢ Test your might against 60+ campaign missions!‚Ä¢ Climb the ranks with your friends by waging war on players around the world and stealing loot‚Ä¢ Field an army of Soldiers, Rocketeers, Tanks and more military marvels!‚Ä¢ Defend your turf with deadly Gatling, Cannon and Flame towers ‚Äì as well as other Fieldrunners favorites and all-new defensive turrets‚Ä¢ Transform your towers to adapt against a variety of threats, be they man, machine, or something else entirely!
descriptionHTML:
Hold onto your helmets - the award-winning Fieldrunners series returns! From exploding Popcorn Chicken to the mighty Megabot, it’s time to assemble the ultimate army as you fight to build your empire, and conquer rival players from around the world!

Recruit heroes, train troops, add defensive structures and manage resources to transform a quaint town into your own impenetrable fortress of mayhem. comments: I loved the game up until the date of this review. Too many new customizations require leaf tickets. Which translate into micro-transactions. I was able to get everything in the game without spending money up until now. Now I have spend money in order to get the more interesting content. Sadly, this app will be deleted. I am not giving Nintendo even more of my money, it is not a real Animal Crossing game to waste money on.

I love playing this game, but now I can't get into the game, all I get is support error 802-9016. Don't try and tell me to move closer to the WiFi source, because I put my phone on the WiFi router and got the same thing. My wife, who is sitting next to me, gets into the game just fine. I uninstalled that game, same thing... I would love to get back into this game, and will change my first reassuring back to a 5, but until then... Yeah... Please help....

First-time reviewer and life-long Animal Crossing player. This game combines everything good about the game series like fishing, but catching, gardening, decorating, and more. Therea is always an event going on to keep me playing multiple times a day. The team behind this game actually listen to what people say and fix it and add ease of play features! People saying this is pay to play are full of it. I have well over 600 leaf tickets from just playing the game... you just have to put in the time and complete challenges.

I love the happy music and the relaxed vibe I get while playing this game. Easy enough for young children to learn to play, but not so infantile that an adult can't enjoy it instead. The garbled chipmunk-speak language of the animal friends is hilarious! Level progression seems fair and regular. Pay-to-play options are not necessary to have a good game experience.

I would give this 5/5 across the board, as I have been playing since the November release and enjoyed every moment. Every update has made the game better, as the team listens and integrates whatever they can to make it better.  Microtransactions are ignorable, and they give leaf tickets hand over fist, besides the customizables for the campsite (foreground, midground, background) which are expensive.  Hopefully future updates brings better options.

Just like the actual Animal Crossing games, but with even MORE to do! The only difference is you're a camp owner instead of a town mayor. Oh, and the fact that's it's a FREE app!   Seriously, this is a real deal AC game all squeezed into a free app. It's perfection all around if you like games like AC. They did such an amazing job on it.
description: Get back to nature in Animal Crossing‚Ñ¢: Pocket Camp, the new Animal Crossing mobile game where you take on the role of campsite manager!You're in charge, so you can decorate your own campsite however you like! Make it fun, make it cute, make it sporty‚Äîit‚Äôs up to you to craft the kind of furniture and amenities that will make your camp a must-see for animals visiting the area.Steps to Creating Your Best Campsite- Help Animals As You Explore!While visiting different recreational spots, you'll meet new animals who could use a little help. They'll be looking for fish, fruit, bugs, and other things to get their camping adventures started‚Äîand when you help them out, you'll earn Bells and craft materials in return!- Craft Furniture and AmenitiesThe craft materials you earn by fulfilling animals‚Äô requests can be used to craft all sorts of furniture and amenities for your campsite.Just open up the Craft menu and place an order with Cyrus, the hardworking handyman from Re-Tail on the Road. Then sit back and wait! Or, if you're in a hurry, you can move your order to the very front of the line by using Leaf Tickets. You can purchase Leaf Tickets with real money, or earn them through regular gameplay.- Your Campsite. Your Way.The joy of the Animal Crossing: Pocket Camp game is creating a space that suits you and your style.Your campsite can be anything you like‚Äîfrom a traditional space that celebrates nature to a flashy fun house with concerts and rides. It's all up to you!You can also customize your camper, visit your friends' campsites to get ideas for your own, and meet new animal friends as you explore recreational areas!- Host Animals at Your CampsiteAs you grow your friendships with different animals, they'll want to visit your campsite. Craft and decorate with their favorite items, and you‚Äôll be able to host them whenever you like‚Äîeven if you change up your decorations completely!Note: This game is a free download with in-app purchases.Note: A persistent Internet connection is required to play Animal Crossing: Pocket Camp.Cellular data charges may apply.
descriptionHTML:
Get back to nature in Animal Crossing™: Pocket Camp, the new Animal Crossing mobile game where you take on the role of campsite manager!

You're in charge, so you can decorate your own campsite however you like! Make it fun, make it cute, make it sporty—it’s up to you to craft the kind of furniture and amenities that will make your camp a must-see for animals visiting the area.

Steps to Creating Your Best Campsite
- Help Animals As You Explore!
While visiting different recreational spots, you'll meet new animals who could use a little help. They'll be looking for fish, fruit, bugs, and other things to get their camping adventures started—and when you help them out, you'll earn Bells and craft materials in return!

- Craft Furniture and Amenities
The craft materials you earn by fulfilling animals’ requests can be used to craft all sorts of furniture and amenities for your campsite.

Just open up the Craft menu and place an order with Cyrus, the hardworking handyman from Re-Tail on the Road. Then sit back and wait! Or, if you're in a hurry, you can move your order to the very front of the line by using Leaf Tickets. You can purchase Leaf Tickets with real money, or earn them through regular gameplay.

- Your Campsite. Your Way.
The joy of the Animal Crossing: Pocket Camp game is creating a space that suits you and your style.

Your campsite can be anything you like—from a traditional space that celebrates nature to a flashy fun house with concerts and rides. It's all up to you!

You can also customize your camper, visit your friends' campsites to get ideas for your own, and meet new animal friends as you explore recreational areas!

- Host Animals at Your Campsite
As you grow your friendships with different animals, they'll want to visit your campsite. Craft and decorate with their favorite items, and you’ll be able to host them whenever you like—even if you change up your decorations completely!

Note: This game is a free download with in-app purchases.

Note: A persistent Internet connection is required to play Animal Crossing: Pocket Camp.
Cellular data charges may apply.

comments: Not really an action game app. If you like Mafia Wars than this is perfect for you.   UPDATE: Downtown Wars is by far not a bad game. The question is it a game for you. The animation is very limited so if you enjoy action then this is not a game for you. The best way to describe what I noticed after playing game for nearly a week, that it is a long level up game of tag. The comment board is one of the best aspects because you can communicate with the community most important you gang/mob members which helps for team building.

Very interesting and a nice game to pass time, love the BGM! Really like the changeable tags, it's so convenient to change it according to our mood/status and the profile erase option without losing the mob WOW! A really big thumps up to that! It also kinda reminds me of Mob Wars and Extreme Mob Wars etc which got me feeling nostalgic because I was really into it but, DTM tops it all! ;) Forgot to mention this, we can put space in our name! That's so convenient! Cool!

I think Elites should be boosted atleast 100 Points - 20 billion then 1000 Points - 40 Billion is 10x the work for 2x the reward.  A huge change could be game breaking but raising it to 80 Billion would give new players a chance against older players that give their minis huge collects every tourney.

Very good game but it could be better. Like when uv got multiple invites u should be able to accept them all in one instead of one at a time. But that's my only gripe. Apart from that it's a brilliant game much better than the dead imobsters. 1 more thing where can we find the boss iron fist who's attacked me a couple of times but I can't find him to attack him back. How can you recover ur account when uv forgot Google account details.

For me with all the rejuvenation down time, I get bored. But when the favors work,  it becomes a really fun game to keep your mind busy.  But by having multiple games like this it's Kool to toggle  between them. The graphics are great.   My Love for this game comes from the interactive game plot. You have to build networks with fellow gamers to rank.  And likewise building enemies.

Great game. I have played this game for years. It just continues to get better.  Recently in last 24 hours my phone crashed and I got it back up and running. But only when I open this game. Does it say UNABLE TO REACH SERVER. I don't know what's wrong. It won't let me open game at all. Plz fix for me
description: Addictive text based mafia MMO RPG with GANG WARS, TURF WARS, BOSSES, MERCENARIES, HIT-LIST, CITIES, MISSIONS, FIGHTS, TOURNAMENTS and lots more. Join now and become biggest gangsta in town.#1 Mafia Game on the Store(More than 1.5 Million downloads in Android)Our Players say: - - - ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ "Love is one awesome mafia game with the best bits of all."‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ  "Addictive, fun and social. Love this game"‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ "Soo lovely which makes me dream about a real gangster"Downtown Mafia - Live to Fight, Fight to Win!- - -Plot: A legend returns back to reclaim his old hood... and this time he is gonna take it all. You have Jane (your old flame), Marco (the weapons guy), Luke (he knows his business) and BIG JIM to help you take over the hood.Game Features- - - DTM is one of the most feature rich and diverse mafia RPG ever created. It offers players a unified gaming experience, whether you are on Android devices, iOS, Facebook, Chrome-Store or on your browser, this allows you to run your same pocket gang empire from anywhere.‚òÖ Be what you wanna be, HUSTLER, RUNNER or FIGHTER and build your criminal empire.‚òÖ Master gang MISSIONS (Jobs) in various cities around the world.‚òÖ Become a big time gangsta, FIGHT other mafiosos across other devices and platforms in real-time.‚òÖ HIT LIST your enemies for a sweet revenge.‚òÖ Gain experience in the gangstaz crime city and progress through UNLIMITED LEVELS.‚òÖ Recruit your mob members, BUY new WEAPONS, VEHICLES, ARMOURS and SPECIAL items to arm up your team.‚òÖ Earn unique crime REPUTATION (achievements) for reaching specific goals.‚òÖ Earn SKILL POINTS, upgrade your ENERGY, STAMINA and ATTACK/DEFENCE POWERs rule the Streetz and build your own crime story.‚òÖ Unlock new and exciting missions, powerful weapons and money minting businesses/properties at higher levels.‚òÖ Add your favorites to your CRIME FAMILY to keep them close.‚òÖ Defeat BOSSES at LEVEL 21 and collect them as your heroes / boss Mercs.‚òÖ RIVAL LIST keep tab on your enemies and claim back your honour.Game Features (GANGS)- - -‚òÖ Join powerful GANGS and rule the TURFS as a team.‚òÖ Chat with your GANG and equip powerful GANG ARSENALS‚òÖ Engage in GANG WARS and win exciting war rewards.‚òÖ Earn Gang's respect become the GANG BOSS... descriptionHTML:
Addictive text based mafia MMO RPG with GANG WARS, TURF WARS, BOSSES, MERCENARIES, HIT-LIST, CITIES, MISSIONS, FIGHTS, TOURNAMENTS and lots more.

Join now and become biggest gangsta in town.
#1 Mafia Game on the Store
(More than 1.5 Million downloads in Android)

Our Players say:
- - -
★★★★★ "Love is one awesome mafia game with the best bits of all."
★★★★★ "Addictive, fun and social. Love this game"
★★★★★ "Soo lovely which makes me dream about a real gangster"

Downtown Mafia - Live to Fight, Fight to Win!
- - -
Plot: A legend returns back to reclaim his old hood... and this time he is gonna take it all. You have Jane (your old flame), Marco (the weapons guy), Luke (he knows his business) and BIG JIM to help you take over the hood.

Game Features
- - -
DTM is one of the most feature rich and diverse mafia RPG ever created. It offers players a unified gaming experience, whether you are on Android devices, iOS, Facebook, Chrome-Store or on your browser, this allows you to run your same pocket gang empire from anywhere.

★ Be what you wanna be, HUSTLER, RUNNER or FIGHTER and build your criminal empire.
★ Master gang MISSIONS (Jobs) in various cities around the world.
★ Become a big time gangsta, FIGHT other mafiosos across other devices and platforms in real-time.
★ HIT LIST your enemies for a sweet revenge.
★ Gain experience in the gangstaz crime city and progress through UNLIMITED LEVELS.
★ Recruit your mob members, BUY new WEAPONS, VEHICLES, ARMOURS and SPECIAL items to arm up your team.
★ Earn unique crime REPUTATION (achievements) for reaching specific goals.
★ Earn SKILL POINTS, upgrade your ENERGY, STAMINA and ATTACK/DEFENCE POWERs rule the Streetz and build your own crime story.
★ Unlock new and exciting missions, powerful weapons and money minting businesses/properties at higher levels.
★ Add your favorites to your CRIME FAMILY to keep them close.
★ Defeat BOSSES at LEVEL 21 and collect them as your heroes / boss Mercs.
★ RIVAL LIST keep tab on your enemies and claim back your honour.

Game Features (GANGS)
- - -
★ Join powerful GANGS and rule the TURFS as a team.
★ Chat with your GANG and equip powerful GANG ARSENALS
★ Engage in GANG WARS and win exciting war rewards.
★ Earn Gang's respect become the GANG BOSS... Or start your own GANG and recruit your members build a new team
★ Capture other GANG TURFS and assign your own Operator to collect hourly payouts send to all your gang members.
★ Capture other GANG OPERATIONS to collect payouts
★ Join DEATH MATCHES to war 3 other GANGS simultaneously... winner takes all the rewards.
★ Send and receive powerful GANG BACKUPS.
★ Find matching gangs with HIT N RUN.
★ Fight automated BOSS GANGS and win exciting rewards and new GANG ARSENALS.
★ Use FREE HITS to revenge rivals who messed with your gang members.
★ Grow your GANG into Cartels.
★ Take part in weekly TOURNAMENTS and win respect in the game for your gang and yourself.

Account
- - -
✔ Sync your account with Facebook, Google, Google Play Games login
✔ Custom Avatars with Gravatar
✔ In-game player profile & live comments.
✔ Live leader boards (Mob-level and Global) to see were you stand against the rest of the players.

Other Supported Platforms:
- - -
Desktop Or Mobile Browser: https://play.dtmafia.mobi
Facebook: https://apps.facebook.com/play-dtmafia
iOS (iPhone/iPad): Search for "Downtown Mafia" in the Appstore

Help and Support
- - -
Email: android@dtmafia.mobi
HelpDesk: http://helpdesk.dtmafia.mobi
Official Facebook Page: http://www.facebook.com/DTMafia
Developer: DYNAMICNEXT (http://www.dynamicnext.com)

comments: I really love this game, you get rewarded for prioritizing property and it's very satisfying to finish the level with a perfect score when you time everything just right. The diamonds are a little bit too rare to get and since half the updates are priced with diamonds the end result is each location doesn't get 100% upgraded, witch is a little bit frustrating. I love that when you revisit a level it's slightly different, makes it much more interesting. It's a lovely little game, kudos to the developers and designers!

1. This should have an UNLIMITED LIVES option. The stages per level are unenjoyably difficult enough --why do you have to limit the player's chance to try and be better?? Some levels are impossible for human fingers already.  2. You should lessen the required number of diamonds as value of items to upgrade!!! A player only gets 9 diamonds per level achieved. 10 gems per upgrade is ok, but 50??? FIX THIS ASAP or people will be deleting this app.

I love it cuz it's the best but some of the costumers are feisty. The old lady takes three the man and boy takes two things. The young lady is fine. She takes 1 stuff. The little girl I hate her. She rides her scooter in the shop when she know full well she post to ride her scooter outside. But everything else is okay.

I always love supermarket mania. I played supermarket mania 1 and 2 and expect great things for this. But, no, this game infuriates me. The pace is really slow and the customer stream is to long. More over, it use diamonds for essential upgrades like cashier (why should i upgrade cashier??) and cart. Grinding diamonds is a pain in the ass. I think the developer only think of making money than make this game enjoyable to it's player.

I like this game but it needs to give better options earn Crystal's and it should not cost you as many if any at all to move to next level. I play a lot of games and don't mind spending a few dollars but now I'm turned off from it. Yall need to do better. I Won't suggest it to any of my friends for that reason alone.

I really have fun with this game. I also like how you can earn the crystals through playing, not absolutely having to pay. One thing that would be nice was to have the option to fast forward especially with times when you're just waiting for customers or the elderly ladies to finish shopping. Also an endless challenging round would be awesome. Thanks =)
description: Running a grocery chain can be a lot of fun! Dive into this highly addictive time management game based on our bestselling Supermarket Mania franchise ‚Äì and prepare to stay on your toes every single second. Join millions of players who are already fans of Nikki! Head to Tinseltown with Nikki and her friends to help the Mayor strengthen the city‚Äôs economic development. Roll up your sleeves, open new supermarkets and help Nikki keep them stocked to the rafters. Manage 14 unique stores through 340 challenging yet amusing levels, serve ten types of choosy customers and upgrade your shelves and freezers so that they can hold more inventory. Tackle numerous quests to earn achievements and rewards and grow your enterprise into a wild success. Just remember ‚Äì keep an eye on Mr. Torg‚Äôs dirty tricks!While this game is absolutely free to play, you have the ability to unlock optional bonuses via in-app purchases from within the game. descriptionHTML:
Running a grocery chain can be a lot of fun! Dive into this highly addictive time management game based on our bestselling Supermarket Mania franchise – and prepare to stay on your toes every single second. Join millions of players who are already fans of Nikki!

Head to Tinseltown with Nikki and her friends to help the Mayor strengthen the city’s economic development. Roll up your sleeves, open new supermarkets and help Nikki keep them stocked to the rafters. Manage 14 unique stores through 340 challenging yet amusing levels, serve ten types of choosy customers and upgrade your shelves and freezers so that they can hold more inventory. Tackle numerous quests to earn achievements and rewards and grow your enterprise into a wild success. Just remember – keep an eye on Mr. Torg’s dirty tricks!

While this game is absolutely free to play, you have the ability to unlock optional bonuses via in-app purchases from within the game. You may disable in-app purchases in your device settings.

● Nearly 340 levels through 14 game settings to play
● 10 uniquely demanding customers to please
● 85 products to sell with savvy and great service
● Nearly 315 upgrades to spruce up your stores
● Regular FREE updates to keep you stimulated and entertained
● Google Play game services support

COMPATIBILITY NOTES: This game performs best on high-end smartphones and tablets.

comments: Enjoyed the game. Very fun and im actually spending which is rare for me.   I dont like the orb prices go up with each new arena. I wont be spending now im in in arena 4 those prices are just not worth it. Id also like the ability to save a few different decks. And make gold earning a bit easier its not balanced. Im in arena 4 and been saving gold for over a week not spending on anything opening orbs. And i still cant upgrade any of my cards.   Tbh as much as i enjoy the game. If i cant upgrade without spendig then ill wind up uninstalling eventually

Love it! Very interesting and fun to play, but i have a suggestion. You should add some spells (Poison, Heal...). They don't have to be overpowered, just for slightly more fun gameplay! Also they should be regular cards (Heroes). And one more thing: bring some advatage to players that don't start first in the match, because it's easier to win when you are playing first.

Very unique and fun strategy game. Easy to understand from the first game. Very forgiving to newcomers but if you want to get good, it takes planning and learning. Fun to pick up and play throughout the day. My only problem is that if you sit and play for more than a few minutes, you'll waste alot of orbs winning games. You can spend gems to free up slots, but I'd rather just not receive orbs until I have a free slot. Good game.

I wish that your global rank was more intuitive and less complicated to acquire. Also on the achievement's it says that I can't get the last 2 stars on the found heroes however I have all that I can get. I also wish there was a pm option as the leader of a clan I want to give constructive criticism but not call them out in the chat.. other than that it fully deserved the 5 star.. thanks for makeing this and keep smashing!!üòã

The game itself its good, but lack of fun. To upgrade cards you need money which is hard to get in the game and from the clan. In free chest and common orbs you never get any rare cards and money is too less. Would be fun if the cards could be developed faster and if they would have a counter attack possibility when you upgrade it to certain level. You could implement a coop when each plyer choose 2 cards from deck or something similar. In addition I would change which player starts, should be based on the deck strenght. I would also implement the position of the cards on the field and which card is in front and which card in the back, by that you need to start a bit more strategic. Hope that something happens with the gameplay soon, before more players leave. Good luck

Love the game. Really fun to play and balanced so even non paying players can do well. One complaint I have is the new addition of zombie has a bug, when hitting a buffed opponent the poison touch doesnt replace the buff. Please fix this issue.

Build your fearless Smashing Four squad and fight your way to the top! Advance to higher arenas and adapt your strategy to new, challenging battle environments. Unlock amazing new heroes, add them to your squad and search for the best strategy! Master your skills and make it to the top of the leaderboard. Who knows, maybe you'll join the company of best players in the world? comments: Great game!!! Still some bug's. You have to log out and log back in to collect the 5 hour daily rewards. Sometimes you can't post in the chat rooms. It will say invalid character. A lot of lag at times when you use the power and impact gauge. There needs to be more options to customize character's and or add more. I also believe the daily 5 hour rewards need to change instead of the same rewards everyday. It is a fun game, and highly addictive. Great graphics, which still could be improved on, looking at newer golf games coming out.
Great game.  Only problem is the huge 10 second warning that covers your shot.   Also the game meter jumps.  So I get penalties for taking longer than 10 seconds when I let the control bar reset.

Almost great. The UI is a crowded mess. Too much nonsense. The equipment tabs are broken due to bugs(I downloaded on several devices) making it impossible to accurately navigate between items, and the putting is rigged(obvious padding) resulting in missed shots that shouldn't happen. Besides these glaring flaws there is great potential here.

A great game easy to play and progress.  Only issue is i can't work out how to change my country from the usa to aus. Sick to death of my putts begging taken off me because you have ridiculously stupid gamer play.  If I putt a ball in real life and it hits the edge of a cup it goes in 90 pc of the time.  If I putt one to the lip of the cup in real life it goes ohm.  But bout your retarded physics.  They stop the ball on the edge or knock it away from the hole. What a load of bulls$/^. Fix this and I may consider upping the rating

I really like this game other than the BIRDS IN THE BACKGROUND!!! Shut them up PLEASE!!! It's very annoying and makes me not want to play this game I have to play it with the volume turned down so I don't have to hear the freaking BIRDS!

Fine before the update. Now it glitches and freezes. Cannot finish a round. Power bar no longer smooth. Not enjoyable to play. I wanted to quit in the middle of the round. Very disappointed in latest update. I hope this is fixed soon. This was my favorite game on mobile device ever and I want to go babe to playing it!

descriptionHTML:
Experience the first real-time, multi-player mobile golf game!

Introducing Golf Star™, the greatest golf game you’ll ever play, featuring realistic graphics, golfing techniques mastered by the pros, and a simulation powered by real physics-based gameplay. Play with golfers from all over the world!

Language support: English, 한국어, Deutsch, Français, Português, Español, 日本語, 中文简体, or 中文繁體. , Indonesia, ไทย.

* The game won't be available on some of the low-end devices that do not support Tegra 2.

* Access permission notice for gameplay
· STORAGE: The permission is required to store game data and will not access personal files such as photos.
· PHONE: The permission is required to proceed with in-game events and rewards and will not affect calls.
· CONTACTS: The permission is required to sync your friend list and Google Account.

※ You'll be able to enjoy the service except features related to above authorities even if you don't give permission to the above.

Stunning Graphics and True-to-Life Golf Physics!
- Golf Star features stunningly beautiful graphics unlike anything you've ever seen before.
- Experience the exhilaration of being on a real golf course!
- Terrain height, ball impact angle, wind, temperature, humidity, and up to 70 other factors implemented to perfectly capture the physics of a real swing.

Various Skills and Techniques
- We’ve captured the skills and techniques of real-life pro golfers.
- Become a pro golfer and choose from up to 15 techniques to use, including draw shots, fade shots, and chip shots.

Different Game Modes
- Career Mode: Play Single Player rounds and Quests, or compete in the NPC Tournament.
- Match Challenge/Tournament Mode: You can enjoy 1:1 Tournament on a real time basis with players from all around the world.
- Grand Championship: Meet the tournament score requirement to advance to a higher tournament and compete for the true master.
- Customized Tournament: You can be the host of a tournament! Customize your own tournament and award prizes to attending players.
- Skins Mode: Max. of 4 players will compete against each other to win each hole, and the winner will earn the prize money.

World Championship
- Participate in the weekly World Championship Match and claim victory to win awesome rewards!
- Win all the major tournaments for the ultimate grand slam!

Golf Tournaments!
- Play a new tournament every week and win prizes.
- Become the world’s greatest Pro Golfer, and achieve the Grand Slam.

Guild System
- Create a Guild with users from all over the world!
- Complete Guild Missions all together with your Guild Members and acquire various items from the Guild Shop!
- Enjoy competing against other Guilds in the Guild Battle League!

Daily Mission System
- Complete various missions every day to get amazing rewards.
- You can become the best player by completing the missions every day!

Hall of Fame
- Compete against players from all around the world and enter the Hall of Fame!

• Items are available for purchase in this game. Some paid items may not be refundable depending on the type of item.
• For Com2uS Mobile Game Terms of Service, visit http://www.withhive.com/.
- Terms of Service : http://terms.withhive.com/terms/policy/view/M9/T1
- Privacy Policy : http://terms.withhive.com/terms/policy/view/M9/T3
• For questions or customer support, please contact our Customer Support by visiting http://www.withhive.com/help/inquire

comments: Dropped down to 4 stars as your notifications are invasive. No way to shut them off and they use my phone ringtone notification sound setting please fix this. Best free game period. Super fun colorful graphics. Addictive gameplay. Wish you could upgrade or by more hearts. Love the tournaments because they payout well.

Used to love it. Even spent money on it. It occasionally crashes, if an event ends while you are playing it bumps you out and you lose a life and the notifications you can't turn off are all annoying. Worst part about the notifications, they send everything twice and in some cases several times a day.

I was on my way to completing 2000 boards and then was forced to update game and log back on and I had lost over 300 boards that I had completed.. Can you explain that... Stop cheating me.. Do not play this game!! It will cheat you
Yet again another storm8 game crashing üò¥üôÉ seriously need to sort this out! Getting to a point where I'm just going delete all your apps and advise friends not to install as well

I dropped the rating on it, used to Love it, however it's been about four days that I can't collect the reward for the fruits I've garnered. It's quite disappointing, now I'm dropping on the status just for that. Will uninstall if This continues, no use in keeping It. Hope It gets Fixed
Use to spend a lot of money on this game because it's addictive. But for the past year in the middle of a game it shuts of on me. Hate this game name.
description: Throw on your sunglasses and head to puzzle paradise full of baby animals from around the world! Match tasty treats and collect adorable bouncing babies to win big. Play with your friends to experience extra fun!From the beautiful Wildflower Meadows to the thrilling Way Outback, explore this new game from the makers of Candy Blast Mania and Jewel Mania!COMING SOON: Our new awesome weekly event! Help the Fox King feed his royal subjects for amazing treasure and rewards. Compete with other players to become the Royal Champion and win prestigious leaderboard rewards!NEW: Join the world‚Äôs cutest animals in weekly events and competitions! Collect Treasure Keys from special levels and earn unique prizes for playing. Compete with other players on the Weekly Leaderboard to see who can win the most!Hungry Babies Mania Features:800+ puzzles of match-3 gameplay means there are plenty of hungry babies to feed!- Match tasty treats to  feed your furry friends! Give each animal their favorite snacks to fill their tummies and send them scampering off with gladness. Journey through levels to progress across a huge world map!Unique Game Modes!- Match next to waffles, honey pots, and dirt to unlock delicious treats and alarms to wake sleepy babies. . There are tons of free, fun modes to play!Keep an eye out for the nasty Gopher Gang and Terry the Orangutan! They steal babies‚Äô food unless you stop them!- Games get more intense as you help overcome the Gopher Gang and Terry! Scramble to save the treats before the they can be stolen You‚Äôll be in a real jam unless you can save the food in time!There are so many babies excited to become your friend like  Rex the Lion, Zoomer the Turtle, Borus the Wild Boar, and many more!- Collect your favorite animals:a cuddly kitty, an adorable elephant, a playful panda, a frisky puppy and many more!. Form unique combos by collecting as many treats in a match as possible to blast treats and raise your score. Nab a high score to feed and collect your new and unique friends!Challenge your friends on the Leaderboards!- Crush your friends‚Äô high scores and compete to be the best! Can you feed the most hungry babies??NEW Treasure Key Event!- Play Treasure Key levels to collect keys and get prizes! Compare your scores with friends to see who‚Äôs the best.Offline mode!- New offline mode allows your animal friends to come anywhere with you! Play and feed your animal pals no matter where you are in tons of levels.FREE TO PLAY with FREE updates!- Hungry Babies Mania is free-to-play game with frequent updates and weekly levels releases!Hungry Babies Mania is the most DOG-gone charming and CAT-ivating puzzle game on Android! Best of all, it‚Äôs FREE!Please note that Hungry Babies Mania is free to play, but you can purchase in-app items with real money. descriptionHTML:
Throw on your sunglasses and head to puzzle paradise full of baby animals from around the world! Match tasty treats and collect adorable bouncing babies to win big. Play with your friends to experience extra fun!

From the beautiful Wildflower Meadows to the thrilling Way Outback, explore this new game from the makers of Candy Blast Mania and Jewel Mania!

COMING SOON: Our new awesome weekly event! Help the Fox King feed his royal subjects for amazing treasure and rewards. Compete with other players to become the Royal Champion and win prestigious leaderboard rewards!

NEW: Join the world’s cutest animals in weekly events and competitions! Collect Treasure Keys from special levels and earn unique prizes for playing. Compete with other players on the Weekly Leaderboard to see who can win the most!

Hungry Babies Mania Features:

800+ puzzles of match-3 gameplay means there are plenty of hungry babies to feed!
- Match tasty treats to feed your furry friends! Give each animal their favorite snacks to fill their tummies and send them scampering off with gladness. Journey through levels to progress across a huge world map!

Unique Game Modes!
- Match next to waffles, honey pots, and dirt to unlock delicious treats and alarms to wake sleepy babies. . There are tons of free, fun modes to play!

Keep an eye out for the nasty Gopher Gang and Terry the Orangutan! They steal babies’ food unless you stop them!
- Games get more intense as you help overcome the Gopher Gang and Terry! Scramble to save the treats before the they can be stolen You’ll be in a real jam unless you can save the food in time!

There are so many babies excited to become your friend like Rex the Lion, Zoomer the Turtle, Borus the Wild Boar, and many more!
- Collect your favorite animals:a cuddly kitty, an adorable elephant, a playful panda, a frisky puppy and many more!. Form unique combos by collecting as many treats in a match as possible to blast treats and raise your score. Nab a high score to feed and collect your new and unique friends!

Challenge your friends on the Leaderboards!
- Crush your friends’ high scores and compete to be the best! Can you feed the most hungry babies??

NEW Treasure Key Event!
- Play Treasure Key levels to collect keys and get prizes! Compare your scores with friends to see who’s the best.

Offline mode!
- New offline mode allows your animal friends to come anywhere with you! Play and feed your animal pals no matter where you are in tons of levels.

FREE TO PLAY with FREE updates!
- Hungry Babies Mania is free-to-play game with frequent updates and weekly levels releases!

Hungry Babies Mania is the most DOG-gone charming and CAT-ivating puzzle game on Android! Best of all, it’s FREE!

Please note that Hungry Babies Mania is free to play, but you can purchase in-app items with real money. To disable this feature, go to the Google Play app on your device, tap the Menu button, select Settings > Use password to restrict purchases. Then follow the directions to complete setup. In addition, Hungry Babies may link to social media services, such as Facebook, and Storm8 will have access to your information through such services.

Follow Storm8 Studios!
www.storm8-studios.com
facebook.com/storm8
twitter.com/storm8

Thanks for playing!

comments: Would be 5 stars if I could get back into the game. Have tried uninstalling but it still keeps crashing after the loading screen. A Mikaela screen comes up with a Start Download button and it crashes on this screen.  Update: I can't login on your website to log a ticket with your support team.

I do miss the old LOA - Fire Raider style of art and play, just came back after maybe a year or so and it was gone! But, Paradise seems pretty cool so far, only thing I'm not a big fan of is how everything deals with irl money while in the 'old' one you could build up gems or materials for certain things like VIP levels; also I heard about rewards being given to old players like me? That's pretty cool, will have to check that out... But yea, so far I like the game, miss the old style but it's still good to me, will update this later on when I play more.
Gave you people an opportunity to fix the stupid chibi icon characters. The latest update didn't fix that so uninstalled.  Also do not reply with a generic response cause you can kiss my ass

Only challenging for nonpaying playing. Not a big fan of pay to win games. But LoA is always addicting and just makes you want to spend your money. Not suitable if you're addicted to that overall. More nonpaying support would be reasonable for them to at least be able to compete.

Latest updates just added more to this already enjoyable game.  However I wouldn't encourage new players to spend any money on the game as the benefits are nonexistant for what you pay. Which means a limited lifespan for the game if no one is paying.  Still a good game to enjoy on a mobile device.

description: Get Ready for the Holidays with Google Play‚Äôs Festive Updates!Endorsed By Gal Gadot! An Epic Fantasy RPG AdventureÔºÅAn eternal cycle of conflict has turned the world of Elysium upside down. The endless power struggle has finally toppled the Angels from their place as the aristocracy. But this did not lead to peace. In fact, the strife between the Humans, Elves, and Orcs have intensified even more. All the while, lurking in the shadows, a nefarious power plots its revenge.When the Prophecy of the Apocalypse spread across the land, it became woven into the fabric of fate. Legend says only "Omega," an ancient relic of the Angels, has the power to alter fate and prevent the end of the world.Join the epic saga! EMPOWER YOUR HEROES, BATTLE WITH ANGELS! Reclaim the glory of the League of Angels![Game Introduction]The newest mobile game in award-winning League of Angels series is here! League of Angels: Paradise Land is the next epic fantasy RPG that will take you on a harrowing journey through the world of the Angels.Visually, the game features beautiful 3D graphics, dynamic scenery, and exquisite character design created by senior art director on GTA5. On the gameplay side, a new dual-resource combat system and incorporation of multiple genres like MOBA and Roguelike has created a unique and innovative mobile RPG for the LoA universe.	[Game Features]Superb Visual Presentation:- Stunning combat effects- Dynamic 3D scenery- Exquisite character art and designEngaging Strategy:- Epic Battles: Recruit Heroes and strategically build your team to defeat the forces of evil- Innovative Dual Resource combat system adds another layer of strategyMultiple Progression Methods:- Recruit Heroes, Augment and Ascend their power, learn and upgrade powerful Skills, and build your ultimate team- Thousands of Hero Equipment to find; Upgrade, Refine, and even Awaken them to unlock their true potential- Imbue your Heroes with new powers using the mystical Magistones- Hero Blessing allows all your Heroes add to your strengthWide Variety of Gameplay:- Honor Trial: Dungeon-crawling game mode based on the Roguelike genre- Labyrinth: Explore the darkest depths, find hidden treasures, and confront epic Bosses!- Arena: Battle players around the world, use strategy to conquer your rivals- Guilds: Create or join Guilds with hundreds of players, strive towards common goalsVisit the official website to start your saga: https://pl.gtarcade.com/Follow us on Facebook for a chance to earn special rewards: https://www.facebook.com/LoAParadiseLand/
descriptionHTML:
Get Ready for the Holidays with Google Play’s Festive Updates!

Endorsed By Gal Gadot! An Epic Fantasy RPG Adventure！

An eternal cycle of conflict has turned the world of Elysium upside down. The endless power struggle has finally toppled the Angels from their place as the aristocracy. But this did not lead to peace. In fact, the strife between the Humans, Elves, and Orcs have intensified even more. All the while, lurking in the shadows, a nefarious power plots its revenge.

When the Prophecy of the Apocalypse spread across the land, it became woven into the fabric of fate. Legend says only "Omega," an ancient relic of the Angels, has the power to alter fate and prevent the end of the world.

Join the epic saga! EMPOWER YOUR HEROES, BATTLE WITH ANGELS! Reclaim the glory of the League of Angels!

[Game Introduction]
The newest mobile game in award-winning League of Angels series is here! League of Angels: Paradise Land is the next epic fantasy RPG that will take you on a harrowing journey through the world of the Angels.

Visually, the game features beautiful 3D graphics, dynamic scenery, and exquisite character design created by senior art director on GTA5. On the gameplay side, a new dual-resource combat system and incorporation of multiple genres like MOBA and Roguelike has created a unique and innovative mobile RPG for the LoA universe.


[Game Features]

Superb Visual Presentation:
- Stunning combat effects
- Dynamic 3D scenery
- Exquisite character art and design

Engaging Strategy:
- Epic Battles: Recruit Heroes and strategically build your team to defeat the forces of evil
- Innovative Dual Resource combat system adds another layer of strategy

Multiple Progression Methods:
- Recruit Heroes, Augment and Ascend their power, learn and upgrade powerful Skills, and build your ultimate team
- Thousands of Hero Equipment to find; Upgrade, Refine, and even Awaken them to unlock their true potential
- Imbue your Heroes with new powers using the mystical Magistones
- Hero Blessing allows all your Heroes add to your strength

Wide Variety of Gameplay:
- Honor Trial: Dungeon-crawling game mode based on the Roguelike genre
- Labyrinth: Explore the darkest depths, find hidden treasures, and confront epic Bosses!

descriptionHTML:
★★★Blood Tyrant——A Magical Strategy Game★★★

☆Battle for the Throne☆
Win the battle and showcase your best tactics. Blood Tyrant is an MMO game that lets you destroy enemy empires to defend your honor.

☆Free game: tactical multiplayer game☆
A thriving alliance system allows you to join an alliance, so you can protect and develop your troops. All alliance members will conquer the world side by side. This is a wise choice! This is an RTS game, all game tactics and decisions are made in real time. Compete with players from around the world; and do your utmost to become the most powerful king!

☆Establish and guard your empire☆
Attacking is important and so is development. In Blood Tyrant, you can establish a vast empire, upgrade all kinds of buildings, train troops and build traps. Will the enemy have the guts to declare war against you?

☆Stories and chapters☆
Enchanting stories and chapters, so you will know the world and have a sense of immersion!

★★Features of Blood Tyrant★★
☆Real time battles! You will fight with your enemies in a free and magical world!
☆Faster march speed. Get to the battlefield faster and participate in battles!
☆Speedup time! You will become the strongest faster!
☆An unprecedented Grand Alliance design. An alliance can unite with other alliances or join a Grand Alliance with alliance diplomats. Become the biggest alliance with flexible alliance tactics.
☆Expand your Grand alliance area in the World and conquer the bloody battlefield!
☆There will be lots of kings in the Blood Tyrant, but there will be only one true king. Will that be you?

comments: The game works fine during the day, then somewhere around 7pm NZT, the game locks itself and I can't play for 12 hours. Has been this way for a long time.  Also I'm the new update it asked if I wanted to reload an old profile and I've lost all the galactic and colossal cards I've earned. Any chance I can get my old account back?

It is a very fun game I just don't like how I am pitted against someone ranked higher then me when I play multiplayer. I played 10 straight multiplayer games and I lost every single one because I was fighting a player ranked higher then me. At least let me lose to someone who is ranked tha same as me. Also improve tha game's matchmaking skills

A very buggy pay to win game. This game should be called "Plant VS Zombies - GREED". Multiplay is rigged, so cards will come out in favour who pays more. So, to publisher is not enough income of adds on game worth of 2$, but have in-game purchace worth of HUNDRED of dollars. Really? On a casual kid's game? Greed to infinity and beyond.

Greedy game, break the game rules just to forces me watch ads? Your today's puzzle (22nd Feb 2018) have like 3 ways to do it, but 2 of them didnt make the HUNT zombie to HUNT for the second time, FIX IT

Great Game and concept and all... But the multiplayer is so offballanced. I'm only like level 3 and yet I keep getting people who are at least level 80. Also the new zombie hero (Huge-Giganticus) needs to be nerfed as soon as possible. Lastly, whoever makes the daily challenges needs to stop, they are practically impossible to beat and the reward isn't that great.

Good game, but I'm stuck in the title screen for a week. I tried reinstalling over and over but doesn't work. Moreover, players who had issues about the internet connectivity problems of while they're watching an ad and letting your opponent to win in multiplayer. Not only that but the Super Block Meter is keeping a lot buggy. Fix these problems now.
description: From the makers of Plants vs. Zombies 2 and Plants vs. Zombies Garden Warfare 2 comes the next great game in the epic battle between doom and bloom ‚Äì Plants vs. Zombies Heroes. Collect Heroes with outrageous and incredible super powers and build your ultimate battle team. Embark on a journey to discover new characters, and confront mighty opponents along the way. And, for the first time ever on mobile, play as either plants or zombies. It‚Äôs the lawn of a new battle!COLLECT YOUR HEROESCollect and choose from 20 unique Plant and Zombie Heroes and unlock their lawn-inspiring super powers. Will you pick Plants and deploy the masked, sharp-shooting avenger, Green Shadow? Or will you choose a Zombie Hero and call on the superbly superficial Super Brainz, Zomboss‚Äôs secret weapon with a powerful punch and fondness for hair gel? Each Hero‚Äôs selection of super powers will help determine your team‚Äôs winning strategy. FORM YOUR TEAMEvery Hero needs a crew. Build yours and diversify your skills by collecting teammates ‚Äì from the PvZ characters you know and love, to daring new plants and zombies. There are hundreds to discover! Devise distinct strategies for your Hero by selecting compatible teammates and experiment with devastating combos. Or, use Auto Team-Builder to quickly create your team, try out new strategies, and automatically upgrade your teams as you collect new characters.GO ON COURAGEOUS ADVENTURESJourney through the universe of PvZ Heroes as each action-packed skirmish takes you further along an ever-blooming map. Battle brain-thirsty or botanical foes ‚Äì each side has a different path to follow. Encounter challenging bosses with tricky powers and abilities, and defeat them for legendary rewards!PLAY AGAINST FRIENDS AND FOESTest your team when you take on other players in exciting real-time matches. Earn rewards for defeating your bite-iest adversaries, and build your bank when you complete Daily Missions from Crazy Dave. Who will become the ultimate horticultural hero? Harvest your courage ‚Äì the battle is on!Important Consumer Information: Requires acceptance of EA‚Äôs Privacy & Cookie Policy and User Agreement. Collects data through third party analytics technology (see Privacy & Cookie Policy for details). Contains direct links to the Internet and social networking sites intended for an audience over 13.
descriptionHTML:
From the makers of Plants vs. Zombies 2 and Plants vs. Zombies Garden Warfare 2 comes the next great game in the epic battle between doom and bloom – Plants vs. Zombies Heroes. Collect Heroes with outrageous and incredible super powers and build your ultimate battle team. Embark on a journey to discover new characters, and confront mighty opponents along the way. And, for the first time ever on mobile, play as either plants or zombies. It’s the lawn of a new battle!

COLLECT YOUR HEROES
Collect and choose from 20 unique Plant and Zombie Heroes and unlock their lawn-inspiring super powers. Will you pick Plants and deploy the masked, sharp-shooting avenger, Green Shadow? Or will you choose a Zombie Hero and call on the superbly superficial Super Brainz, Zomboss’s secret weapon with a powerful punch and fondness for hair gel? Each Hero’s selection of super powers will help determine your team’s winning strategy.

FORM YOUR TEAM
Every Hero needs a crew. Build yours and diversify your skills by collecting teammates – from the PvZ characters you know and love, to daring new plants and zombies. There are hundreds to discover! Devise distinct strategies for your Hero by selecting compatible teammates and experiment with devastating combos. Or, use Auto Team-Builder to quickly create your team, try out new strategies, and automatically upgrade your teams as you collect new characters.

GO ON COURAGEOUS ADVENTURES
Journey through the universe of PvZ Heroes as each action-packed skirmish takes you further along an ever-blooming map. Battle brain-thirsty or botanical foes – each side has a different path to follow. Encounter challenging bosses with tricky powers and abilities, and defeat them for legendary rewards!

PLAY AGAINST FRIENDS AND FOES
Test your team when you take on other players in exciting real-time matches. Earn rewards for defeating your bite-iest adversaries, and build your bank when you complete Daily Missions from Crazy Dave. Who will become the ultimate horticultural hero? Harvest your courage – the battle is on!


Important Consumer Information: Requires acceptance of EA’s Privacy & Cookie Policy and User Agreement. Collects data through third party analytics technology (see Privacy & Cookie Policy for details). Contains direct links to the Internet and social networking sites intended for an audience over 13.
